<e0>Searches</e0> and<e1> </e1><e2>Regular expressions</e2>: Searches in OmegaT can be as simple as "<e3>list segments with </e3><e4>the word 'kangaroo' ".
<e0>Recercas</e0> e<e1> </e1><e2>Expressiones regular</e2>: Recercas in OmegaT pote esser simple como "<e3>lista le segmentos con </e3><e4>le parola 'kangaroo' ".
<e0>Segmentation</e0>:translation memory tools work with textual units called segments.
<e0>Segmentation</e0>:le instrumentos de memoria de traduction functiona con unitates textual nominate segmentos.
<e0>Shortcuts customization:</e0> shortcuts can be customized to your personal preferences
<e0>Personalisation del vias breve:</e0> le vias breve pote esser personalisate pro los adaptar a tu preferentias personal
<e0>Mesura:</e0> rediger pro cambiar le mesura del typo de character
<e0>Terminology management</e0>: Terminology management is important for translation consistency.
<e0>La gestion del terminologia</e0>: La gestion del terminologia es importante pro le consistentia del traduction.

<e0>The user interface</e0>,<e1>Main Menu and Keyboard Shortcuts</e1>: these two chapters are likely to be heavily consulted, since they explain the user interface of OmegaT and the functions available via the main menu and the keyboard shortcuts.

<e0>Le interfacie del usator</e0>,<e1>Menu Principal e Vias Breve del claviero</e1>: iste duos capitulos debe probabilemente esser pesantemente consultate, pois que illos explica le interfacie del usator de OmegaT e le functiones utilisabile via le menu principal e le vias breve ex claviero.
<e0>Translate the following attributes</e0>: the selected attributes will appear as segments in the Editor window.
<e0>Rende le attributos sequente</e0>: le attributos seligite apparera como segmentos in le Fenestra de Modifica.
<e0>Translation memories: </e0> explains the role of the various subfolders containing translation memories, and provides information on other important aspects relating to translation memories.
<e0>Memorias de traduction: </e0> explica le rolo del varie sub plicas continente memorias de traduction, e provide informationes re altere importante aspectos del memorias de traduction.
<e0>Translation memory:</e0><a1> OmegaT</a1> stores your translations in a translation memory file.
<e0>Memoria de traduction:</e0><a1> </a1>OmegaT archiva tu traductiones in un file memoria de traduction.
<e0>Translation process:</e0> Imagine having to translate something; from a single file to a folder containing subfolders each with a number of files in a variety of formats.
<e0>Processo de traduction:</e0> Figura te de deber traducer alique; ab un sol file a un classificator continente subcamisas, cata con plure files in un varietate de formatos.
<e0>VCS client: </e0>To interface with the server an SVN or Git client must be installed on computers of "project managers" involved in the OmegaT project.
<e0>Le cliente VCS: </e0>Pro tu interfacie con le server debe esser installate un cliente SVN o Git sur le computatores del "administratores del projecto" implicate in le projecto OmegaT.
<e0>VCS server - </e0>i.e. SVN or Git server is the environment where the common material is kept and maintained on the net.
<e0>Le server VCS - </e0>id es le server SVN o le GIT es le ambiente ubi le material commun es conservate e mantenite sur le rete.
<e0>Warning!</e0> Should you change filter options whilst a project is open, you must reload the project in order for the changes to take effect.
<e0>Advertimento!</e0> deberea tu cambiar optiones filtro durante un projecto es aperte, tu debe recargar le projecto pro que le cambios sume effecto.
<e0>Word:</e0> non-visible instruction text, comments, footnotes, endnotes, footers
<e0>Word:</e0> texto de instruction non-visibile, commentos, notas a pede de pagina, notas final, pedes de pagina

<e0>Working with plain text</e0> and <e1>Working with formatted text</e1>: these two chapters explain certain important points concerning texts to be translated, such as the encoding set (in the case of plain text files) and tag handling (in the case of formatted text).

<e0>Laborar con texto plan</e0> e <e1>Laborar con texto formate</e1>: iste duos capitulos explica alcun importante punctos re le textos a render, como le codification (in le caso del files de texto plan) e le tractamento del tags (in le caso del textos formate).
<e0>XSLT</e0> (Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformations): is a declarative, XML-based language used for the transformation of XML documents.
<e0>XSLT</e0> (Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformations): es un lingua declarative basate sur XML, utilisate pro le transformation del documentos XML.

<e0>add the copied files to the local version of the repository:</e0> right-click on the local checkout folder and select <g1>TortoiseSVN > Add.</g1> In the dialog that opens, leave all options as per default and click<g2> OK</g2>.

<e0>adde le files copiate al version local del deposito:</e0> clicca con le dextero sur le plica checkout local e selige <g1>TortoiseSVN > Add.</g1> In le fenestra de dialogo que se displica, lassa omne optiones ut jam arrangiate e clicca<g2> OK</g2>.
<e0>administrator: </e0>the person responsible for the creation and maintaining of the repository, i.e. taking care of the server side of the task.
<e0>administrator: </e0>le persona responsabile del creation e del mantenimento del deposito, id es le cura del labor del latere del server.
<e0>checkout:</e0> the operation that creates a working copy from the repository to your local computer.
<e0>discarga (checkout):</e0> le operation que crea un copia functionante ex le deposito in tu computator local.
<e0>commit local changes to the server: </e0>right-click on the local checkout folder and select <g1>SVN Commit....</g1> The Commit window - see below opens.
<e0>commit le cambios local al server: </e0>clicca con le dextero sur le plica del checkout local e selige <g1>SVN Commit....</g1> Le fenestra de Commit - se displica, vide in sequito.
<e0>commit: </e0>once a new local version of the checked-out material is ready, it can be committed to the repository and thus made available to the rest of the team.
<e0>consigna (commit): </e0>un vice que un nove version local del material discargate es preste, on pote lo consignar al deposito e assi lo render disponibile al resto del equipa
<e0>in le fonte: </e0>cerca in le segmentos fonte
<e0>in le traductiones: </e0>cerca in le segmentos final
<e0>repository: </e0>the place where the shared material is saved and maintained, either on a local access network or in Internet.
<e0>deposito: </e0>le posto ubi le material in commun es salvate e mantenite, sia sur un rete a accesso local sia in interrete.
<e0>search TMs</e0>: translation memories in the <f1>tm</f1> folder are included in the search.
<e0>recerca TMs</e0>: le memorias de traduction in le plica <f1>tm</f1> son includite in le recerca.
<e0>several projects on the same subject: </e0>keep the project structure, and change source and target folders (Source = source/order1, target = target/order1 etc).
<e0>plure projectos sur le mesme subjecto: </e0>retene le structura del projecto, e cambia plicas fonte e destination (Fonte = source/order1, destination = target/order1 etc).
<e0>several translators working on the same project:</e0> split the source files into source/Alice, source/Bob... and allocate them to team members (Alice, Bob ...).
<e0>plure traductores laborante sur le mesme projecto:</e0> finde le files fonte in source/Alice, source/Bob... e ubica los a membros del equipa (Alice, Bob ...).
<e0>update local files from the local repository copy</e0> - the changes received from the server repository reside within the .svn subfolder but not yet in the files and folders themselves.
<e0>renova le files local ex le copia local del deposito</e0> - le cambios recipite del deposito del server demora intra le sub plica .svn ma non ancora in le files e plicas ipse.
<e0>user</e0>: a member of the team, collaborating on the common project.
<e0>usator</e0>: un membro del equipa, que collabora sur le projecto commun.

<f0>HTML es generalmente multo tolerante del tags corrupte o mancante; le resultato es probabilemente un file que on potera aperir malgrado toto, ma con resultatos de formato inopinate o non desiderate.
<f0>Important:</f0> the purpose of this introduction to OmegaT is to acquaint you with the basic concepts of translation memory software.
<f0>Importante:</f0> le fin de iste introduction a OmegaT es de poner te al currente con le conceptos basic del software re le memorias de traduction.

<u0>Apertium</u0> is a free/open-source machine translation platform, initially aimed at related-language pairs, like CA, ES, GA, PT, OC and FR but recently expanded to deal with more divergent language pairs (such as English-Catalan).

<u0>Apertium</u0> es un platteforma de traductor automatic gratuite, open source, finalisate initialmente a pares de linguas relative, como CA, ES, GA, PT, OC e FR ma in le ultime tempore expandite pro tractar con plus pares de linguas divergente (assi como anglese-catalano).
<u0>Belazar</u0> is a Machine language translation tool for the Russian-Belarusian language pair.
<u0>Belazar</u0> es un application pro le traduction automatic pro le par del lingua russo-bielorusso.

<u0>LanguageTool</u0> is an Open Source style and grammar proofreading software for English, French, German, Polish, Dutch, Romanian, and a number of other languages - see the <u1>list of supported languages</u1>.

<u0>LanguageTool</u0> es un software open source, corrector de stilo e grammatica pro anglese, francese, germano, polaco, nederlandese, romaniano, e plure altere linguas - vide le <u1>lista del linguas supportate</u1>.
<u1>Microsoft Terminology Collection</u1> <i2/> can be downloaded in nearly 100 languages and can serve as a cornerstone IT glossary.
On pote discargar le <u1>Collection de terminologia Microsoft</u1> <i2/> in quasi 100 linguas e pote servir como le glossario petra angular del technologia informatic (IT).
A "project" is usually synonymous with a translation job.
Un "projecto" es de costume synonyme de un labor de traduction.

A CAT tool, as the term is generally used by translators, refers to a software program that creates a "translation memory" (TM) of a translated document, which can then be used to facilitate the translation of future documents that have significant similarity to the first.

Un instrumento CAT, como le termino es generalmente utilisate ab le traductores, se refere a un programma que crea, ex un documento rendite, un "memoria de traduction" (TM) que pote deinde servir pro facilitar le traduction de futur documentos con significative similaritate con le textos primari
A batch file, used to launch <a0>OmegaT</a0> from the Windows command line.
Un file batch, usate pro lancear <a0>OmegaT</a0> a partir del linea de commando de Windows.
A command line window is also referred to as a "terminal window".
Un fenestra de linea de commando es alsi referite como "fenestra terminal".
A comprehensive suite of utilities for preparing files for translation in a CAT tool.
Un comprehensive suite de utilitates pro preparar le files al traduction in un instrumento CAT.
A copy of the changed filters configuration will be stored with the project.
Un copia del configuration del filtros cambiate essera immagazinate con le projecto.
A copy of the filters configuration will be stored with the project in this case.
In iste caso un copia del configuration del filtros essera immagazinate con le projecto.
A dialog opens, allowing you to enter the source term, target term and any comments you may have:
Se displica un fenestra de dialogo, que permitte te de inscriber le termino original, le termino final e omne le commentos que tu vole:
A given source segment may require several different translations, depending on the context.
Un date segmento fonte pote requirer plure traductiones differente, dependente del contexto.
A glossary function allows the user to enter source words and their translations into a file which can be accessed while translating.
Un function glossario permitte al usator de entrar parolas primari e lor traductiones in un file accessibile durante le traduction.
A good starting point will always be the existing rules.
Un bon puncto de initio essera semper le regulas existente.
A list of possible arguments is given below.
Un lista de argumentos possibile is fornite in basso.
A more comprehensive User's Manual can be called up with the "Help" menu item or F1.
Un manual del usator plus comprensive pote esser evocate con le item del menu "Adjuta" o con F1.
A new version of the master TM is then created, either to be put in team members' <e3>tm/auto</e3>subfolders or to replace their <f4>project_save.tmx</f4> files.
Es alora create un nove version del TM maestro, o pro ser placiate in le sub plicas <e3>tm/auto</e3> del membros del equipa o pro reimplaciar lor files <f4>project_save.tmx</f4>.
A note is just a comment regarding this set of source text and translation.
Un note es solmente un commento re iste collection de texto primari e traduction
A number of interactive tools are available to develop and test regular expressions.
Plure instrumentos interactive son disponibile pro disveloppar e essayar le expressiones regular.
A number of rule sets are provided while additional rules can be defined by the user, as described in this chapter.
Plure collectiones de regulas es fornite dum additional regulas pote esser definite ab le usuario, como describe iste capitulo.
A project's tmx will be upgraded only once, and will be written in upgraded form into the <f0>project-save.tmx</f0>; legacy tmx files will be upgraded on the fly each time the project is loaded.

Un TMX del projecto essera promovite sol un vice, e essera scripte in forma promovite in le <f0>project-save.tmx</f0>; le files TMX hereditage essera promovite al volo cata vece le projecto es cargate.
A pseudo-translated memory can be generated with the following command line parameters:
Un memoria pseudo-rendite pote esser generate con le parametros de linea de commando sequente:
A relatively detailed list of modifications between this version and the preceding versions.
Un lista del modificationes relativemente detaliate inter iste version e le versiones precedente.
A search function scans previously translated material (either in the present document or in a translation memory), so that the user can see how a word or phrase was previously translated.

Un function de recerca scruta le textos rendite anteriormente (sia in le documento actual, sia in le eventual memorias de traduction importate ex precedente traductiones), de maniera que le usator pote vider como un parola o un phrase esseva rendite anteriormente.
A segment normally corresponds to one sentence.
Un segmento normalmente corresponde a un phrase.
A segmentation function displays one "segment" of source text at a time (usually a sentence), and the translation is done with the source text on the screen next to the target text.
Un function de segmentation expone un "segmento" del texto primari a un vice (de costume un phrase), e le traduction es rendite con le texto primari sur le schermo juxta le texto final.
A source sentence might look like:
Un phrase primari poterea parer como:
A stemmer for English, for example, should identify the string "cats" (and possibly "catlike", "catty" etc.) as based on the root "cat", and "stemmer", "stemming", "stemmed" as based on "stem".

Un cercator de radice pro le anglese, per exemplo, deberea identificar le linea "cats" (e possibilemente "catlike", "catty" etc.) como basate super le radice "cat", e "stemmer", "stemming", "stemmed" como basate super "stem".
A stemming algorithm reduces the words "fishing", "fished", "fish", and "fisher" to the root word, "fish".
Un algorithmo de cerca del radice reduce le parolas "fishing", "fished", "fish", e "fisher" al radice, "fish".
A text file containing two lines:
Un file texto continente duo lineas:
A translation project <e0>Example_Project</e0> created with the default settings will be created as a new subfolder with the following structure:
Un projecto de traduction <e0>Example_Project</e0> con le preparationes base essera create como nove sub plica con le structura sequente:
A translation unit comprises at least two translation unit variants (TUV).
Un unitate de traduction include al minus duo variantes de unitate de traduction (TUV).
Acceptance Not Required for Having Copies.
Acceptance Not Required for Having Copies.
Add or rewrite encoding declaration in HTML and XHTML files:
Adde o rescribe le declaration de codification in le files HTML e XHTML:
Adding <a0>OmegaT</a0> to your menus (KDE) or panels (Gnome)
Adder <a0>OmegaT</a0> al menus (KDE) o al pannellos (Gnome)
Additional parameter is required in this case, specifying the location of the target data:
Un parametro additional necessita in iste caso, specificante le ubication del datos final:
Additional variants are available for variables ${nameOnly} and ${Extension}.
Altere variantes son disponibile pro le variabiles ${nameOnly} e ${Extension}.
Additional windows are available, as well as dialogs, used to change OmegaT project settings.
Additional fenestras es disponibile, como dialogos, usate pro cambiar le preparationes del projecto OmegaT.
Advanced users can obtain more information on the arguments by typing <e0>man java</e0> in the terminal window.
Le usatores experte pote obtener plus information sur le argumentos scribente <e0>man java</e0> in le fenestra terminal.
After checking your translation, check that you have not damaged any tags during the translation process: Tools > Validate Tags.
Post controlate tu traduction, que tu controla que tu non ha damnificate ulle tags durante le processo de traduction: Instrumentos > Valida Tags.

After copying the required files into the checkout folder you will notice that its icon has changed: the green OK badge has changed to a red exclamation sign, signifying the change in the local copy of the repository.
Post copiate le files necessari in le plica checkout tu remarcara que su icone cambiava: le placa OK verde cambiava a un signo de exclamation rubre, marca del cambio in le copia local del deposito.
After downloading OmegaT (Windows version), launch the .exe file and follow the on-screen instructions, which should be self-explanatory.
Postquam tu ha discargate OmegaT (version pro Windows), que tu lancea le file .exe e que tu seque le instructiones sur-schermo, le quales essera auto-explicative.
After launching OmegaT, the main OmegaT window should appear with three panes: the Editing pane, the Fuzzy Matches pane, and the Glossary pane.

Postquam tu ha ponite in marcha OmegaT, le fenestra principal de OmegaT deberea apparer con tres quadros: le quadro de Modifica (pro Editar), le quadro pro le Concordantias Partial (fuzzy), e le quadro pro le Glossario.
After revising the text and making any corrections, create the translated documents again and close the project.
Postquam tu ha revidite le texto e tu lo ha correcte, crea de nove le documentos rendite e claude le projecto.
After the initial installation you can, of course, also use <e5><a6>OmegaT</a6>.jnlp</e5> also when you are offline.
Post le installation initial tu pote, naturalmente, alsi usar <e5><a6>OmegaT</a6>.jnlp</e5> alsi quando tu es off-line.
After the source files have loaded in the <g3>Editor</g3> pane, you can close the <g4>Project Files</g4> dialog.
Postquam le files original ha cargate in le quadro del <g3>Editor</g3>, tu pote clauder le fenestra de dialogo <g4>Files del Projecto</g4>.
After you give your project a name, the <g0>Create New Project</g0> dialog will open.
Postquam tu ha denominate tu projecto, se displicara le fenestra de dialogo <g0>Crea un Nove Projecto</g0>.
After you have translated each segment, press <k0>Ctrl+U</k0> to move to the next untranslated segment (or <k1>Ctrl+Shift+U</k1> to move to the next translated segment).
Postquam tu ha rendite cata segmento, pressa <k0>Ctrl+U </k0> pro mover al segmento sequente nondum rendite (o <k1>Ctrl+Shift+U </k1>pro mover al sequente segmento rendite).
Again note that the backslash is escaped as well.
Nota novemente que le barra reverse es assi como escappate.
All HTML files will be translated - note that the period in the usual *.html has to be escaped (\.) as specified by the rules for regular expressions
Omne le files HTML essera traducite - Nota que le periodo in le *.html usual debe esser escappate (\.) assi como specificate ab le regulas pro le expressiones regular.

All existing Java class libraries can be used unchanged and without special setup; at the same time, a Java programmer can opt to just use the Rexx class from the runtime package for improved string handling in Java syntax source programs.

Omne existente librerias de classe Java pote esser usate sin alteration e sin special preparation; al mesme tempore, un programmator Java pote optar pro usar programmas fonte in syntaxe Java, solmente le classes Rexx ex le pacchetto runtime, pro un tractamento del fila de character meliorate.
All files selected for translation in this tutorial are from Wikipedia; some projects comprise more than one file, to familiarize you with OmegaT's usefulness for such structured documents.
omne le files seligite pro le traduction in iste parve instruction es ex Wikipedia; alicun projectos comprende plure files, pro familiarisar te con utilitate de OmegaT pro tal documentos structurate.
All of OmegaT's functions are available through the menu bar at the top of the Editor window.
Omne le functiones de OmegaT es disponibile per le barra del menu a le summitate del fenestra del editor.
Omne le altere characteres representa se ipse.
All the languages have access to the OmegaT object model, with the project as the top object.
Omne le linguas ha accesso al modello a objectos OmegaT, con le projecto como le objecto culmine.
All the relevant tags in the source - i.e. OmegaT as well as custom, Java, printf etc tags - will be inserted into the current target, regardless of whether they are already there or not.
Omne le tags pertinente in le fonte - id es OmegaT assi como tags personal, Java, printf etc. - essera inserite in le destination actual, sin reguardo si illos son jam illac o non.
All the user manual files can be found in this folder.
Omne le files del manual del usator pote esser trovate in iste plica.
All translations from source documents are also displayed in the Comment pane, in addition to the Match pane.
Omne le traductiones ex le documentos fonte son alsi monstrate in le quadro del Commento, in ultra al quadro del Concordantia.
Allow the translation to be equal to source
Permitte al traduction de esser equal al original
Allow translated tags to be in a different order
Permitte que le tags rendite es in un ordine differente
Allows the user create an entry in the default glossary file.
permitte al usator de crear un entrata in le file glossario base.
Allows the user decide, how tags in foreign TMX files (i.e. not generated by OmegaT) are to be treated.
Permitte le usator de resolver, como le tags in le files TMX estranie (id es non generate per OmegaT) debe esser tractate.
Allows the user select the interval - in minutes and seconds - between consecutive automatic saves of the project.
Permitte le usator de seliger le intervallo - in minutas e secundos - inter salvamentos automatic consecutive del projecto.
Allows to view, add, remove or edit a note in the active segment.
Permitte de vider, adder, remover o editar un nota in le segmento active.

Allows you to activate/deactivate <e0>TransTips </e0>feature and set its option<e1> Exact Match.</e1> With <e2>TransTips</e2> activated a right click on a highlighted word in the source will open a pop up menu with the glossary entries for the word you clicked.

Permitte te de activar/disactivar le characteristica <e0>TransTips </e0>e fixar su option<e1> Concordantia Exacte.</e1> Con <e2>TransTips</e2> activate un clic dextre sur un parola marcate in le fonte aperira un menu con le entratas del glossario por le parola que tu ha cliccate.
Allows you to activate/deactivate the Machine Translation tools offered.
permitte te a activar/disactivar le instrumentos de Traduction Automatic offerite.
Also <f3>ignored_words.txt</f3> and <f4>learned_words.txt</f4> in the <f5>omegat</f5> folder may be worth sharing and maintaining on the team level.
Etiam <f3>ignored_words.txt</f3> e <f4>learned_words.txt</f4> in le plica <f5>omegat</f5> poter esser conveniente participar e mantener al nivello del equipa.
Also add information on how to contact you by electronic and paper mail.
Also add information on how to contact you by electronic and paper mail.
Alsi permitte le commandos externe per-projecto
Also check that the target language code of your project against the available vocabularies in the setup window.
Controla anque que le codice del lingua final de tu projecto contra le vocabularios disponibile in le fenestra de preparation.
Also supported is the CSV format.
Alsi supportate es le formato CSV.
Alternate locations for some of the folders can be chosen at project creation or during the translation.
On pote seliger locationes alternative pro alicun del plicas al creation del projecto o durante le traduction.
Alternativemente, clicca duo vices sur le file
Alternatively, to avoid this issue you can set a private SVN server, for example if you already have an Apache server that includes the software in question (e.g. VisualSVN).
Alias, pro evitar iste question tu pote preparar un server SVN private, per exemplo si tu ja ha un server Apache que include le software in question (per exemplo VisualSVN).
Alternatives include a Linux .tar package, a Windows installer – with or without a Java Runtime Environment –, a Mac OS X installer, and a source code package for developers.
Le alternativas comprende un pacchetto .tar Linux, un installator Windows – con o sin un Java Runtime Environment (JRE) –, un installator Mac OS X, e un pacchetto codice fonte pro le disveloppatores.

Although it might seem strange to want to translate TMX files (the usual reason for creating a file filter), the addition of a TMX filter has the interesting effect that it enables TMX files in any location to be searched for from within any OmegaT project using the "Search Files" function, something not possible in the standard OmegaT build.

Ben que on poterea parer singular voler traducer le files TMX (le ration consuete pro crear un filtro de file), le addition de un filtro TMX ha Le interessante effecto que illo habilita le files TMX in omne location e esser cercate ab intra omne projecto OmegaT usante le function "Cerca files", alique non possibile in le compilation OmegaT standard.
An <a0>OmegaT</a0> translation project consists of a number of files and folders.
Un projecto de traduction <a0>OmegaT</a0> consiste de plure files e plicas.

An advantage probably common to all translation memory applications is that they simplify checking: once you have completed the first draft of your translation, you can "walk" through it with the source and target versions of each sentence displayed next to each other.

un avantage probabilemente commun a omne le applicationes de memoria de traduction es que illos simplifica le controlo: un vice que tu ha completate le prime minuta de tu traduction, tu pote "ambular" a transverso de illo con le version fonte e lo final de cata phrase exponite le un proxime al altere.
An area for setting project folders
Un area pro le preparation del plicas del projecto
An area for setting project source and target languages
Un area pro prefixar le linguas fonte e destination del projecto
An empty line will appear at the bottom of the upper table (you may have to scroll down to see it).
Un linea vacue apparera al fundo del tabella superior (tu pote deber rolar in basso pro vider lo).
An error occurred while trying to create a new folder
Un error occurreva durante le tentativa de crear un nove classificator

An example is to create a “dictionaries” folder in your Program Files (Start > My Computer > <s0/>Local Disk (C:) > Program Files > right click > New Folder, name it “dictionaries.”) Then from the OmegaT menu, click Options > Spell checking.

Un exemplo es crear un classificator denominate “dictionarios” in tu "Programmas" (Initio > Ressources del Computer > <s0/>Disco Local (C:) > Programmas > clicca al derecta > Nove Classificator, que tu lo denomina “dictionarios.”) Alora ab le menu de OmegaT, clicca Optiones > Controlo orthographic.
An example would be a software project, with GUI localized in a number of languages.
Un exemplo esserea un projecto software, con un GUI localisate in plure linguas.
An extra command line parameter specific to console mode: <l0>--quiet.</l0> In the quiet mode, less info is logged to the screen.
Un parametro extra pro linea de commando specific al modo consola: <l0>--quiet.</l0> In le modo quiete, minus informationes es registrate verso le schermo.
An extra command line parameter specific to console mode: <l0>--quiet</l0>.
Un altere parametro extra de linea de commando specific pro modo consola: <l0>--quiet</l0>.
An intelligent command-line alignment tool for producing translation memory files from legacy texts and their translations.
Un instrumento de alineamento intelligente a linea de commando pro le production de files memoria de traduction ex precedente textos e lor traductiones.
An online dictionary management tool that integrates with Omegat.
Un instrumento de gestion de dictionarios in interrete que se integra con Omegat.
An xml file with all the GUI accessible option settings
Un file xml con omne le preparationes del option accessibile per Interfacie Graphic del Usator (Graphical User Interface - GUI)
And get a feel of what is going on in the OmegaT world...
E senti lo que va in le mundo de OmegaT...
And of course, if you wish to be on the safe side, consider converting this kind of file to Unicode, i.e. to the <l6>.utf8 </l6>file format.
E naturalmente, si tu vole trovar te sur le latere secur, considera converter iste genere de file a Unicode, id es al formato de file <l6>.utf8 </l6>.
And subscribe to the translators' list:
E abona te al lista del traductores:
Another extra command line parameter specific to console mode: <l0>--tag-validation=[abort|warn].</l0> When this parameter is added, tag validation is done prior to translation/aligning.

Un altere parametro extra de linea de commando specific pro modo consola: <l0>--tag-validation=[abort|warn].</l0> Quando es addite iste parametro, le validation del tag es facite ante que le traduction/alineamento.
Another extra command line parameter specific to console mode: <l0>--tag-validation=[abort|warn]</l0>.
Un altere parametro extra de linea de commando specific pro modo consola: <l0>--tag-validation=[abort|warn]</l0>.
Any character except a, b, or c (negation)
Cata character extra a, b, o c (negation)
Any text, already translated and stored in those files, will appear among the fuzzy matches, if it is sufficiently similar to the text currently being translated.
Omne le textos, jam rendite e registrate in ille files, apparera inter le concordantias partial, si illo es satis simile al texto actualmente a render.
Anything after the "//" will be ignored.
Alicun cosa post le "//" essera ignorate.

Apertium uses a shallow-transfer machine translation engine which processes the input text in stages, as in an assembly line: de-formatting, morphological analysis, part-of-speech disambiguation, shallow structural transfer, lexical transfer, morphological generation, and re-formatting.

Apertium usa un machina automatic a traduction superficial le qual processa le texto fonte in stages, como in un linea de montage: de-formattation, analyse morphologic, disambiguation del parte del discurso, traduction structural superficial, traduction lexical, generation morphologic, e re-formattation.
Application files: These are included in the package you download.
Files del application: iste es includite in le pacchetto que tu ha discargate.
Appropriate Legal Notices; however, if the Program has interactive
Appropriate Legal Notices; however, if the Program has interactive
Are you sure you want to fix all tags automatically?
Es tu secur que tu vole reparar omne le tags automaticamente?
Are you sure you want to remove the {0} set of segmentation rules?
Es tu secur que tu vole remover le gruppo de regulas de segmentation {0} ?
Arguments are added after the initial <e0>"java"</e0>, and before the <e1>"-jar <a2>OmegaT</a2>.jar"</e1>.
Le argumentos es addite post le initial <e0>"java"</e0>, e ante le <e1>"-jar <a2>OmegaT</a2>.jar"</e1>.
Arguments can be combined: to launch <a0>OmegaT</a0> with all the examples described above, the command would be:
Le argumentos pote esser combinate: pro lancear <a0>OmegaT</a0> con tote le exemplos describite precedentemente, le commando esserea:
Le matrices non debe esser nulle
As <a0>OmegaT</a0> handles identical segments as one single entity, only the first unique segment is shown.
A mesura que <a0>OmegaT</a0> tracta segmentos identic como un entitate singule, sol le prime segmento unic es monstrate.
As a general rule for the purpose of this tutorial, assume that if something is visible in your browser, it should be translated.<br0/>
Como regula general pro le fin de iste parve instruction, presume que si alicun cosa es visibile in tu lector del tela, illo deberea esser rendite.<br0/>
As a result of this, all settings will be at their defaults, due to which you may experience unexpected, but correct behaviour.
Ergo, omne preparationes essera al lor preparation initial e tu pote haber experientia de un comportamento inopinate, ma correcte.

As far as categories are concerned, the de facto industry standard of classifying matches into the following groups is used: Repetitions, Exact match, 95%-100%, 85%-94%, 75%-84%, 50%-74% and No match.

Re quanto concerne le categorias, es usate le standard del industria re le classification del concordantias in le gruppos sequente: Repetitiones, Concorda exacte, 95%-100%, 85%-94%, 75%-84%, 50%-74% e Nulle concordantia.

As opposed to user-generated translation memories (as in the case of <a0>OmegaT</a0>) Machine translation (MT) tools use rule-based linguistic tools to create a translation of the source segment without the need for a translation memory.

Al contrario del memorias de traduction generate per le usator (como in le caso de <a0>OmegaT</a0>) le applicationes de Traduction Automatic usa instrumentos linguistic basate sur regulas pro crear un traduction del segmento fonte sin le necessitate de un memoria de traduction.
As stated above, OmegaT tags are LTR strings.
Como constatate precedentemente, le tags OmegaT son lineas LTR.
As the existing content will not be touched, damage to an existing file would be limited.
Como le contento existente non essera alterate, eventual damnos a un file existente deberea esser limitate.
As this is the standard behavior for PO files, it is on by default.
Pois que isto es le comportamento standard pro files PO, il es active per arrangiamento base.
As with the glossary function, you can use keyboard shortcuts to copy and paste content from the Text Search window into the active translation segment.
Como con le function glossario, tu pote usar le vias breve ab le claviero pro copiar e collar le contento ab le fenestra Cerca Texto in le segmento de traduction active.
As you translate your files, <a0>OmegaT</a0> stores your work continually in <f1>project_save.tmx</f1> in the project's /<f2>omegat</f2> subfolder.
Quando tu rende tu files, <a0>OmegaT</a0> registra tu labor a omne instante in <f1>project_save.tmx</f1> in le sub plica del projecto /<f2>omegat</f2>.
At the beginning of the installation you can select the language to be used during the installation.
Al initio del installation tu pote seliger le lingua a utilisar per le installation.
At the end of your translation, OmegaT exports three translation memories called <f0>level1</f0>, <f1>level2</f1> and <f2>omegat</f2> to your project folder.
Al fin de tu traduction, OmegaT exporta tres memorias de traduction appellate <f0>level1</f0>, <f1>level2</f1>e <f2>omegat</f2> in tu plica del projecto
At the same time, it can use memories files from previous translations for reference.
In le mesme tempore, il pote usar le files memorias ex previe traductiones pro referentia.
At the time of writing the list includes more than 50 languages, from Albanian to Yiddish, including of course all the major languages.
Al tempore de scriptura le lista include plus que 50 linguas, ab le albanese al judeogermano, includite naturalmente omne le linguas major.
At the time of writing, OmegaT supports the following formatted text formats:
Al tempore del scriptura, OmegaT supporta le textos formattate in le sequente formatos
At the top of that dialog, select your source file's language and the language that your translated file will be, and click <g1>OK</g1> to continue.
A le summitate de iste dialogo, selige le lingua de tu file original e le lingua pro tu file rendite, e clicca <g1>OK</g1> pro continuar.
Attempt to convert &numbers when inserting a fuzzy match
Tenta de converter le &numeros quando insere un concordantia partial
Attempt to convert numbers when inserting a fuzzy match
Tenta de converter le numeros quando on insere un concordantia partial
Connexion disponibile, le projecto es in modo projecto de equipa.
Auto reimplacia 'nplurals=INTEGER; plural=EXPRESSION;' in le testa
Alineator automatic pro le proprietates de Java
Automating modifications of the translated document file names by replacing translatable contents with its translation.
Automatisar le modificationes del nomines del file del documento rendite per reimplaciamento del contentos traducibile con lor traduction.

Avoid in any case adding <f6>bak</f6> files, <f7>project_stats.txt</f7> and <f8>project_stats_match.txt</f8>, in the <f9>omegat</f9> subfolder, as they would without any need or profit just bloat the repository.

Evitar in omne caso de adder files <f6>bak</f6>, <f7>project_stats.txt</f7> e <f8>project_stats_match.txt</f8>, in le sub plica <f9>omegat</f9>, pois que facerea los sin alicun necessitate ni profito justo infla le deposito.
Back-ups of the project translation memory are produced regularly (see next chapter), and <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> is also saved/updated when the project is closed or loaded again.

Copias de reserva del memoria de traduction del projecto es producite regularmente (vide le capitulo successive), e <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> es alsi salvate/renovate quando le projecto es clause o cargate de nove.
Backups of this file (with extension bak) are added progressively to this subfolder, first at the beginning of the translation session, at its end, and while the translation progresses.
Copias de reserva de iste file (con extension bak) es addite progressivemente a iste sub plica, in prime loco al initio del session de traduction, a su fin, e durante que le traduction progrede.

Bartender yells loud:

Your page cannot be found, boy

Buy another drink.

Le servitor del bar crita alte:

Tu pagina non pote esser trovate, garson

Compra un altere biber.
Be warned that the documentation may be a little out of date, owing to the pace at which OmegaT is being developed.
Que tu es admonite que le documentation pote esser un pauco foras de data, debite a le velocitate a le qual OmegaT se disveloppa.
Bear in mind that changing the languages may render the currently used translation memories useless since their language pair may not longer match the new languages.
Rememorar te que cambiar le linguas pote render le memorias de traduction actualmente usate inutile pois que lor par de linguas pote non concordar plus longe le nove linguas.
Before beginning translating, you placed a glossary file in the <f0>/glossary</f0> folder.
Ante le initio del traduction, tu poneva un file glossario in le plica <f0>/glossary</f0>.
Before reporting a bug, make sure that you have thoroughly checked the
Ante que tu reporta un defecto,assecura te que tu ha verificate a fundo le
Before segments get translated, you may wish to pre-process them or address them in some other way than is possible with OmegaT.
Ante que le segmentos sia rendite, tu pote desirar pre-processar o adressar los in alicun altere maniera que es possibile con OmegaT.
Before the spell check function can be used, a suitable dictionary or dictionaries (i.e. for your target language) must be installed.
Ante que le corrector orthographic pote functionar, on debe installar un dictionarios convenibile (i.e. pro tu lingua final).
Being the language behind popular software such as Firefox it is a familiar and preferred programming tool in the open-source domain.
Pois que illo es le lingua de un software ultra popular como Firefox, illo es un instrumento de programmation familiar e ideal in le dominio del open-source.
Borrowing an example from Slovenian, here "good" in all possible grammatically correct forms:
Faciente se prestar un exemplo ex le sloveno, ci "bon" in omne possibile formas grammaticamente correcte:
Both search types support the wildcard characters * and ?.
Ambe le typos de cerca supporta le characteres generic * e ?.
Bug reports (in English), at the SourceForge site:
Reportos de defecto (in anglese), in le sito SourceForge:
Bugs, feature requests and documentation issues are handled on Sourceforge by the following tracking systems.
Le defectos, le demandas de characteristicas e le questiones re le documentation es tractate sur Sourceforge con le systemas de revision sequente.
By default, 512 MB are assigned, so there is no advantage in assigning less than this figure.
Per arrangiamento initial, 512 MB son assignate, assi il non ha beneficio assignar minus de iste cifra.
By default, the /tm folder is below the project's root folder (e.g. ...<e0>/MyProject/tm</e0>), but you can choose a different folder in the project properties dialog if you wish.

Per arrangiamento initial, le plica /tm es sub le plica radice del projecto (per exemplo ...<e0>/MyProject/tm</e0>), ma tu pote eliger un plica differente in le fenestra de dialogo Proprietates del projecto si tu desira.
By default, the source text is pasted into the target text segment for you.
Per le arrangiamento initial, le texto primari es collate pro te in le campo de modifica del segmento final.
By default, the translated file encoding is the same as the source file encoding.
Per arrangiamento base, le codification del file rendite es identic al codification del file fonte.
By deleting a tag group you will remove the related formatting from the translated file.
Cancellante un gruppo de tag tu removera le formattation pertinente ex le file rendite.
CAT tools allow for greater consistency of translation, including when more than one translator is working on a job.
Le instrumentos CAT permitte major consistentia de traduction, etsi plure traductores opera pro un projecto.
CAT tools range in price from free (OmegaT) to $2,500 or more.
Le instrumentos CAT rangia in un precio de gratis (OmegaT) a $2000 o major.

Changes the case of the highlighted text in the target segment to the selected option (Lower case, Upper case or Title case).

Le cambios a iste commando implica le addition de "argumentos" a illo.

Check if the selected service offers it.
Controla que le Servicio seligite offere lo.
Check in Options > Machine Translate, that Google Translate V2 is checked.

Check the changes to be made - i.e. the folders and files added in this case.
Controla le cambios a facer - id es le plicas e le files addite in iste caso.

controla le sito TTT pro le ultime lista del pares de linguas implementate.

Ctrl+F appella un fenestra de dialogo de recerca con le qual tu pote cercar pro alicun termino in omne partes del projecto, id es intra le texto primari e le files memoria de traduction hereditage, segmentos primari, e segmentos final (ma non files glossario).

Le datos exportate ex Trados MultiTerm pote esser usate como glossarios de <a0>OmegaT</a0> sin ulterior modification, a condition que on provide illos del extension <f1>.tab</f1> e le campos del termino original e final es le prime duo campos respectivemente.
Default is <l0>${filename}</l0>– full filename of the source file with extension: in this case the name of the translated file is the same as that of the source file.

Secundo le preferentias del comportamento del modifica, le campo pro le modifica del segmentos non rendite pote essere vacue , continer le texto original, o continer le traduction del linea de character maxime simile a uno a render.
Depending upon the segmenting rules, the pair of tags may get separated into two consecutive segments and the tag validation will err on the side of caution and mark the two segments.
Dependente sur le regulas de segmentation, le par de tags pote devenir separate in duo consecutive segmentos e le validation del tag errara a favor del caution e marca le duo segmentos.
Descriptions of and links to Samuel Murray's scripts/procedures.
Descriptiones e ligamines del scripts e proceduras ex Samuel Murray

Le Dictionarios es le equivalentes electronic de dictionarios imprimite como Merriam Webster, Duden, Larousse et cetera, que on pote haber sur su scriptorio.

If after looking at the fuzzy match you decide that it is useful, you can paste it into the active segment at any point (Ctrl+I), or replace (overwrite) the active segment with it completely (Ctrl+R) and then modify it, or copy and paste parts of it into the active segment (use the mouse to mark it, then Ctrl+C and Ctrl+V to copy and paste).

Si postquam ha querite al concordantia partial tu decide que illo es utile, tu pote lo collar in le segmento active in qualcunque puncto (Ctrl+I), o reimplaciar (super scriber) completemente le segmento active con illo (Ctrl+R) e deinde lo modificar, o copiar e collar partes de illo in le segmento active (usa le mouse pro lo marcar, deinde Ctrl+C e Ctrl+V pro lo copiar e collar).

If checked, non-breakable spaces in the segment will be displayed with a grey background.

If checked, the untranslated segments will be marked in violet.
Si marcate, le segmentos non rendite essera marcate in violetto.
If for a given source segment there is no entry for the selected target language, all other target segments are loaded, regardless of the language.
Si pro un date segmento fonte il ha nulle entrata pro le lingua de destination seligite, omne altere segmentos destination son cargate, sin reguardo del lingua.
If for example the original file is named Document.xx.docx, the following variables will give the following results:
Si per exemplo le file original es denominate Document.xx.docx, le variabiles sequente dara le resultatos sequente:
If for some reason these files are lost or corrupted, simply download and/or reinstall OmegaT to restore them all.
Si pro qualque ration iste files son perdite o corrupte, discarga vel reinstalla simplemente OmegaT pro restaurar illos tote.
If given, <a2>OmegaT</a2> launches in console mode and translates the given project.
Si date, <a2>OmegaT</a2> lancea in modo consola e traduce le projecto date.
If given, <a2>OmegaT</a2> starts in console mode and will translate the given project.
Si date, <a2>OmegaT</a2> initia in modo consola e traducera le projecto date.
If in doubt, don't hesitate to ask project members directly either by sending them an e-mail from the SourceForge page or by sending a public mail to the user group.
If in doubt, don't hesitate to ask project members directly either by sending them an e-mail from the SourceForge page or by sending a public mail to the user group.
If it is <e0>tar.bz</e0>, you have forgotten to unpack (untar) it.
Si illo es <e0>tar.bz</e0>, tu ha oblidate a discassar (untar) lo.
If it is clear from the very start, that translations in a given TM (or TMs) are all correct, one can put them into the<e0> tm/auto</e0> folder and avoid confirming a lot of<e1> [fuzzy]</e1> cases.
Si illo es clar a partir del initio, que le traductiones in certe TMs es omne correcte, on pote mitter los in le plica <e0> tm/auto</e0> e evitar de confirmar multe casos<e1> [fuzzy]</e1>.
If languages match but not the country, the segments still get loaded.
Si le linguas concorda me non le pais, le segmentos ancora es cargate.
If later access to the desired location is granted that location will be used and all settings will return to their defaults as a result of the location change.
Essera usate in vice le classificator currente.
If necessary, edit the file names of the dictionary or change your project's language settings.
Si necessari, edita le nomines del file del dictionario o cambia tu preparationes pro le lingua de tu projecto.
If neither the language code not the country code match, the segments will be ignored.
Si ni le codice lingua ni le codice pais concorda, le segmentos essera ignorate.
If no text has been selected, the current source segment is written to this file.
Si non era seligite nulle texto, le segmento fonte actual es scripte in iste file.
If no text is selected, <a1>OmegaT</a1> selects the word that contains the letter immediately to the right of the cursor.
Si nulle texto es seligite, <a1>OmegaT</a1> selige le parola que contine le littera immediatemente al derecta del cursor.
If not checked, source segments will not be shown.
Si non marcate, le segmentos fonte non essera monstrate.
If not given, <a2>OmegaT</a2> reverts to default values (<a3>OmegaT</a3> folder under user home or, if unavailable, the current working folder).
Si non date, <a2>OmegaT</a2> reveni al plica del valores de preparation base (<a3>OmegaT</a3> sub home del usator o, si indisponibile, le plica de labor actual).
If not specified, OmegaT reverts to default values (the OmegaT folder in the user home folder, or if not available: the current working folder).
Si non specificate, OmegaT reveni al plica del valores prefixate initial (le plica OmegaT in le plica domo del usator o, si indisponibile: le plica de labor actual).
If on, when a PO segment (which may be a whole paragraph) is not translated, the translation will be empty in the target file.
Si active, quando un segmento PO (le qual pote esser un paragrapho integre) non es rendite, le traduction essera vacue in le file de destination.
If one does not wish to use external TMs for counting, one will either have to empty the /tm folder or change the project setup (temporarily) so that the value for /tm points to a different location.

Si on non desidera usar TMs externe pro le computo, on habera o vacuar le plica /tm o cambiar le preparation del projecto (temporaneemente) de maniera que le valor pro /tm puncta a un position differente.
If only one file is present, check its extension.
Si es presente sol un file, controla su extension.
If part of the target segment has been selected, this function overwrites the selected portion.
Si esseva seligite parte del segmento, iste function superscribe le portion seligite.
If spell checking is activated, spelling mistakes and typos are recognized and can be corrected during translation.
Si es activate le controlo orthographic, le errores orthographic e le lapsus es identificate e marcate pro esser correcte durante le traduction.
If the Auto-propagation check box is not checked, the segments with alternative translations are left untranslated until the user has decided which translation is to be used.
Si le quadrato de controlo Auto-propagation non es marcate, le segmentos con traductiones alternative son lassate non rendite dum le usator decide qual traduction ser usate.
If the Editing pane is empty, the language of your Windows installation is probably not English and OmegaT does not have an Instant Start tutorial in your language.
Si le quadro de Modifica es vacue, le idioma de tu installation Windows non es probabilemente anglese e OmegaT non ha le parve instruction pro le comenciamento instantanee in tu lingua.
If the client requires MS Office format, simply save the target file in OpenOffice.org in the relevant MS format (.doc, etc.)
Si le cliente necessita le formato MS Office, salva simplemente le file final con OpenOffice.org in le pertinente formato MS (.doc, etc.)
If the current segment is the first one in a file, it moves to the last segment of the previous file.
Si le segmento currente es le ultime segmento in un file, illo move al prime segmento del file previe.
If the current segment is the last segment in a file, it moves to the first segment of the next file.
Si le segmento currente es le ultime segmento in un file, illo move al prime segmento del file successive.
If the current translation of the segment does not fit, the user can select <g0>Edit → Create Alternative Translation</g0>.
Si le traduction currente del segmento non conveni, le usator pote seliger <g0>Modifica → Crea Traduction Alternative</g0>.
If the file already exists, no attempt is done to verify the format or the character set of the file: the new entries will always be in tab-separated format and UTF-8.
Si le file existe jam, nulle tentativa es facite pro verificar le formato o le serie de character del file: le nove entratas essera semper in formato 'separate per signos de tabulation' e UTF-8.

If the files to be translated are parts of a tree structure (as in a website), you need only specify the top-level subfolder and OmegaT will maintain the entire contents, while keeping the tree structure intact.

Si le files a traducer son partes de un structura a arbore (como in un sito TTT), tu necessita sol specificar le sub plica de maxime nivello e OmegaT mantenera le contentos integre, dum tene intacte le structura a arbore.
If the filter has any options, you may change them by clicking Options.
Si Le filtro ha alicun optiones, tu pote mutar los cliccante Optiones.
If the language of the user's system is not available, <a6>OmegaT</a6> defaults to English.
Si le lingua del systema del usator non es disponibile, <a6>OmegaT</a6> adopta le preparationes initial in anglese.
If the language of your source text isn't listed, pick a language that is, double-click on the Language Name field, and change it to the abbreviation for your language.
Si le lingua de tu texto fontal non es listate, que tu selige un altere idioma que es listate, que tu clicca duo vices sur le campo "Nomine del Lingua", e lo cambia in le abbreviation pro tu idioma.
If the option is off, the source text will be copied to the target segment.
Si le option es disactivate, le texto fonte essera copiate al segmento destination.
If the parameter is not specified, all files will be processed.
Si le parametros non es specificate, omne files essera processate.
If the project language codes and the tmx language codes fully match, the segments are loaded in memory.
Si le codices lingua projecto e le codices lingua tmx concorda in detalio, le segmentos son cargate in memoria.
If the source file is modified after you have begun translating, <a1>OmegaT</a1> may be unable to find a segment that you have already translated.
Si le file fonte es modificate postquam tu ha initiate a render, <a1>OmegaT</a1> pote esser incapace a trovar un segmento que tu jam habeva rendite.
If the source segment in one of the ancillary TMs is identical to the text being translated, OmegaT acts as defined in the <m0> <g1>Options</g1> <g2>Editing Behavior...</g2> </m0> dialog window.
Si le segmento original in uno del TMs auxiliar es identic al texto a render, OmegaT age ut definite in le fenestra de dialogo <m0> <g1>Optiones</g1> <g2>Comportamento del Modifica...</g2> </m0> .

If the spell checker is not working, then make sure first that the check box <g0>"Automatically check the spelling of text"</g0> in the spell checker dialog (<g1>Options > Spell checking...)</g1> is checked.

Si le corrector orthographic es non functionante, alora face secur in prime loco que le cassa de marca <g0>"Controla automaticamente le orthographia del texto"</g0> in le fenestra de dialogo del corrector orthographic (<g1>Optiones > correction orthographic...)</g1> es marcate.

If the translation for several identical source segments already exists in the translation memory of the project, these segments, together with other, already translated unique segments, will be classified as an "Exact match".

Si le traduction pro aliquot segmentos fonte identic jam existe in le memoria de traduction del projecto, iste segmentos, conjunctemente con altere, segmentos unic ja traducite, essera classificate ut un "Concordantia exacte".
If the value is <l1>abort</l1>, then on tag errors the errors are printed and the program stops.
Si le valor es <l1>abort</l1>, alora sur errores tag le errores son imprimite e le programma arresta se.
If the value is <l2>warn</l2> then the errors are printed but OmegaT continues.
Si le valor es <l2>warn</l2> alora le errores son imprimite, ma OmegaT continua.
If there are other files named test.html in other folders, they will be ignored.
Si il habe altere files nominate test.html in altere plicas, illos essera ignorate.
If there's no file name displayed, the source is the internal project translation memory.
Si il ha nulle nomine del file monstrate, le fonte es le memoria de traduction interne del projecto.
If there's nothing appearing in the Machine Translate pane, then check the following:
Si il ha nihil appare in le quadro Traduction Automatic, alora controla le sequente:
If there's several alternative translations available for the active segment, you can label the alternative selected as the default translation.
Si il ha plure traductiones alternative disponibile pro le segmento active, tu pote etiquettar le alternativa seligite ut le traduction prefixate.
If they are accidentally changed, the formatting of the final file may be corrupted.
Si illos es cambiate per accidente, le formattation del file final potera esser corrupte.
If they are used by some other application on your system, they will disappear from that application, too.
Si illos es usate ab alicun altere application sur tu systema, illos disparera alsi ab celle application.
If they do not conflict with system shortcuts, they should be available from within OmegaT.
Si illos non conflige con le vias breve de systema, illos deberea esser utilisabile inter OmegaT.
If this is not the case, open the main dialog by selecting<e0> Options → File Filters...</e0> from the main menu.
Si non es iste le caso, aperi le fenestra de dialogo principal per seliger<e0> Optiones → Filtros de File...</e0> ex le Menu Principal.
If this option is checked, when a fuzzy match is inserted, either manually or automatically, OmegaT attempts to convert the numbers in the fuzzy matches according to the source contents.
Si es marcate iste option, quando on insere un concordantia partial, o manualmente o automaticamente, OmegaT tenta de converter le numeros in le concordantia partial secundo le contentos original.
If used, neither the user's decision to accept the translation nor the final translation are made available to Google.
Si usate, ni le decision del usator a acceptar le traduction ni le traduction final son utilisabile per Google.

If we want to avoid any mis-translations in case of segments with several possible target contents, checking this check box will cause <e0> Go To Next Untranslated Segment</e0>stop on the next such segment, irrespective of whether it has already been translated or not.

In le caso de segmentos con plure possibile contentos, si nos vole evitar omne mis-traductiones, le signo de iste quadrato de controlo causara que le commando <e0> Va al segmento non rendite sequente</e0> arrestara sur le segmento sequente, sin respecto re illo esseva jam rendite o non.
If you add a prefix (for instance [fuzzy]), you can trace those translations later to see they are correct.
Si tu adde un prefixo (per exemplo [fuzzy]), tu pote calcar illos traductiones plus tarde pro vider si illos es correcte.
If you already have a version of OmegaT installed on your PC and wish to upgrade to a more recent version, you have two options:
Si tu ja ha un version de OmegaT installate in tu PC e desira lo promover a un version plus recente, tu ha duo optiones: installar e executar OmegaT 6 • installar super le installation existente.
If you already have collected words you wish the spell checker to ignore / accept, you just need to copy the corresponding two files into the <f0>omegat</f0>subfolder of your current project.
Si tu jam ha colligite parolas tu desidera le corrector orthographic ignora / accepta, tu debe solmente copiar le duo files correspondente in le sub plica <f0>omegat</f0>de tu projecto actual.
If you are in any doubt, we recommend that you use the version supplied with
If tu ha alicun dubita, nos recommenda que tu usa le version supplite con
If you are interested in modifying or distributing <a1>OmegaT</a1>, read this document carefully and ensure you understand its implications before doing anything.
If you are interested in modifying or distributing <a1>OmegaT</a1>, read this document carefully and ensure you understand its implications before doing anything.
If you are interested in other settings of this dialog, you can return to it any time by pressing <k0>Ctrl+E.</k0>
Si tu essera interessate re altere preparationes de iste dialogo, tu pote revenir a illo in qualcunque tempore juxta instante <k0>Ctrl+E</k0>.
If you are not very familiar with Linux, we therefore recommend
Si tu non es multo familiar con Linux, eo nos recommenda

If you are on a Mac and you want to add a <k0> <k1>Shift</k1> <k2>Command</k2> <k3>S</k3> </k0> shortcut to <m4> <g5>Tools</g5> <g6>Statistics</g6> </m4>, add the following line to your <f7>MainMenuShortcuts.properties</f7>:

Si tu es sur un Mac e tu vole adder un via breve <k0> <k1>Shift</k1> <k2>Command</k2> <k3>S</k3> </k0> a <m4> <g5>Instrumentos</g5> <g6>Statisticas</g6> </m4>, adde le linea sequente a tu <f7>MainMenuShortcuts.properties</f7>:
If you are supplied with previously created translation memories , for example by your translation agency or your client, OmegaT is able to use these as reference memories.
Si tu ha previe memorias de traduction, per exemplo ab tu agentia de traduction o ab un cliente, OmegaT pote los usar pro memorias de referentia.
If you are unable to run <a0>OmegaT</a0> normally (no graphical environment available): copy the settings files from some other <a1>OmegaT</a1> installation on another machine to a specific folder.

Si tu non pote lancear <a0>OmegaT</a0> normalmente (nulle ambiente graphic disponibile): copia le files del preparationes ex alicun altere installation <a1>OmegaT</a1> sur un altere machina verso un plica specific.
If you are using an authenticated proxy, please enter here your user and password.
Si tu usa un proxy authenticate, per favor inscribe ci tu usuario e contrasigno.
If you are using another system, and run into problems, the OmegaT users group at Yahoo can help you (see Step <f0>8</f0>).
Si tu usa un altere systema, e tu pati problemas, le gruppo de usatores de OmegaT in Yahoo pote te adjutar (vider passo <f0>8</f0>).
If you believe that you have lost translation data, you can use the following procedure to restore the project to its most recently saved state, usually not older than approximately 10 minutes or so:

Si tu crede que tu ha perdite datos jam rendite, tu pote usar le procedura sequente pro restaurar le projecto a su stato le plus recentemente salvate, habitualmente non precedente que approximativemente 10 minutas o sic:
If you believe you have lost translation data, follow the following procedure:
Si tu crede que tu ha perdite datos del traduction, seque le procedura sequente:
If you can not see all the panes (be it opened or minimized), pressing <g0> Options > Restore Main Window </g0>will restore them to the state, defined in the installation.
Si tu non pote vider omne le quadros (sia los aperte o minimisate), que tu pressa <g0> Optiones > Restaura Fenestra Principal </g0> e tu restaurara los al lor preparation initial.
If you can see the file OmegaT but not OmegaT.exe in your
Si tu vide la file OmegaT ma non vide OmegaT.exe in tu
If you can't run <a0>OmegaT</a0> normally (no graphical environment available): copy the settings files from some other <a1>OmegaT</a1> installation on another machine to a specific folder.

Si tu non pote exequer <a0>OmegaT</a0> normalmente (nulle ambiente graphic disponibile): copia le files del preparationes ex alicun altere installation <a1>OmegaT</a1> sur un altere machina a un plica specific.
If you can't see all three panes, drag the borders between them across your screen until they are arranged approximately as shown below.

Si tu non vide omne iste tres quadros, que tu tira le bordos inter illos trans tu schermo usque illos es arrangiate circa como monstrate infra. (o que tu commanda "Optiones > Restaura le fenestra principal")
If you change segmentation options when a project is open, you must reload the project in order for the changes to take effect.
Si tu cambia le optiones de segmentation durante que un projecto es aperte, tu debe recargar le projecto pro que le cambios sume effecto.
If you check the OmegaT log and you see words like
Si tu controla le OmegaT bloco e tu vide parolas simile a
If you check the corresponding checkbox, the OmegaT.l4J.ini file is modified to use the language selected (see next section for details).
Si tu marca le quadrato de controlo, le file OmegaT.l4J.ini file es modificate pro usar le lingua seligite (vide le section sequente pro le detalios).

If you decide mid-translation to switch from sentence to paragraph translation, the internal translation memory of the project will not be changed (OmegaT may upgrade old translation memories that did not use sentence segmentation, but not vice versa).

Si tu decide in medio al traduction de cambiar de segmentation a phrase al segmentation a paragrapho, le memoria de traduction interne del projecto non essera cambiate (OmegaT pote promover vetule memorias de traduction que non usa segmentation a phrase, ma non vice versa).
If you do not wish <a0>OmegaT</a0> to send your source segments to Google to get translated, untick the Google Translate menu entry in Options.
Si tu non desidera que <a0>OmegaT</a0> remitte tu segmentos fonte a Google a devenir rendite, leva le marca al entrata del menu Google Translate in Optiones.
If you enter names of folders that do not exist yet, <a0>OmegaT</a0> creates them for you.
Si tu inscribe nomines de plicas que non existe ancora, <a0>OmegaT</a0> crea los pro te.
If you export using the system option "Tab-delimited export", you will need to delete the first 5 columns (Seq.
Si tu exporta usante le option de systema "Exporta delimitate per character del tabulation", tu necessitara de deler le prime 5 columnas (Seq.
If you find the suggestion acceptable, press <k0> <k1><i2/>Ctrl</k1> <k3>M</k3> </k0> to replace the target part of the opened segment with the suggestion.
Si tu trova acceptabile le suggestion, pulsa <k0> <k1><i2/>Ctrl</k1> <k3>M</k3> </k0> pro reimplaciar le parte de destination del segmento aperte con le suggestion.

If you have TransTips option activated (<g0>Options → TransTips</g0>), you can right click on the highlighted word in the source segment to open a pop-up menu with suggested translation, as offered by your glossary.

Si tu ha le option TransTips activate (<g0>Optiones → TransTips</g0>), tu pote cliccar con le dextro sur le parola marcate in le segmento fonte pro aperir un menu pop-up con le traduction suggerite, assi como offerite per tu glossarios.
If you have already Java, one way to install the current version of
Si tu ja ha Java, un maniera pro installar le actual version de

If you have already translated a large body of text, and then realize the target language code of the project does not match the spell checker's language code (you specified pt_BR as the language, but there are no pt_BR vocabularies, for instance) you can simply copy the two corresponding files and rename them (e.g. from <e0>pt_PT.aff</e0> and <e1>pt_PT.dic</e1> to <e2>pt_BR.aff</e2> and <e3>pt_BR.dic</e3>).

Si tu ha jam rendite un grande corpore de texto, e alora realisa que le codice del lingua final del projecto non equala le codice del lingua del corrector orthographic (per exemplo tu ha specificate pt_BR como le lingua, ma non ha nulle vocabularios pt_BR) tu pote simplemente copiar le duo files correspondente e los renominar (e.g. ab <e0>pt_PT.arr</e0> e <e1>pt_PT.dic</e1> a <e2>pt._BR.arr</e2> e <e3>pt_BR.dic</e3>).
If you have an existing terminology handling system - MultiTerm for example - it is quite possible it offers the export of terminology data via TBX format.
Si tu ha un systema de tractamento del terminologia - per exemplo MultiTerm - il es assatis eventual que illo offere le exportation del datos terminologic con le formato TBX.
If you have made changes to your<f0> OmegaT.l4J.ini </f0>file and/or are using a .bat file, you must copy these over.
Si tu ha cambiate tu file<f0> OmegaT.l4J.ini </f0>o es usante un file .bat, tu debe copiar isto super.
If you have the source and the target Properties files for one and the same contents in your language pair, this procedure will create a corresponding tmx file for these contents.
Si tu ha le Files del Proprietates fonte e destination pro uno e le mesme contentos in tu par de lingua, iste procedura creara un file tmx correspondente pro iste contentos.
If you haven't yet saved the project, this manually confirms whether you really wish to quit.
Si tu non ha ancora salvate le projecto, isto confirma manualmente si tu desidera vermente quitar.
If you install a version of Java at system level, you must either
Si tu installa un version de Java al nivello de systema, tu debe o
If you later change filters, only the project filters will be updated, while the user filters stay unchanged.
Si tu plus tarde cambiara le filtros, sol le filtros del projecto essera renovate, dum le filtros del usator restara sin alteration.

If you modify the project segmentation or delete files from the source, some matches may appear as <e1>orphan strings</e1> in the Match Viewer: such matches refer to segments that do not exist any more in the source documents, as they correspond to segments translated and recorded before the modifications took place.

Si tu modifica le segmentation del projecto o dele files in le fonte, alcun concordantias pote apparer como <e1>lineas de characteres orphane</e1> in le quadro del concordantia: tal concordantias refere a segmentos que non existe alicun plus in le documentos fonte, pois que illos corresponde a segmentos rendite e registrate ante que le modificationes habeva loco.
If you need altered settings, the configuration files must be available.
Si tu necessita preparationes alterate, le files de configuration debe esser disponibile.
If you need assistance with any aspect of OmegaT, feel free to join the <u1>OmegaT users group.</u1>
Si tu ha besonio de adjuta pro qualque aspecto de OmegaT, que tu te adjunge gratis al gruppo <u1>Usatores de OmegaT</u1> .
If you need non-standard settings, the corresponding configuration files (<l0>filters.conf</l0> and <l1>segmentation.conf</l1>) must be present.
Si tu necessita preparationes non-standard, le files de configuration correspondente (<l0>filters.conf</l0> e <l1>segmentation.conf</l1>) debe esser presente.

If you only have a standard Spanish dictionary available, with file names es_es.dic and es_es.aff for instance, you can copy these files to es_MX.dic and es_MX.aff, and the spelling dictionary will work.

Si tu ha disponibile sol un dictionario Standard espaniol, con le nomines del file es_es.dic e es_es.aff , tu pote copiar iste files in es_MX.dic e es_MX.aff, e le dictionario orthographic functionara.
If you only need textual information (and not formatting information), use the level 1 file that OmegaT has created.
Si tu necessita solmente information textual (e non information de formattation), usa le file nivello 1 que OmegaT ha create.
If you place such translation memory files in the <f6>/tm/</f6> subfolder of a project, OmegaT will automatically search them for similar segments, called "fuzzy matches".
Si tu loca unes files de memoria de traduction in le sub plica <f6>/tm/</f6>de un projecto, OmegaT querera los automaticamente pro similabile segmentos, nominate "concordantias partial".
If you prefer to proofread your translation on paper, print out the <f0>target document.
Si tu prefere leger le probas de tu traduction sur papiro, stampa le <f0>documento final.
If you prefer to read through the finished text on the screen, i.e., in your browser, toggle between the browser and OmegaT.
Si tu prefere leger al transverso del texto clause sur le schermo, id es, in tu lector del tela, commuta inter le lector del tela e OmegaT.

If you right click on the Editor pane, a pop-up menu opens, offering<e0> Cut, Copy, Paste</e0> (i.e. same functions as <k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>X</k3> </k1>, <k4> <k5>Ctrl</k5> <k6>C</k6> </k4> and <k7> <k8>Ctrl</k8> <k9>V</k9> </k7>) and the <e10>GoTo segment</e10> functions.

Si tu clicca con le dextra sur le quadro Modifica, se displica un menu pop-up menu, offerente <e0> Talia, Copia, Colla</e0> (id es le mesme functiones que <k1> <k2>Ctrl</k2> <k3>X</k3> </k1>, <k4> <k5>Ctrl</k5> <k6>C</k6> </k4> e <k7> <k8>Ctrl</k8> <k9>V</k9> </k7>) e le function <e10>Vade al segmento</e10>.
If you start <a1>OmegaT</a1> in console mode, it will use the same settings.
Si tu lancea <a1>OmegaT</a1> in modo consola, il usara le mesme preparationes.
If you start <a1>OmegaT</a1> in console mode, it will use the settings you configured.
Si tu lancea <a1>OmegaT</a1> in modo consola, illo usara le preparationes que tu configurava.
If you use OmegaT for any length of time in the future, you will want to customize the segmentation rules.
Si tu usara OmegaT per alcun tempore in le futuro, alora tu volera accostumar le regulas de segmentation.
If you used the installation script supplied, you should be able to launch OmegaT with:
Si tu usa le script de installation supplite, tu potera lancear OmegaT con:
If you view these files in your browser on your PC, they will differ slightly in appearance from the pages on the Internet.
Si tu vide iste files in tu lector del tela sur tu PC, illo pote differer legiermente in apparentia ab le paginas sur le interrete.
If you want the translation to be the same as the source, simply make the editing field empty by removing all the text (select all with <k0>Ctrl+A</k0> and delete with <k1>Del</k1>).
Si tu vole que le traduction sia identic al origine, vacua simplemente le campo de modifica removente omne le texto (selige omne con <k0>Ctrl+A</k0> e dele con <k1>Del</k1>).

If you wish to add values to<e0> VMOptions</e0>, put a space between them.
Si tu vole adder valores a<e0> VMOptions</e0>, pone un spatio inter illos.
If you wish to change the text in a segment within the current project which is displayed in the Text Search window, double-click on it and OmegaT will take you to the segment concerned.
Si tu vole cambiar le texto in un segmento intra le projecto currente le qual es displicate in le fenestra Cerca Texto, clicca duo vices sur illo e OmegaT te portara al segmento sollicite.
If you wish to keep track of what is happening to the report, register as a SourceForge user, login and file a bug report or simply click Monitor at the top of the report.

Si tu vole mantener tracia re quod es occurrente a tu reporto, registra te como un usator SourceForge, qualifica te e deposita un reporto de defecto o simplemente clicca monitor al summitate de tu reporto.
If you wish to revert to default configuration of the filter, click <e2>Defaults.</e2> You may also modify the name directly in the target filename pattern field of the file filters dialog.

If you wish to use such files as reference translations in OmegaT, they must be repaired, or OmegaT will report an error and fail to load them.
Si tu desira usar tal files como traductiones de referentia in OmegaT, illos debe esser reparate, o OmegaT reportara un error e fallera a cargar los.

If tu installation de OmegaT es un version "Windows with JRE", le nove version debe alsi esser un version "Windows with JRE".

If your project consists of multiple source files, possibly in multiple sub-folders and with accompanying graphics files, etc., as is the case with the examples in our second, HTML, project, the entire structure of the files in <f1>/source</f1> is reproduced in <f2>/target</f2>.

si tu projecto consiste de multiple files fonte, possibilemente in multiple sub-plicas e con accompaniamento de files graphic, etc, como es le caso con le exemplos in tu secundo projecto HTML, le integre structura del files in <f1>/source</f1> is copiate in <f2>/target</f2>.

Si tu projecto contine plure files pro le traduction, si tu confirma le ultime segmento in le prime file tu vadera al summe segmento in le secundo file.

In case there are non-unique segments in source documents, the Auto-propagation check box offers the user the following two possibilities as regards automatic translation: if checked, the first translated segment will be assumed as the default translation and its target text will be automatically used for later hits during the translation process.

In caso il ha segmentos non unic in le documentos fonte, le quadrato de controlo del Auto-propagation offere al usator le duo possibilitates sequente respecto al traduction automatic: si marcate, le prime segmento rendite essera assumite como le traduction prefixate e su texto rendite essera usate automaticamente pro le occurrentias sequente durante le processo traduction.

It builds upon the strengths of Java but has additional power features inspired by languages like Python, Ruby and Smalltalk.

Isto non refere al version Web Start , que es promovite automaticamente, neque al version cross-platform sur Windows .
