It is not worth getting bogged down with fine-tuning the segmentation rules at this stage; the basic rules as supplied should work adequately for demonstration purposes, even for a different (source) language, provided its sentence punctuation rules are broadly similar (i.e., don't use the Japanese segmentation rules if you are translating from Italian).

Illo non es avantagiose arenar se con le accordatura fin del regulas de segmentation in iste grado; le regulas basic que es supplite operara adequatemente pro le fines de demonstration, mesmo pro un lingua fontal differente, a condition que le regulas de punctuation del phrases esserea largemente simile (i.e., que tu non usa le regulas de segmentation japonese si tu va traducer ab italian).
It is often useful to search for words and phrases in the source text and in your translation, so press <k0>Ctrl+F</k0> for the <g1>Text Search</g1> dialog at any time.
Es frequentemente utile recercar parolas e phrases in le texto primari o in tu traduction, assi que tu pressa <k0>Ctrl+F</k0> pro le fenestra de dialogo <g1>Cerca Texto</g1>in qualcunque tempore.
It is possible to modify the project properties during a translation session.
Il es possibile modificar le proprietates del projecto durante un session de traduction.
It is possible to select another tokenizer or a different version of the tokenizer from the Project Properties window.
Il es possibile seliger un altere tokenizer o un version differente del tokenizer del fenestra Proprietates del Projecto.

It is possible to use Apertium to build machine translation systems for a variety of language pairs; to that end, Apertium uses simple XML-based standard formats to encode the linguistic data needed (either by hand or by converting existing data), which are compiled using the provided tools into the high-speed formats used by the engine.

Il es possibile usar Apertium pro construer systemas de traductor automatic pro plure pares de linguas; pro le qual fin, Apertium usa simple formatos standard basate sur XML pro codificar le datos linguistic necessitate (o per mano o per convertimento de datos existente), que son compilate usante le applicationes fornite in le formatos de alte velocitate usate per le machina.
It is pretty much certain that while the quality may be insufficient in some cases, it will definitely get better with time and not worse.
Il es assatis certe que dum le qualitate sia insufficiente in alicun casos, unes illo devenira melior con le tempore e non pejor.
It is provided as a compressed file (zip or tar archive) that you must extract to the folder of your choice for installation.
Illo es fornite como file comprimite (archivo zip o tar) que tu debe extraher al plica de tu election pro le installation.
It is simpler, however, to look for dictionaries online, using the <e0>URL of online dictionaries</e0> field:
Comocunque il es plus simple, cercar pro dictionarios in interrete, usante le campo <e0>URL del dictionarios in interrete</e0> :

Il es alicun vices utile pro esser habile a render alicun tags intraducibile sur le base del valor del attributos.

Il es le segmento que es monstrate in duo partes.

It is therefore recommended that you download and install OpenOffice.org (if it is not already installed on your system).
Illo es dunque recommendate que tu discarga e installa OpenOffice.org (si non es ja installate su tu systema).

Illo es tractate como un traduction base, si nulle concordantia esseva trovate, o como traduction alternative, in caso le identic segmento fonte existe, ma con un texto de destination.
It is used to mark your translations.
illo es usate pro signar tu traductiones.

le justification del segmentos fonte e final depende sur le linguas del projecto.

Serva in mente que un par debe haber delite ambe su tag de apertura e de clausura pro assecurar que omne le tracias del formattation son delite debitemente, alias le file rendite pote devenir corrupte.

Keyword searches are similar to a search "with all of the words" in an Internet search engine such as Google (AND logic).
Recercas per parola clave es simile a un recerca "con omne le parolas" in un motor de recerca Interrete como Google (AND logic).
Keyword searches regard the specified query string as a set of search keywords (separated by space) and return all segments which contain all of the query words, in any order.

Le cercas per parola clave reguarda le linea de question specificate como un equipamento de parolas clave de cerca (separate per spatio) e rende omne segmentos que contine omne le parolas del question, in omne arrangiamento.

Plus tarde, postquam tu acceptava le accordo de licentia, le programma de preparation demanda te an tu desidera crear un plica in le menu <e0>start</e0>, e si tu desidera crear un connexion sur le scriptorio e in le barra de lanceamento celere - tu pote crear iste vias breve plus tarde con le tiramento de <e1><a2>OmegaT</a2>.exe</e1>al scriptorio o al menu initio pro ligar lo ex ibi.

Nulle action, si le instrumentos automatic es deactivate (vide Menu > Optiones > Traduction Automatic)

nulle nove dictionarios disponibile al server remote.

Normalmente le tags son ignorate quando on considera le similantia inter textos differente, pro le fines del concordantia.

normalmente, il es necessari initiar <a0>OmegaT</a0> a partir del linea de commando.

normalmente tu incontrara concordantias partial utile post alicun tempore, ma le <t0/>file memoria de traduction "hereditage" esseva fornite pro te in iste parve instruction pro assecurar que tu trovara al minus alcuno.

Nota alsi que alicun typo de character comportar se melio pro alicun pares de lingua que pro alteres.

Note however that the numbers do not indicate how relevant the repetitions are: they could mean relatively long sentences repeated a number of times (in which case you are fortunate) or it could describe a table of keywords (not so fortunate).

Nota tamen que le numeros non indica ut pertinente es le repetitiones: illos poterea significar phrases relativemente longe repetite plure vices (in le qual caso tu es fortunate) o illo poterea describer un tabula de parolas clave (non assi fortunate).
Note that <f0>Remove</f0> physically removes the selected vocabularies.
Nota que <f0>Remove</f0> elimina physicamente le vocabularios seligite.
Note that Google Translate service is not free of charge, see chapter <l1>Installing and Running</l1> (runtime parameters) for more on that.
Nota que le servicio Google Translate non es gratuite, vide le capitulo <l1>Installar e executar</l1> (parametros runtime) pro plus sur isto.
Note that OmegaT does not support the Microsoft Office 97-2003 binary file format directly.
Nota: OmegaT non supporta directemente le formato de file binari Microsoft Office 97-2003.
Note that all parameters start with a double - character.
Nota que omne parametros initia con un character - duple.
Note that all the tmx files in the /tm repository are parsed when the project is opened, so putting all different TMs you may have on hand into this folder may unnecessarily slow OmegaT down.

Nota que omne le files TMX in le deposito /tm son analysate quando le projecto es aperte, assi tu, ponente omne le varie TMs que tu pote haber per manos in iste plica, pote inutilemente retardar OmegaT.
Note that all the translation memories are loaded into memory when the project is opened.
Nota que omne le memorias de traduction son cargate in memoria quando le projecto es aperte.
Note that bug reports and requests for enhancements are publicly visible, so you should not add any sensitive files.
Nota que le reportos de defecto e le demandas pro incrementos functional es publicamente visibile, assi tu non deberea adder alicun files sensibile.
Note that changes to the project setup may have some consequences, especially, when the project has already been started.
Nota que le cambios al preparation del projecto pote haber alicun consequentias, specialmente, quando le projecto esseva jam initiate.
Note that default segmentation rules and file filters can be overridden by project-specific setup (see above).
Nota que le regulas de segmentation base e le filtros de file pote esser superscribite per preparationes specific del projecto (vide supra).
Note that if you need or wish to use any of the launch command arguments (see above), you must use the normal installation.
Nota que si tu necessita o desidera usar omne argumentos del commando de lanceamento (vide supra), tu debe usar le installation normal.
Note that in Windows you can change the <e3><a4>OmegaT</a4>.l4J.ini</e3> file to reflect your preferences.
Nota que in Windows tu pote cambiar le file <e3><a4>OmegaT</a4>.l4J.ini</e3> pro reflecter tu preferentias.
Note that in addition to "source-target" dictionaries you can, using the Dictionary feature, obtain access to information such as:
Nota que extra le dictionarios "original-final" tu pote obtener, usante le characteristica Dictionario, accesso a information como:
Note that in some cases changes in file filters in <a1>OmegaT</a1> may lead to totally different segmentation; as a result, you will have to upgrade your translation manually in such rare cases.

Nota que in alicun casos le cambios in le filtros de file in <a1>OmegaT</a1> pote ducer a segmentation totalmente differente; in consequentia, tu debera promover tu traduction manualmente in tal rar casos.
Note that in the above case, this is just half (or even less) of the story, as the target language (Slovenian) uses declension.
Nota que in le caso precedente, isto es justo medietate (o mesmo minus) del historia, pois que le lingua final (sloveno) usa le declination.
Note that in the menu <g2>Options->File Filters</g2>, the global user filters are changed, not the project filters.
Nota que in le menu <g2>Optiones->Filtros de File</g2>, son cambiate le filtros global del usator, non le filtros del projecto.
Note that nothing but your source segment is sent to the MT service.
Nota que sol tu segmento fonte es expedite al servicio de Traduction Automatic.
Note that only one TMX for a given language pair is possible, so if several translation memories should be involved, you will need to merge them all into the XX_YY.tmx.
Nota que sol un TMX pro un date par de linguas es possibile, ergo si deberea implicar plure memorias de traduction, tu necessitara funder los omne in le XX_YY.tmx.
Note that other CAT tools can export (and import as well) tmx files, usually in all three forms.
On pote crear tal files in qualcunque del tres varietates ante indicate.
Note that the "Install" function requires an Internet connection.
Nota que le function "Installa" necessita un connexion a Interrete.
Note that the TMX files in the tm folder can be compressed with gzip.
Nota que le le files TMX in le plica tm pote esser comprimite con gzip.
Note that the creator of the repository has implicitly the administrator rights for the repository created.
Nota: le creator del deposito ha implicitemente le privilegios del administrator pro le deposito create.
Note that the key is 38 characters long.
Note que le clave es longe 38 characteres.
Note that the opening tag must always come before the corresponding closing tag:
Nota que le tag de apertura debe semper venir ante que le tag de clausura correspondente:
Note that the structure of the source subfolder may take any form you like.
Nota que le structura del sub plicas in le sub plica /source poter sumer qualcunque forma tu vole.
Note that the team members have to be registered first, before you can add them to the project (Note: in the free version of ProjectLocker you are allowed only two users per project).
Nota que le membros del equipa debe esser registrate antea, ante que tu pote adder illes al projecto (Nota: in le version gratuite de ProjectLocker on es permittite sol duo usatores per projecto).
Note that there could be minor differences between the OmegaT counts and the numbers, provided by other CAT tools.
Nota que es possibile minor differentias inter le contos de OmegaT e le numeros fornite per altere applicationes CAT.
Note that there is no automatic “global replace” function, but there are “workarounds” that can be used.
Nota que il non habe un function automatic “Reimplacia toto”, ma il ha alcun “arrangiamentos” que on pote usar.
Note that these totals are a good (or as good as they can be) approximation of the work involved in the project and thus can serve as a basis for your cost and price calculations.
Nota que iste totales es un bon (o bon a mesura il pote esser) approximation del labor implicate in le projecto e assi pote servir como base pro le calculationes de tu costo e precio.
Note that they are all web-based: you will have to be on-line if you want to use them.
Nota que illos es omne basate sur le TTT: tu debera esser on-line si tu vole usar los.
Note that this will of course check for the standard (Castillian) rather than for Mexican Spanish.
Nota que illo naturalmente controlara pro le Standard plus tosto que pro le Espaniol Mexicano!)
Note that up to 2M characters per month are free of charge.
Nota que usque 2M characteres per mense es gratuite.
Note that you can reassign the shortcuts to your own preferences.
nota que tu pote re-assignar le vias breve ab claviero a tu preferentias personal.
Note that you segments from order1, that are not present in order2 and other subsequent jobs, will be tagged as orphan segments; however, they will still be useful for getting fuzzy matches.
Nota que tu segmenta ex order1, illo non es presente in order2 e altere obras subsequente, essera taggate como segmentos orphane; comocunque, illos essera ancora utile pro concordantias partial.
Note that you will need the ant program (<e0>http://ant.apache.org/bindownload.cgi</e0>) to build your own version of OmegaT.
Nota que tu necessitara le programma ant (<e0>http://ant.apache.org/bindownload.cgi</e0>) pro construer tu proprie version de OmegaT.
Note: All of the segmentation rule sets with a matching Language Pattern are applied in the given order.
Nota: omne le preparationes del regula de segmentation con un schema de lingua concordante es applicate in le arrangiamento date.

Nota: le files DocBook non solmente es recognoscite con le extension del file, ma illos alsi debe haber un declaration DOCTYPE: <!DOCTYPE book PUBLIC \"-//OASIS//DTD DocBook XML... per DocBook 4, o un Namespace: xmlns="http://docbook.org/ns/docbook" per DocBook 5
Note: Items that are found in most applications (copy/cut/paste) are not displayed in this menu, but are available using your system shortcuts.
Nota: le commandos trovate in le plus parte del applicationes (copia, talia, colla) non es monstrate in iste menu, ma es disponibile usante tu vias breve de systema.
Note: Source File Encoding setting affects only the HHC and HHK files that do not contain an encoding declaration.
Nota: le arrangiamento del codification del file primari affice solmente le files HHC e HHK que non contine un declaration de codification.
Note: Source File Encoding setting affects only the HTML files that have no encoding declaration inside.
Nota: le arrangiamento del codification del file primari affice solmente le files HTML que non contine declaration de codification.

Nota: non omne filtros permitte te de selectionar un codification.

OmegaT automatically saves translations every 10 minutes as well as when you close the project or quit OmegaT.
OmegaT automaticamente salva le traductiones cata 10 minutas e quando tu claude tu projecto o tu quita OmegaT.
OmegaT automatically selects a tokenizer for the source and the target language according to the language settings of the project.
OmegaT selige automaticamente un tokenizer pro le lingua fonte e uno pro le lingua de destination secundo le preparationes del lingua del projecto.
OmegaT can align Java .properties in console mode.
OmegaT pote alinear le .properties di Java in modo consola.
OmegaT can also check for programming variables (printf-function variables) like '%s'.
OmegaT pote alsi controlar pro variabiles de programmation (variabiles de function printf) like '%s'.
OmegaT can be customized to support other file formats as well.
OmegaT pote esser personalisate pro supportar anque altere formatos de file.
OmegaT displays a list of all segments containing all of the words specified.
OmegaT monstra un lista de omne segmentos continente tote le parolas specificate.
OmegaT does allow you to delete tags and to change their order, but only if certain rules are carefully followed.
OmegaT permitte de deler le tags e de cambiar lor ordine, ma sol si alicunes regulas es exactemente sequite.
OmegaT exports version 1.4 TMX files (both level 1 and level 2).
OmegaT exporta files TMX version 1.4 (ambe nivello 1 e nivello 2).
OmegaT features highly customizable filters, enabling you to configure numerous aspects.
OmegaT ha filtros multo personalisabile, que habilita te a configurar plure aspectos.
OmegaT follows very strict procedures when loading translation memory (tmx) files.
OmegaT seque proceduras multo stricte quando carga files memoria de traduction (tmx).
OmegaT has a built-in spell checker based on the spelling checker used in Apache OpenOffice, LibreOffice, Firefox and Thunderbird.
OmegaT include un corrector orthographic basate super le corrector orthographic usate in OpenOffice.org, Firefox e Thunderbird.
OmegaT has a friendly and helpful user group.
OmegaT ha un gruppo del usatores adjuvante e amical.
OmegaT has a very active, supportive and multilingual user group <a0>here</a0>, which users are strongly encouraged to join.
OmegaT ha un Gruppo del usatores multo active, disponibile e multilingual <a0>hic</a0>, al qual le usatores son fortemente incitate a adherer.
OmegaT ha selecte le option 'Si' automaticamente.
OmegaT in the command line mode
OmegaT in modo linea de commando
OmegaT inserts the translation of the string most similar to the current source, if it is above the similarity threshold that you have selected in this dialog.
OmegaT insere le traduction del linea maxime similabile al fonte actual, si il es supra le limine del similantia que tu ha seligite in iste fenestra de dialogo.
OmegaT interfaces to SVN and Git, two common team software versioning and revision control systems (RCS), available under an open source license.
OmegaT functiona con SVN e Git, duo commun systemas software pro equipa de controlo de version e revisio (RCS), disponibile sub licentia open source.
OmegaT is a computer-assisted translation (CAT) tool.
OmegaT es un application pro traduction adjutate ab computator (CAT).

OmegaT is a free and open source multiplatform Computer Assisted Translation tool with fuzzy matching, translation memory, keyword search, glossaries, and translation leveraging into updated projects.

OmegaT es un instrumento gratuite de traduction assistite ab computator, multe-platteforma con concordantia partial, recerca con parola clave, glossarios, e fruition del translation in le renovation del projectos.
OmegaT is able to recognize that you have done this.
OmegaT es habile a recognoscer que tu ha facite isto.
OmegaT is able to store translations that are identical to the source.
OmegaT es capabile de registrar traductiones que es identic al texto primari.

OmegaT is an "inline" translation memory application, meaning that you see only one copy of the text; segments which have already been translated appear as such, otherwise <t0/>the untranslated source text is displayed.

OmegaT es un application pro memoria de traduction "inline", in le senso que tu vide solmente un copia del texto; le segmentos jam rendite appare tal qual, de altere maniera es exponite <t0/>le texto primari non rendite.
OmegaT is an excellent place to start, as the price is right, it is relatively easy to learn, and it runs on MAC and under Linux, as well as Windows.
OmegaT es un excellente medio pro mitter se in cammino, pois que le precio es correcte, illo es relativemente facile a apprender, e illo functiona in MAC e sub Linux, como sub Windows.
OmegaT is available in many different versions in order to suit a range of user requirements.
OmegaT es disponibile in multe distincte versiones pro convenir a numerose requisitos del usator.
OmegaT is instructed to use a mandatory encoding for certain file formats (Java properties etc)
OmegaT es instruite a usar un codification obligatori pro certe formatos de file (Proprietates Java etc.)
OmegaT is not yet able to detect mistakes in formatting fully automatically, so it will not prompt you if you make an error or change formatting to fit your target language better.

OmegaT non es ancora habile a discoperir in modo completemente automatic le errores in le formattation, assi illo non suggerera te si tu face an error o cambia le formattation pro adaptar lo melio a tu lingua final.
OmegaT is refused access to the system property containing the name of your OS and/or the system property containing your home folder.
A OmegaT es refusate le accesso al proprietate del systema continente le nomine de tu OS o al proprietate del systema continente tu plica base.
OmegaT is supplied as a package that can be downloaded from SourceForge.
OmegaT es supplite como un pacchetto que pote esser discargate ex SourceForge.
OmegaT is supplied with a number of very basic segmentation patterns.
OmegaT es supplite con un numero de patronos de segmentation maxime basal.
OmegaT is the original work of Keith Godfrey.
OmegaT es le opera original de Keith Godfrey.
OmegaT is to use Java Web Start.
OmegaT es: usar le Java Web Start.
OmegaT leaves the editing field blank.
OmegaT lassa blanco le campo del modifica.
OmegaT main window contains the main menu, status bar and several panes.
Le pacchettos de OmegaT le qual ingloba
Projectos e sub plicas de OmegaT
OmegaT ran out of memory, and will quit when you press OK.
OmegaT curreva foras de memoria, e quitara quando tu pressa OK.
OmegaT recognizes the language codes using the following two standard conventions :
OmegaT recognosce le codices lingua usante le duo conventiones standard sequente:
OmegaT supports imported tmx versions 1.1-1.4b (both level 1 and level 2).
OmegaT supporta versiones de tmx importate 1.1-1.4b (tote le duo nivello 1 e nivello 2).
OmegaT supports the following file formats out of the box:
OmegaT supporta le formatos de file sequente:
OmegaT supports two of the popular version control systems (VCS for short), <u0>Apache Subversion</u0> (often abbreviated SVN, after the command name svn) and <u1>Git</u1>.

OmegaT supporta duo del popular 'systemas de controlo de version' (Version Control Systems = VCS in breve), <u0>"Subversion" ex Apache</u0> frequentemente abbreviate in SVN, secundo le nomine de su commando svn) e <u1>Git</u1>.
OmegaT thus takes the TUV segments corresponding to the project's source and target language codes and uses them as the source and target segments respectively.
OmegaT assi sume le segmentos TUV correspondente al codices fonte e destination del projecto e usa los ut segmentos fonte e destination respectivemente.
OmegaT uses glossaries containing translations of single words or small phrases: a simplified bilingual dictionary for a specific domain.
OmegaT usa glossarios continente traductiones de parolas singule o parve phrases: un dictionario bilingue simplificate pro un specific dominio.
OmegaT uses the default encoding of the operating system for text files.
OmegaT usa le codification base del systema operative pro le files de texto.

OmegaT uses the standard tmx file format to store and access translation memories, which guarantees that you can exchange your translation material with other CAT applications supporting this file format.

OmegaT usa le formato de file TMX standard pro registrar e acceder le memorias de traduction, le qual garanti que tu pote excambiar tu material de traduction con altere applicationes CAT que supporta le mesme formato de file.
OmegaT uses translation memories to store your previous translations and then suggest likely translations for the text you are currently working on.
OmegaT usa le memorias de traduction pro registrar tu previe traductiones e alora suggere traductiones verosimilante pro le texto que tu es actualmente traducente.
OmegaT will automatically parse even the most complex source folder
OmegaT analysara automaticamente etiam le plus complexe hierarchias de classificatores primari,
OmegaT will not launch if tokenizers are found in the /plugin folder.
OmegaT non lanceara se si son trovate tokenizers in le plica /plugin.
OmegaT will present one segment at a time for you to translate.
OmegaT proponera a te un segmento a un vice, pro render lo.
OmegaT will recognize it is a team project, and will synchronize everything automatically, every three minutes by default.
OmegaT recognoscera que illo es un projecto in equipa, e synchronisara omne cosa automaticamente, tote le tres minutas, per arrangiamento initial.
OmegaT will run on the open-implementation source Java
OmegaT currera super le libere-execution primari Java
OmegaT will then copy the selected files to the <f2>/source/</f2> subfolder of your newly created project.
Tunc OmegaT copiara le files seligite in le sub plica <f2>/source/</f2> de tu nove projecto.
OmegaT will then omit the appropriate files while loading projects, and will copy them unmodified when creating target documents.
OmegaT omittera alora le files appropriate durante le cargamento del projectos, e copiara los identic quando creara le documentos de destination.
OmegaT will then report these segments as not translated.
OmegaT reportara ergo iste segmentos como non rendite.
OmegaT will try to resegment the TMX file...
OmegaT essayara a segmentar de novo le file TMX...
OmegaT zip or tar.bz2 archive to this folder and unpack it there.
archivo OmegaT zip o tar.bz2 in iste classificator e lo discassa ibi.
Le principal characteristicas de OmegaT's es:
OmegaT, however, will present this sentence in the following fashion:
OmegaT, comocunque, presentara iste phrase in le sequente faction:
OmegaT, the free translation memory tool
OmegaT, le application gratuite pro memoria de traduction
OmegaT-Scripting allows to run scripts written in different scripting languages in OmegaT.
OmegaT-Scripting permitte le execution del scriptes in differente linguas.
On Mac OS X, you can change the <e5>Info.plist</e5> located in <e6><a7>OmegaT</a7>.app/Contents/</e6> to do the same.
Sur Mac OS X, tu pote cambiar le <e5>Info.plist</e5> ubicate in <e6><a7>OmegaT</a7>.app/Contents/</e6> pro facer le mesmo.
On Windows it is called an "MS-DOS window" and is available from the Start Menu, inside Programs, through the "MS-DOS" item.
sur Windows il es clamate un "MS-DOS window" e es disponibile ab le Menu Start, intra Programmas, al transverso del commando "MS-DOS".
On the Mac, the modifier <e0>meta</e0> must be used to specify the <e1>command</e1> key.
Sur le Mac, le modificator <e0>meta</e0> debe esser utilisate pro specificar le clave <e1>commando</e1>.
On warn the errors are printed but the program continues.
Si le valor es warn alora le errores son imprimite, ma OmegaT continua.
Once <a0>OmegaT</a0> is installed, you can click on <e1><a2>OmegaT</a2>.jar</e1> to launch it directly or you can launch it directly from the command line.
Un vice que <a0>OmegaT</a0> es installate, pro lancear lo directemente, on pote cliccar sur <e1><a2>OmegaT</a2>.jar</e1> o on pote usar le linea de commando.

Once <a0>OmegaT</a0> is installed, you can launch it directly from the command line, you can create a script that includes launch parameters for the command line or you can click on <e1><a2>OmegaT</a2>.jar</e1> to launch it directly.

Un vice que <a0>OmegaT</a0> es installate, tu pote lancear lo directemente ex le linea de commando, tu pote crear un script que include le parametros de lanceamento pro le linea de commando o tu pote cliccar sur <e1><a2>OmegaT</a2>.jar</e1> pro lancear lo directemente.

Once computed, the data also available in <f6>omegat/project_stats_match.txt.</f6> Note that the file is time-stamped, as the calculation (contrary to the standard statistics) is not instantaneous and can thus quickly become obsolete.

Un vice computate, le data es alsi disponibile in <f6>omegat/project_stats_match.txt.</f6> Nota que le file es annotate con le tempores, pois que le calculo (contrarimente al statisticas standard) non es instantanee e pote assi rapidemente devenir obsolete.
Once the <f0>MainMenuShortcuts.properties</f0> file is modified, <a1>OmegaT</a1> must be relaunched to take the new shortcuts into account.
Un vice que le file <f0>MainMenuShortcuts.properties</f0> es modificate, <a1>OmegaT</a1> debe esser reinitiate pro prender in conto le nove vias breve.
Once the SVN server is available, project managers must locally install a SVN client, in order to manage the project contents on their computers.
Once the SVN server is available, project managers must locally install a SVN client, in order to manage the project contents on their computers.

Un vice que le archivo esseva extrahite, es create un plica continente le contentos sequente:

un vice que le operation ha finite, tu pote controlar le plica dicite: illo deberea ora continer un sub plica .svn e un placa OK verde sur su icone monstrara, que le contentos del plica son renovate:
Once the team project is setup, team members only need <a0>OmegaT</a0> to access the team project.
Un vice que le projecto in equipa es preparate, le membros del equipa debe sol acceder al projecto in equipa con <a0>OmegaT</a0>.
Once you have activated the service, a suggestion for the translation will appear in the Machine Translate pane every time a new source segment is opened.
Un vice que tu ha activate le servicio, un suggestion pro le traduction apparera in le quadro del Traduction Automatic cata vice un nove segmento fonte es aperte.
Once you have decided on a subject, download the files from the Internet, navigating so that they go directly into the <f0>/source</f0><f1> folder of </f1><f2>My Project-2</f2>.
Un vice que tu ha decidite le subjecto, que tu discarga le files ex le Interrete, directemente in le plica <f0>/source</f0><f1> del </f1><f2>My Project-2</f2>.
Once you have done this, you can delete the <e5>OmegaT_3.n.n_Mac.zip</e5> file, it is no longer needed.
Un vice que tu ha exequite lo, tu pote deler le file <e5>OmegaT_3.n.n_Mac.zip</e5>, illo non necessita plus.
Once you have joined, you can post questions there regarding OmegaT.
Un vice que tu ha juncte, tu can postar ibi questiones re OmegaT.

Once you have made certain that there are no tag errors in your translation, press <k0>Ctrl+D</k0> to generate the target files, which will be created in the <f1>/target/</f1> subfolder of your project folder.

Un vice que tu es certe que non ha nulle errores de tags in tu traduction, que tu pressa <k0>Ctrl+D</k0> pro generar tu file final, le qual essera create in le subcamisa <f1>/target/</f1> del classificator de tu projecto.
One could only wonder, how many the and a prepositions would still be missing without his invaluable help.
On pote sol meraviliar se, quante prepositiones esserea ancora perdite sin su inestimabile auxilio.

One member of the team, the project administrator, needs to be acquainted with handling the server side, i.e. the job of setting up the environment, importing the OmegaT project, assigning the access rights for the team members, resolving the conflicts, etc.

Un membro del equipa, le administrator del projecto, debe cognoscer le tractamento al latere del server, id es le labor re le preparation del ambiente, como importar le projecto OmegaT, como assignar le derectos de accesso pro e membros del equipa, como resolver le conflictos, etc..
One of the above segments is the current segment.
Uno del segmentos super es le segmento actual.

Un o plus del problemas precedente esseva fixate, ma le projecto non esseva recargate.
Online repositories of spelling dictionaries for use within OmegaT.
Depositos in interrete del dictionarios orthographic pro le uso in OmegaT.
Only by looking at the source text can you ascertain the actual function of the tags in a particular case.
Sol con le confrontation del texto primari tu pote assecurar te del real function del tags in un caso particular.
Solmente se le file (X)HTML ha un testa (&header)
Only if (X)HTML file has an &encoding declaration
Solmente si le file (X)HTML ha un declaration de codification (&encoding)
Only in the case of the "active" segment, which is highlighted, are both source text and translation displayed.
Sol in le caso del segmento "active", le qual es emphatisate, ambe le textos, lo primari e su traduction es exponite.
Only integers and simple floats (using the period as a decimal character, e.g. 5.4, but not 5,4 or 54E-01) are considered.
sol numeros integre e numeros a virgula mobile simple (usante le periodo ut un character decimal, exempli gratia 5.4, ma non 5,4 ni 54E-01) es considerate.
Only the file test.html at the root of the source folder will be translated.
Sol le file test.html in le radice del plica source essera rendite.

Sol le file test.html in le plica dir-10 essera processate.

Opening the user manual in this way also enables you to follow external links, as the built-in help browser does not accept external Internet links.
Le apertura del manual del usator in iste maniera habilita te alsi a sequer ligamines externe, a mesura que le Lector del Adjuta integrate non accepta ligamines externe de Interrete.
Aperi un Fenestra de Recerca nove.
Opens a new window and displays the project statistics, i.e. the project totals and totals for every file in the project.
Aperi un nove fenestra e monstra le statisticas del projecto, id es le totales del projecto e le totales pro omne file in le projecto.
Opens the <l0>Source segmentation</l0> dialog to configure text segmentation.
Aperi le fenestra de dialogo <l0>Segmentation del fonte</l0> pro configurar le segmentation del texto.

Segmentos orphane<i2/> (le concordantia #2) describe segmentos in le memoria de traduction base del projecto que non ha alicun segmento original correspondente.

Altere Icones - lege, e naviga al sub plica /images in le plica application de <a0>OmegaT</a0>.

Alias, OmegaT usara le lingua del systema operative.

Alias, tu pote hasardar de corrumper tu documento final e impedir que on pote lo aperir.

Le files PO<i0/> pote continer ambe le textos fonte e final.

Page slips through fingers

Pulse pounding hard and frantic

Vanishing like mist.

La pagina passa al transverso del manos

Le pulso batte forte e phrenetic

Evanescente como bruma.
Paired tags usually indicate style information that applies to the text between the opening tag and the closing tag of a pair.
Le tags accopulate habitualmente indica information de stilo que refere se al texto inter le tag de apertura e le tag de clausura de un par.

Paragraph segmentation is advantageous in certain cases, such as highly creative or stylistic translations in which the translator may wish to change the order of entire sentences; for the majority of projects, however, sentence segmentation is a choice to be preferred, since it delivers better matches from previous translations.

Le segmentation a paragrapho es avantagiose in certe casos, assi como traductiones multo creative o stilistic in le qual le traductor pote desiderar de cambiar le ordine de integre phrases; pro le majoritate del projectos, comocunque, le segmentation a phrase es un selection a preferer, pois que illo delivra concordantias melior ex traductiones previe.
Paragraph segmentation is less frequently used, but can be useful in cases of so-called "creative" texts.
Le segmentation basate super paragraphos es usate minus frequentemente, ma pote esser utile in casos del textos si-nominate "creative".
Paragraph segmentation on line breaks, empty lines or never:
segmentation a paragrapho sur interruptiones de linea, lineas vacue o nunquam:

Le paragraphos, sectiones e tabellas son fixate a bidi

Error de analyse incontrate in lectura del file del preferentias!

Colla le texto ex le tabula del fragmento al position del cursor.

Percurso del TMX a partir del radice de /tm

Paga attention extra al pares de tag

Possibilemente illo es jam aperte in un altere instantia OmegaT

Que tu collige le lingua de tu texto fontal (p.e., interlingua, "IA.*"), e usa "Move in alto" pro lo mover in le summitate de le lista.

pone le archivo in qualcunque commode classificator e lo discassa; OmegaT es alora

Le expressiones regular son un maniera potente pro cercar pro occurrentias de un linea de character.

Reloads the project to take external changes in source files, legacy translation memories, glossaries and project settings into account.

Recorda que cata bon reporto de defecto necessita justo tres cosas:

Remove LanguageTool ex le plica /plugin ante lancear OmegaT.

Leva omne le tokenizers ex le plica /plugin ante que tu lancea OmegaT.
Leva le tags initial e final
Remove leading and trailing whitespace in non-segmented projects
Leva le spatios blanc initial e final in le projectos non segmentate
Rename the current <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> file ( e.g. to <f1>project_save.tmx.temporary</f1>)
Renomina le file <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> actual ( e.g. a <f1>project_save.tmx.temporary</f1>)
Repetitions stand for identical segments present several times in the text.
Repetitiones son segmentos identic presente plure vices, in le texto.
Replace <l0><filename></l0> with the name of the file you wish to create, either absolute or relative to the working folder (the folder you start <a1>OmegaT</a1> from).
Replacia <l0><filename></l0> con le nomine del file que tu desira crear, o absolute o relative al plica currente (le plica ex le qual tu lancea <a1>OmegaT</a1>).
Reimplacia le traduction con le concordantia
Reimplacia le traduction con le texto
Reimplacia con le traduction a auto&Matic
Replaces the current target segment contents with the selected match (the first match is selected by default)
Reimplacia le contentos del segmento final currente con le concordantia partial seligite (le prime concordantia es inserite per arrangiamento initial)
Replaces the current target segment contents with the source text contents
Reimplacia le contentos del segmento final con le contentos del texto fonte
Replaces the target segment with the machine translation of the source.
Reimplacia le segmento final con le traductor automatic del fonte.
Replaces the target segment with the translation, provided by the selected Machine Translation service.
Reimplacia le segmento final con le traduction, fornite ex le servicio de traduction automatic seligite.
Replaces the whole target segment with the currently selected fuzzy match (by default the first match is selected).
Reimplacia le integre segmento final con le concordantia partial actualmente seligite (per arrangiamento base es seligite le prime concordantia).
Replaces the whole target segment with the source.
Reimplacia le segmento final integre con le segmento original.

Exequer <a0>OmegaT</a0> normalmente (con le interfacie graphic, GUI) e adjustar le preparationes.

Samuel Murray: pro le capitulo introductive "Apprender a usar OmegaT in 5 minutas!".

Salva le opera actual in le memoria de traduction interne (file project_save.tmx localisate in le classificator <f0>omegat</f0> del projecto).

Que tu salva le memoria de traduction interne in le disco dur.

Que tu salva tu traduction e claude le projecto.

Il ha scripts e proceduras pro te habilitar a facer le sequente:<br1/>
Search for segments containing the exact string you specified.

Cerca pro le combination de linguas requirite - per exemplo sur le <u0><i1/>StarDict Platform</u0> ante.

Recercas es facite intra le projecto actual o in qualcunque classificator o structura de classificator.

Le cerca pote esser exequite in le fonte o in le traduction i in le notas.

See the following for more information on CAT tools, including on the many varieties available:
Que tu vide plus informationes sur le instrumentos CAT, includente plure varietates disponibile:
See the section Preventing data loss for ways and means of protecting your work.
Vide le section Impedir perdita del datos pro manieras e medios de protection de tu opera.
See the<e1> Main Menu</e1> appendix for a full description of all menus and menu items.
Vide le appendice<e1> Menu Principal</e1> pro un description complete re omne menus e commandos del menu.
Segment encountered outside translation unit variant.
Segmento incontrate foras del variante de unitate de traduction.
Segment source text into paragraphs on:
Segmenta le texto primari a paragraphos sur:
Segmentation rules are applied in the following order:
Le regulas de segmentation es applicate in le ordine sequente:
Select it and confirm with OK.
Selige e confirma lo con OK.
Select the backup translation memory that is most likely - e.g. the most recent one, or the last version from the day before) to contain the data you are looking for
Selige le copia de reserva del memoria de traduction que es le plus probabile a continer le data pro le qual tu quere - per exemplo le plus recente, o le ultime version ex le die precedente
Select the desired source and target languages by clicking on the arrows to the right of these fields.
Que tu selige le linguas fontal e final desiderate cliccante sur le flechas al dextera de iste campos.
Select the method using the radio buttons.
Selige le methodo per le buttones radio.
Select this menu item, if the current translation does not apply and enter the alternative translation.
Selige iste commando del menu, si le traduction currente non referer se e inscribe le traduction alternative.
Select<g0> TortoiseSVN > Checkout.</g0> The following dialog appears:
Selige<g0> TortoiseSVN > Checkout.</g0> Appare le fenestra de dialogo sequente:
Selecting a dictionary and “Install” causes the relevant dictionary to be downloaded from the Internet to the folder which you specified in <f9>a)</f9><f10>.
Seliger un dictionario e commandar “Installa” causa que le pertinente dictionario es discargate, ex Interrete, in le classificator que tu ha specificate in <f9>a)</f9><f10>.
Selecting one of them will insert it at the current cursor position into the target segment.
Selectionante uno de illos on inserera lo al position currente del cursor in le segmento final.
Separates the source text into segments.
Separa le texto fonte in segmentos.
Set it up just as you did with <f1>My Project-1</f1>.
Que tu lo arrangia precisemente como tu faceva con <f1>My Project-1</f1>.
Sets segment validation key to <g0>Tab</g0> instead of the default <g1>Enter</g1>.
Pone le clave de validation del segmento a <g0>Tab</g0> in loco del base prefixate <g1>Enter</g1>.
Setting it to<e1> All </e1>shows this information for all segments and <e2>None</e2> turns this option off.
Prefixar illo a<e1> All </e1>monstra iste information pro omne segmentos e <e2>None</e2> disactiva iste option.
Setting the Display Modification option to <e0>Selected</e0> will display the time and the author of the last change in the current segment.
prefixar le option Modification del Apparentia a <e0>Seligite</e0> monstrara le tempore e le autor del ultime cambio in le segmento currente.
Several filters (Text files, XHTML files, HTML and XHTML files, OpenDocument files and Microsoft Open XML files) have one or more specific options.
Plure filtros (files texto, files XHTML, files HTML e XHTML, files OpenDocument e files Microsoft Open XML) ha uno o plus optiones specific.
Several team members can work on the translation project simultaneously without interfering with each other
Plure membros del equipa pote operar re le projecto de traduction simultaneemente sin interferentia le un con le altere
Participar a un projecto usante SVN
Shortcuts are activated by pressing <k0>Ctrl</k0> and a letter.
Le vias breve es activate pressante <k0>Ctrl</k0> e un littera.
Should OmegaT appear to be behaving erratically, it is important to include this file or the relevant part in any bug report
Si OmegaT deberea apparer comportar se erraticamente, il es importante includer iste file o su parte pertinente in omne reporto de defecto
Should you lose track of your changes to the user interface, you can use <g0><i1/> <i2/>Options → Restore the main window</g0> any time to return to the original layout.
Si tu deberea perder tracia de tu cambios al interfacie del usator, tu pote usar <g0><i1/> <i2/>Optiones → Restaura le Fenestra Principal</g0> in omne tempore pro retornar al arrangiamento original.
Should you need more specific information, consult the <u0>Java Regex documentation</u0>.
Si tu deberea necessitar information plus specific, consulta le <u0>documentation Regex Java</u0>.
Should you run into problems, post a message in the <u0><a1>OmegaT</a1> user group</u0>.
Si tu deberea haber problemas, posta un message in le Gruppo del usator de <u0><a1>OmegaT</a1></u0>.
Should you wish not to use OmegaT to translate files of a certain type, you can turn off the corresponding filter by deactivating the check box beside its name.
deberea tu desirar non usar OmegaT pro render files de un certe typo, tu pote volver foras le filtro correspondente per le disactivation del quadrato de controlo al latere de su nomine.

Should you wish to reuse a translation memory from a previous project (for example because the new project is similar to the previous project, or uses terminology which might have been used before), you can use these translation memories as "input translation memories", i.e. for import into your new project.

Deberea tu desirar de reusar un memoria de traduction de un projecto previe (per exemplo quia le nove projecto es simile al projecto previe, o usa terminologia que poteva esser usate antea), tu pote usar iste memorias de traduction como "memorias de traduction de ingresso", id es pro importar los in tu nove projecto.
Shows the dialog to modify the text display font.
Monstra le fenestra de dialogo pro modificar le typo del character del texto monstrate.
Sign in to the site first or - if it is your first time on the site, register for it and note your user name and password for the future projects.
In prime loco signa in le site o - si il es vostre prime vece sur le site, que vos registra pro illo e que vos nota vos nomine del usator e contrasigno pro le futur projectos.
Similar as in the case of OmegaT projects, you will need to have separate repositories for different language pairs.
Como in le caso del projectos de OmegaT, tu necessitara depositos separate pro pares de lingua differente.
Simplifying the original formatting greatly contributes to reducing the number of tags.
Simplificar le formattation original contribue assatis a reducer le numero de tags.
Simplifying the original text formatting in the source file before commencing translation greatly contributes to reducing the number of tags.
Simplificar le formato del texto original in le file fonte ante que comenciar le traduction contribue assatis a reducer le numero de tags.
Simply click through these by pressing Enter to confirm that the target is to remain the same.
Clicca simplemente a transverso istos pressante Enter pro confirmar que le texto final debe remaner idem.
Simplemente lancea le programma de installation.
Since tags are included in the text itself, it is possible to use segmentation rules to create segments with fewer tags.
Desde le tags es includite in le ipse texto, il es possibile usar le regulas de segmentation pro crear segmentos con minus tags.

Since the legacy .tmx files in the <f1>/tm</f1> folder are the product of previous translation jobs, <f2>you will not normally have any useful legacy .tmx files to call upon until you have completed a few jobs in OmegaT, and placed them into the </f2><f3>/tm</f3><f4> folder of your new job.</f4>

Pois que le files hereditage .tmx in le plica <f1>/tm</f1> es le producto de previe obras de traduction, <f2>tu normalmente non habera alcun files hereditage .tmx utile pro lo advocar usque tu ha completate alicun obras in OmegaT, e los poneva in le plica</f2><f3>/tm</f3><f4> de tu nove obra.</f4>
Single tags indicate formatting information that does not affect the surrounding text (an extra space or line break for example).
Le tags singule indica information de formattation que non affice le contexto (un spatio supernumerari o un interruption de linea per exemplo).
Salta le expression regulamentari del regulamentari del texto:
So do the next two matches, and the match #4 is similar, but different.
Assi facer le sequente duo concordantias, e le concordantia #4 son similabile, ma differente.
So it is probably faster to type the term correctly right away without bothering with the glossary and its shortcuts.
Assi il es probabilemente plus rapide dactylographar le termino correctemente juste immediatemente sin penar con le glossario e su vias breve.
So the inserted "pojavni meni" in the nominative form - has to be changed to "pojavnem meniju" , i.e. to the locative.
Assi le "pojavni meni" inserite in le forma nominative - debe esser cambiate a "pojavnem meniju" , id es al locativo.
So, if the user's operating system is Russian and <a4>OmegaT</a4> has been localized in Russian, <a5>OmegaT</a5> is displayed with a Russian user interface, Russian menus, etc.
Assi, si le systema operative del usator es russe <a4>OmegaT</a4> esseva localisate in russo, <a5>OmegaT</a5> es monstrate con un interfacie del usator russe, menus russe, etc.
Some more points to note about the HTML files for translation:
Alcun magis punctos a notar pro le traduction re le files HTML:
Some of the dictionaries have no strings attached - i.e. are "Free to use", and others, like the selection above, are under the GPL license.
Alicun del dictionarios non ha nulla lineas de characteres alligate - id es lor uso es "gratuite", e altere, como le selection supra, es sub Le licentia GPL.
Some of the file formats, specialized for translation work, for instance PO, allow the inclusion of comments.
Alcun del Formatos del files, specialisate pro le labor de traduction, per exemplo PO, permitte le inclusion de commentos.
Some project folders seem to have been moved.
Alicun classificatores del projecto pare esseva movite.
Alcun vias breve implica altere claves.
Some tag manipulations are necessary and are benign, others will cause problems when the translated document is created.
Alicun manipulationes de tag es necessari e es benigne, alteres producera problemas quando essera create le documento rendite.
Some tag scenarios flagged in the tag validation window are necessary and are benign, others will cause problems when the translated document is created.
Alicun scenarios de tag languite in le fenestra de validation del tag es necessari e benigne, alteres producera problemas quando es create le documento rendite.
Some tools are known to produce invalid tmx files under certain conditions.
Qualque applicationes son note producer files tmx invalide sub certe conditiones.
Some types of source files (for instance PO, TTX, etc.) are bilingual, i.e. they serve both as a source and as a translation memory.
Alicun typos de Files fonte (per exemplo PO, TTX, etc.) son bilingue, id es illos serve ambe como un fonte e como un memoria de traduction.
Sometimes, however, your translated file may look strange, and – in the worst case – may even refuse to open.
Alicun vices, comocunque, tu file rendite pote haver un aspecto singular, e – in le pejor caso – pote etiam rejectar de aperir.
Sometimes, it is useful to distinguish between high-quality translation memories and those that are, because of the subject matter, client, revision status, etc., less reliable.
Alicun vices, il es utile distinguer inter memorias de traduction de alte qualitate e illos que es, a causa del stato del materia subjecto, del cliente, del revision, etc. es minus digne de fide.
Codification del file fonte e del file final
Typo de file fonte, exemplo de nomine de file
Source files folder entered does not exist!
Le classificator inscribite del files primari non existe!
Source of the work are being offered to the general public at no
Source of the work are being offered to the general public at no
Source segment could not be located for certain translation units.
Impossibile trovar le segmento primari pro alcun unitates de traduction.
Spaces between segments are not taken into account in the last column.
Le spatios inter segmentos non es tenite in conto in le ultime columna.
Specific behavior can be set up in the file filters.
In le filtros de file on pote prefixar comportamentos specific.
Specificar le comportamento del tractamento del tag
Specify the encoding for your plain text files
Specifica le codification pro tu files de texto simple
Starting OmegaT from the command line
Initiar OmegaT ab le linea de commando
Statistical learning techniques, based on source and target texts, are used to build a translation model.
Pro construer un modello de traduction son usate technicas statistic de saper, basate sur textos de origine e final.
String showing the differences between the source and the match.<e0> Hint:</e0> use this if the text, you are translating has been updated.
Linea de character monstrante le differentias inter le fonte e le concordantia.<e0> Aviso:</e0> usa isto si le texto, que tu es rendente esseva renovate.
Strings can be enclosed by quotes ", which allows having a comma inside a string:
Le lineas de character pote esser incluse in virgulettas ", le qual permitte de haber un virgula intra un linea de character:
Subsequent clicks on <e2><a3>OmegaT</a3>.jnlp</e2> will check for any upgrades, install them, if there are any, and then start <a4>OmegaT</a4>.
Le cliccas subsequente sur <e2><a3>OmegaT</a3>.jnlp</e2> controlara per omne renovationes, installara los, si il ha alicun, e alora lanceara <a4>OmegaT</a4>.
Such files can be created in any of the three varieties indicated above.
On pote crear tal files in qualcunque del tres varietates ante indicate.
Such files do not contain any formatting information beyond the "white space" used to align text, indicate paragraphs or insert page breaks.
Tal files non contine ulle information de formattation extra le "spatio blanc" usate pro alinear texto, indicar paragraphos o inserer interruptiones de pagina.
Such files may also be written out in any encoding.
Assi como tal files pote alsi esser create in omne codification.
Such modifications are possible in ODF files for example.
Iste modificationes es possibile in files ODF per exemplo.

System-wide commands Select All (<k0>Ctrl+A</k0>), Paste (<e1>Ctrl+V</e1>), Cut (<e2>Ctrl+X</e2>), copy (<e3>Ctrl+C)</e3>, Insert match <e4>(Ctrl+I</e4>) and Insert source (<e5>Ctrl+Shift+I</e5>) act in principle on the text within the currently open segment only.

Le commandos de systema Selige toto (<k0>Ctrl+A</k0>), Colla (<e1>Ctrl+V</e1>), Talia (<e2>Ctrl+X</e2>), Copia (<e3>Ctrl+C)</e3>, Insere le concordantia <e4>(Ctrl+I</e4>) e Insere le fonte (<e5>Ctrl+Shift+I</e5>) age sol, in principio, re le texto intra le segmento actualmente aperte.
TBX - Term Base eXchange - is the open, XML-based standard for exchanging structured terminological data, TBX has been approved as an international standard by LISA and ISO.
TBX - Term Base eXchange - es le standard aperte, basate sur XML pro le excambio del datos terminologic structurate, TBX esseva approbate quam un standard international per LISA e ISO.
TMX file was created by OmegaT 1.4.x or earlier.
Le file TMX esseva create ab OmegaT 1.4.x o anterior.
TMX files are read sorted by their names and segments within a given TMX file line by line.
Le files TMX es legite un linea al vice, ordinate, intra un file TMX date, secundo lor nomines e segmentos.
TMX files can generally contain translation units with several candidate languages.
Le files TMX pote continer generalmente unitates de traduction con plure linguas candidate.
Tag errors are cases in which the tags in the translation do not correspond in order and number to the original segment.
le errores de tag es casos in le qual le tags in le traduction non corresponde in ordine e numero al segmento original.
Tags are always either singles or paired.
Le tags es sempre o singulos o accopulate.
Tags are highlighted in bold blue for easy comparison between the original and the translated contents.
Le tags es marcate in blau nigrato pro un facile comparation inter le original e le contentos rendite.
Tags are numbered incrementally by tag group.
Le tags son numerate in modo incremental secundo le gruppo de tag.
Tags generally represent formatting in some form of the original text.
Le tags generalmente representa le formattation in alicun forma del texto original.
Tags generally represent some kind of formatting in the original text.
Le tags representa generalmente un sorta de formattation in le texto original.
Tags reproduced in the translated segment will be present in the translated document.
Le tags representate in le segmento rendite essera presente in le documento rendite.
Take particular care when making changes to the files in <l0>/source</l0> while in the middle of a project.
Presta cura particular al cambios al files in le plica <l0>/source</l0> durante que es in le medio de un projecto.
Technically speaking, the <c0>msgstr</c0> segment in the PO target file, if created, will be left empty.
In terminos technic, le segmento <c0>msgstr</c0> in le file destination PO, si create, essera lassate vacue.
Terms and their translations will appear when you reach a segment containing them.
Le terminos e lor traductiones apparera quando tu attingera un segmento continente illos.
Terms in the current segment which <a3>OmegaT</a3> finds in the glossary file(s) are displayed in the Glossary pane:
Le terminos in le segmento currente que <a3>OmegaT</a3> trova in le file(s) glossario es monstrate in le quadro pro le Glossario:
Texts, bracketed by tags, are replaced by spaces:.
Le textos includite in tags, es replaciate con spatios:.
The current folder will be used instead.
In vice essera usate le classificator actual.
The "Cmd" key either has a "command" label or an apple symbol on Apple keyboards.
Sur le clavieros del Apple le clave "Cmd" ha o un etiquetta "command" o un tag con un symbolo de pomo.
Le fenestra de dialogo “Crea un nove projecto” compare.

The "Shift" key doesn't exhibit any special behavior per se: when the "Shift" key is pressed, all keys move the cursor in their usual manner, except in the case of the <l0>Shift+Enter</l0> combination, that inserts a line break into the text.

Le clave "Shift" non exhibi ulle special comportamento per se: quando on pressa le clave "Shift" , omne le claves move le cursor in su consuete faction, foras que in le caso del combination <l0>Shift+Enter</l0>, que insere un interruption de linea in le texto.
The "old" version of OmegaT will be overwritten, but any settings from it will be retained.
Le version "vetule" de OmegaT essera superscribite, ma alicun preparationes essera retenite.
The '*' character matches zero or more characters (the search term 'run*' would match 'run', 'runs', and 'running', for example).
Le character '*' concorda zero o plus de characteres (le expression de recerca 'run*' concordara pro exemplo 'run', 'runs', e 'running').
The '?' character matches exactly one character ('run?' would match 'runs' and 'rung', for example, but not 'run' or 'running').
Le character '?' concorda justo un character ('run?' concordara 'runs' e 'rung', exempli gratia ma non 'run' or 'running').
The '?' character matches exactly one character.
Le character '?' equala exactemente un character.
The /tm/ folder can contain any number of ancillary translation memories - i.e. tmx files.
Le plica /tm/ pote continer qualcunque numero de memorias de traduction auxiliar - id es files tmx.
The <a0>OmegaT</a0> file includes <a1>OmegaT</a1> specific formatting tags so that the file can be used in other <a2>OmegaT</a2> projects
Le file <a0>OmegaT</a0> include tags de formato specific <a1>OmegaT</a1> de maniera que on pote usar the file in altere projectos <a2>OmegaT</a2>
The <a0>OmegaT</a0> user is not forced to use Google Translate.
Le usator de <a0>OmegaT</a0> non es coercite a usar Google Translate.
The <e0>"-Duser.language=XX"</e0> argument causes <a1>OmegaT</a1> to use the language specified rather than the language of the user's operating system.
Le argumento <e0>"-Duser.language=XX"</e0> causa que <a1>OmegaT</a1> usa le lingua specificate plus tosto que le lingua del systema operative del usator.
The <e0>omegat</e0> subfolder contains at least one and possibly several other files.
Le sub plica <e0>omegat</e0> contine al minus un possibilemente plures altere files.
The <f0>project_stats.txt</f0> located in the omegat folder of your project contains more detailed segment information, broken down by file.
Le file <f0>project_stats.txt</f0> ubicate in le plica omegat de tu projecto, contine information plus detaliate re le segmentos, partite per cata file.
The <f1>project_save.tmx</f1> file contains all the segments that have been recorded in memory since you started the project.
Le file <f1>project_save.tmx</f1> contine omne le segmentos que esseva registrate in memoria depois que tu ha initiate le projecto.
The <f2>project_save.tmx</f2> files are then collected and possible conflicts as regards terminology for instance get resolved.
Le files <f2>project_save.tmx</f2> son alora colligite e per exemplo son resolute conflictos eventual re respectos del terminologia.
The <f3>level1</f3> and <f4>level2</f4> memories can be shared with users of other translation programs.
Le memorias<f3>level1</f3> e <f4>level2</f4>pote esser usate in commun con le usatores de altere programmas de traduction.
The <m0> <s1> <k2> <k3>Ctrl</k3> <k4>E</k4> </k2> </s1> <g5>Project</g5> <g6>Properties...</g6> </m0> dialog is used to define and modify the project folders and languages.
Le dialogo <m0> <s1> <k2> <k3>Ctrl</k3> <k4>E</k4> </k2> </s1> <g5>Projecto</g5> <g6>Proprietates...</g6> </m0> es usate pro definir e modificar le plicas e le linguas del projecto.
The <u5>FAQ </u5> is a good starting point for finding answers to questions you may have.
Le <u5>FAQ </u5> es un bon puncto de partita pro discoperir responsas a questiones que tu pote haber.
The <x0/> describes the color coding in detail.
Le <x0/> describe le codifica del color in detalio.
The Commit window will open and show the progress of the commit command.
Se aperira le fenestra Commit e monstrara le progresso del commando commit.
The Edit Pattern Dialog offers among others the following options:
Le Fenestra de dialogo Modifica Modello offere inter le alteres le optiones sequente:
The Edit menu itself contains the following items:
Le menu Modifica ipse contine le commandos sequente:
The Editing pane displays the "Instant Start" tutorial in English.
Le quadro pro Editar expone le parve instruction "Initio instantanee" in anglese.
The Editor pane displays the text of the partially translated document: the text already translated is displayed in translation while the untranslated text is displayed in the original language.
Le quadro Modifica monstra le texto del documento partialmente rendite: le texto ja rendite es displicate in traduction e le texto non rendite es monstrate in le lingua original.
The Glossary pane allows you to access your own collection of expressions and specialist terminology which you have built up in your glossary files.
Le quadro pro le Glossario permitte te de acceder a tu proprie collection de expressiones e terminologia specialistic que tu ha create in tu files glossario
The JRE is already installed on Mac OS X before Mac OS X 10.7
Le JRE es ja installate sur Mac OS X ante que Mac OS X 10.7
The LanguageTool plugin is included in OmegaT.
Le plugin LanguageTool es includite in OmegaT.
The Mac OS X equivalent is the application Terminal located in Applications → Utilities.
Le equivalente Mac OS X es le application Terminal ubicate in Applicationes → Utilitates.

The Match Statistics are tab-separated and you can use <g0>Ctrl+A <i1/></g0><g2>, Ctrl+C <i3/></g2>, <g4>Ctrl+V <i5/></g4> to copy/paste them, for instance into a spreadsheet or into your cost-accounting application.

Le Statisticas del Concordantia es tabellas del texto 'separate per signos de tabulation' e tu pote usar <g0>Ctrl+A <i1/></g0><g2>, Ctrl+C <i3/></g2>, <g4>Ctrl+V <i5/></g4> pro copiar e collar los, per exemplo in un folio de calculo o in tu application pro le computo del costos.
Le lista del disveloppatores de OmegaT.
Le gruppo del usator de OmegaT
Le interfacie del usator de OmegaT

Le filter PO generava un exception:
The Project Files </f1><f2>dialog will display your source document.
Le fenestra de dialogo Files del Projecto </f1><f2> monstrara tu documento fonte.
The Project Files Window displays the following information:
Le fenestra Files del Projecto monstra le information sequente:
The Project Files window is displayed, which is empty since your project does not yet contain any files.
Es exponite le fenestra "Files projecto", que es vacue pois que tu projecto nondum contine alicun file.
The Project Files window lists the project files and displays other project information.
Le fenestra Files del Projecto lista le files del projecto e monstra altere information de projecto.
The Scripting dialog allows you to load an existing script into the text area and run it against the current opened project.
Le Fenestra de dialogo Scripting te permitte de cargar un script existente in le area texto e lo exequer erga le projecto aperte currente.
The Scripting plugin for OmegaT can be downloaded from the <u0>OmegaT plugins download site</u0>.
Le plugin Scripting pro OmegaT pote esser discargate ex le sito de discarga del plugins de <u0>OmegaT</u0>.
The Spanish translation is better than the Slovenian.
Le traduction espaniol es melior que illa sloven.
The TMX file will continue to be loaded.
Le file TMX continuara a esser cargate.

Le file TMX non essera cargate Per favor proba a corriger le error e recarga le projecto.

Le lingua fonte del TMX ({0}) es differente del lingua fonte del projecto ({1}).
The Text Search window has quite powerful search functions.
Le fenestra de Cerca Texto ha assatis potente functiones de recerca.
The URL shown under Project Services will be used by SVN to connect clients to the SVN server you have just established.
Le URL monstrate sub Servicios de Projecto essera usate per SVN pro connecter le clientes al server SVN que tu ha justo establite.
The Unicode encoding (UTF8) is preferred for obvious reasons.
Le codification Unicode (UTF8) es ideal pro rationes obvie.
The above method somewhat impractical way of launching a program routinely.
Le methodo precedente es un via aliquanto impractic pro initiar de routine un programma.

Le recerca precedente trova omne le segmentos de destination que contine characteres, assatis improbabile in le destination - id es lingua sloven.
The administrator may decide to include following folders and their contents as well: <f0>tm</f0>, <f1>glossary</f1> and <f2>dictionary</f2>.
Le administrator pote decider pro comprender le plicas sequente e lor contentos assi como: <f0>tm</f0>, <f1>glossary</f1> e <f2>dictionary</f2>.

Le avantages de un systema VC pro un equipa de traductores in breve son:
The alternative is to enter a translation that is identical to the source text.
Le alternative es scriber un traduction identic al texto original.

The alternative is to have one single repository with subfolders <l0>Project1</l0>, <l1>Project2</l1>, etc., and share the common material via common <l2>tm</l2>, <l3>glossary</l3> and <l4>dictionary</l4> folders.
Le alternativa es haber un singule deposito con sub plicas<l0>Project1</l0>, <l1>Project2</l1>, etc., e le material commun via plicas <l2>tm</l2>, <l3>glossary</l3> e <l4>dictionary</l4> commun.
The alternative ways and means of dowloading and installing OmegaT are
Le alternative manieras e medios pro discargar e installar OmegaT es
The application runs on your machine only.
Le application functiona sur tu machina.
The argument <e0>pseudotranslatetype</e0> specifies, whether the target segments are to be equal to the source, or left empty.
Le argumento <e0>pseudotranslatetype</e0> specifica, si le segmentos final debe esser equal al fonte, o lassate vacue.
The author of the Chapter <e1>Learn to use OmegaT in 5 minutes!</e1> is Samuel Murray, Copyright ©2005-2012.
The author of the Chapter <e1>Learn to use OmegaT in 5 minutes!</e1> is Samuel Murray, Copyright ©2005-2012.
The basic command has already been mentioned above.
Le commando basic esseva ja mentionate precedentemente.
The basic idea is that the text is presented to you one segment at a time.
Le idea basic es que le texto es presentate a te un segmento al vice.
The basic rule is that the sequence of tags must be preserved in the same order.
Le regula basic es que le sequentia de tags debe esser conservate in le identic arrangiamento.
The best thing of course is to use OmegaT-specific TMX files (see above), so that the in-line formatting within the segment is retained.
Le melior cosa naturalmente es usar files TMX specific pro OmegaT (vide supra), de maniera que le es retenite le formato intra le segmento.

Le certificato es firmate per "Didier Briel".

Le traduction de equipa (in collaboration) offerite ab OmegaT es basate super le 'Functionalitate de version' o 'Controlo de revision', largemente utilisate ab le communitate de software pro mantener le controlo del cambios al codice de un programma e permitter le collaboration sin impedimentos intra le equipa de disveloppamento.

le commando pro lancear OmegaT es:

The content of the files is overwritten either when a new segment is opened (source.txt and target.txt) or when a new selection is exported (selection.txt).
Le contento del files es superscribite o quando un segmento nove es aperte (source.txt e target.txt) o quando a nove selection es exportate (selection.txt).
The content of the segment source text (<f0>source.txt</f0>).
Le texto contente in le segmento original (<f0>source.txt</f0>).
The content of the segment target text (<f0>target.txt</f0>).

Le contentos pote esser personalisate con le variabiles sequente:
The contents of glossary files are kept in memory and are loaded when the project is opened or reloaded.
Le contentos del files glossario es conservate in memoria e es cargate quando le projecto es aperte o recargate.
The contents of the checkout folder will be marked accordingly:
Le contentos del plica checkout essera marcate in consequentia:
The contents of the glossary pane will be updated accordingly.
Le contentos del quadro pro le Glossario essera renovate in consequentia.
The contents of the target subfolder will reflect the current state of the translation, as present in the project translation memory, saved in the current <e8>/omegat/project_save.tmx</e8>.
Sol alora le contentos del sub plica target reflectera le stato actual del traduction, como presente in le memoria de traduction del projecto, salvate in le file <e8>/omegat/project_save.tmx</e8>.
The contents of translation memories in the tm subfolder serve to generate suggestions for the text(s) to be translated.
Le contentos del memorias de traduction in le sub plica tm serve a generar suggestiones pro le texto(s) a traducer.

Le character de controlo correspondente a x

The created target documents are located in the <f0>target</f0> folder.
Le documentos final create es ubicate in le classificator <f0>target</f0> .
The current folder will be used instead.
Essera usate in vice le classificator currente.
The current version of the service is based on usage, with the price of 20 USD per million characters at the time of writing.
The current version of the service is based on usage, with the price of 20 USD per million characters at the time of writing.
The data are exported when the segment is opened.
Le datos es exportate quando le segmento es aperte.
The default OmegaT shortcuts are available from Sourceforge: <u0>Default OmegaT Shortcuts</u0>
Le vias breve initial de OmegaT es disponibile ex Sourceforge: <u0>Vias breve initial de OmegaT</u0>

Le vias breve initial de OmegaT pro le Mac es alsi disponibile ex Sourceforge, illos usa omne "meta" in vice de "ctrl": <u0>Vias breve initial de OmegaT pro le Mac</u0>
The dialog can be accessed via the <i0/><m1> <g2>Options</g2> <g3>Font...</g3> </m1> item in the Main menu.

The dialog to create a project is the same as to edit the project.
Le dialogo pro crear un projecto es le mesme que pro editar le projecto.
The difference between "Number of segments" and "Number of unique segments" provides an approximate idea of the number of repetitions in the text.
Le differentia inter "Numero de segmentos" e "Numero de segmentos unic" provide un idea approximative del numero del repetitiones in le texto.
The displayed text is split into segments and you may scroll through the document and double-click on any segment to open and edit it.
Le texto monstrate es fisse in segmentos e tu pote rolar a a transverso del documento e cliccar duo vices sur cata segmento pro aperir e modificar lo.

Le contentos exportate son copiate al file <f1>selection.txt</f1> ubicate in le files del preferentia del usator (vide <x2/>).

Le file <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> contine omne le segmentos que esseva rendite depois que tu initiava tu projecto.

Le file pote habitualmente esser extrahite per clic duplice sur le pacchetto discargate.
The file does not need to exist when setting it, it will be created (if necessary) when adding a glossary entry.
Le file non debe exister quando on prepara lo, illo essera create (si necessari) quando on addera le prime entrata del glossario.

Le files appare in le sub plica /script in le plica del files del usator de OmegaT, and include:

Le files es files de texto simple non formattate.

Le prime exemplo in sequito ha 3 gruppos de tag (un par, un singulo, e pois un altere par), le secunde exemplo ha un gruppo solmente (un par).

Le primo es le via breve pro <g0>Aperi Projecto</g0>, le secunde pro <g1>Crea entrata del glossario</g1>.

Le prime segmento e su contentos essera classificate como "no match", e le resto de illos como un repetition del primo.

Le primo, pro initiar, usa un simple file MS Word in le lingua initial.
