The install program can create shortcuts for you in the start
Le programma de installation pote te crear vias breve in le menu de
The items are not separated with a TAB character.
Le articulos non es separate con un character de tabulation.
The language code should be in the form xx-YY, xxx-YY, xx_YY or xxx_YY, where xx or xxx is the language code and YY is the region or country code (optional).
Le codice del lingua deberea esser in le forma xx-YY, xxx-YY, xx_YY o xxx_YY, ubi xx o xxx es le codice del lingua e YY es le codice del region o del pais (facultative).
The last frame offers you to have a look at the readme and changes files for the version you have installed.
Le quadro ultime offere te un reguardo al files readme e changes pro le version que tu ha installate.
The last segment with the identical source text will thus prevail (Note: of course it makes more sense to avoid this to happen in the first place).
Assi prevalera le ultime segmento con le identic texto fonte (Note: naturalmente ha plus senso evitar que isto occurre in le prime posto).
The legacy material provided for the purpose of this tutorial is intended to demonstrate the functions of OmegaT.
Le material hereditage fornite pro iste parve instruction es designate a demonstrar le functiones de OmegaT.
The level 2 export is not fully compliant with the level 2 standard, but is sufficiently close and will generate correct matches in other translation memory tools supporting TMX Level 2.

Le exportation nivello 2 non es plenmente conforme con le standard nivello 2, ma es satis prope e generara concordantias correcte in altere applicationes memoria de traduction que supporta le TMX nivello 2.
The level1 file contains only textual information.
Le file level1 contine sol information textual.

The level2 file encapsulates <a0>OmegaT</a0> specific tags in correct tmx tags so that the file can be used with its formatting information in a translation tool that supports tmx level 2 memories, or <a1>OmegaT</a1> itself.

Le file level2 incapsula specific tags <a0>OmegaT</a0> in correcte tags tmx a fin que on pote usar le file con su information de formato in un instrumento de traduction que supporta memorias tmx nivello 2, o ipse <a1>OmegaT</a1>.
The line with the matching percentage also includes the name of the translation memory <i1/> containing the match.
Le linea con le percentage del concordantia include alsi le nomine del of memoria de traduction <i1/> continente le concordantia.
The location does not matter, since you can add it to the command line at launch (see below).
Le ubication non face substantia, pois que tu pote adder lo al linea de commando al lanceamento (vide in sequito).
The location does not matter, since you can add it to the command line at startup.
Le ubication non face substantia, pois que tu pote adder lo al linea de commando al lanceamento.
The location does not matter, since you have to add it to the command line at the start-up anyway.
Le ubication non face substantia, pois que tu debe adder lo al linea de commando al lanceamento in omne caso.
The location is irrelevant, since it must be specified explicitly on the command-line at launch.
Le ubication es irrelevante, pois que illo debe esser specificate explicitemente sur le linea de commando al lanceamento.
The location of the file must be within the <f1>/glossary</f1>folder, but it can be in a deeper folder (e.g., <f2>glossary/sub/glossary.txt</f2>).
Le ubication del file debe esser intra le classificator <f1>/glossary </f1> , ma illo pote esser in un plica plus profunde (e.g., <f2>glossary/sub/glossary.txt</f2>).
The location of the writable glossary file can be set in the <g0>Project > Properties ... </g0>dialog.
Le ubication del file glossario scribibile pote esser imponite in le fenestra de dialogo <g0>Projecto > Proprietates ... </g0>.
The location of user files depends upon the platform you use:
Le ubication del files del usator depende del platteforma que tu usa:
The locations of the various different translation memories for a given project are user-defined (see Project dialog window in <l0>Project properties)</l0>
Le locationes del varie differente memorias de traduction pro un projecto date son definite per le usator (vide le fenestra de dialogo Projecto in <l0>Proprietates del Projecto)</l0>
The machine translation pane, when opened, contains the suggestions by machine translation tools for the current segment.
Le quadro del Traduction Automatic, quando aperte, contine le suggestiones ex instrumentos de traductor automatic pro le segmento currente.
The main menu provides access to all <a0>OmegaT</a0> functions.
Le menu principal provide accesso a omne functiones de <a0>OmegaT</a0>.
The main project folder contains 3 tmx files, <f0>project_name-omegat.tmx</f0>, <f1>project_name-level1.tmx</f1> and <f2>project_name-level2.tmx</f2> (project_name being the name of your project).
Le plica principal del projecto contine 3 files tmx, <f0>project_name-omegat.tmx</f0>, <f1>project_name-level1.tmx</f1> e <f2>project_name-level2.tmx</f2> (project_name es le nomine de tu projecto).
The main window consists of several panes, the main menu and a status bar.
Le principal fenestra consiste in plure quadros, le menu principal e un barra de stato.
The match statistics are accessed via<g0>Tools>Match Statistics.</g0> The evaluation is rather CPU intensive and can be time-consuming, so a progress bar is shown during the calculation.

Le statisticas del concordantia es accedite via<g0>Instrumentos>Statisticas del Concordantia.</g0> Le evalutation es assatis intensive pro le CPU e pote necessitar molto tempore, ergo es monstrate un barra de avantiamento durante le calculation.

The match viewer shows the most similar segments from translation memories, both from internal project translation memory created in real time as you translate your project and from ancillary translation memories you have imported from your earlier jobs, or received from your client or translation agency.

Le quadro del concordantias monstra le segmentos le plus similabile, sia ex le memoria de traduction del projecto interne create in tempore actual como tu rende tu projecto e ex memorias de traduction auxiliar que tu ha importate ex tu obras precedente, o recipite ex tu cliente o agentia del traduction.
The matches will be displayed in bold blue.
Le concordantias essera marcate in azur hardite.
The matching percentage is roughly equivalent to taking the number of common words in the matched and the matching segment and dividing by the number of words in the longer of the two.
Le percentage de concordantia es grosso modo equivalente a prender le numero de parolas commun in le segmentos concordate e divider los per le numero de parolas in le plus longe del duos.
The memory named <f5>omegat</f5> can be used by OmegaT itself, in future projects that you create.
Le memoria nominate <f5>omegat</f5> pote esser usate in OmegaT ipse, in projectos futur que tu creara.
The messages you would usually find in the status bar are not displayed.
Le messages que tu trovarea habitualmente in le barra de stato non son monstrate.
The most current info about OmegaT can be found at
On pote trovar le plus actual informationes circa OmegaT a
The most frequently used functions are accessible with keyboard shortcuts, so once you become accustomed to them, you will no longer need to browse through the menus while translating.

Le functiones le plus frequentemente usate es accessibile con vias breve del claviero, assi un vice que tu deveni accostumate a illos, tu non necessitara plus navigar a transverso del menus durante que tu traduce.
The most important file here is the <f1>project_save.tmx, </f1>that is the working translation memory for the project.
Le plus importante file hic es le <f1>project_save.tmx, </f1>que es le memoria de traduction operative pro le projecto.
The most important is <l1><project-dir></l1>, and optionally<l2> --config-dir=<config-dir>.
Le plus importante es <l1><project-dir></l1>, e optionalmente<l2> --config-dir=<config-dir>.
The most important of these is <l0><project-dir></l0>, and optionally <l1>--config-dir=<config-dir></l1>.
Le plus importante de istos es <l0><project-dir></l0>, e optionalmente <l1>--config-dir=<config-dir></l1>.
The names of the files must correspond to the language code of your target language as defined in the project properties dialog (<g0>Project > Properties</g0>).
Le nomines del files debe exactemente corresponder al codice del lingua de tu lingua final como definite in le fenestra de dialogo Proprietates del projecto (<g0>Project > Properties</g0>).
The new document may be serialized (output) by the processor in standard XML syntax or in another format, such as HTML or plain text.
Le nove documento pote esser convertite (output) per le processor in syntaxe standard XML o in un altere formato, assi como le HTML o le texto plan.
The new set of rules will be stored together with the project and will not interfere with the general set of segmentation rules.
Le nove serie de regulas essera registrate conjunctemente con le projecto e non interferera con le serie general de regulas de segmentation.
The newer versions of MultiTerm support exporting to TBX format.
Le versiones plus nove de MultiTerm supporta le exportation al formato TBX.
The next segment with a note attached to it, will open.
Le segmento successive con un nota, aperira.
The next thing to do is to confirm what you found with other users, to make
Le proxime cosa a facer es confirmar lo que tu ha discoperte con altere usuarios, pro
The number of unique segments, if needed, is provided in the standard statistics window, regardless of whether they have been translated or not.
Le numero de segmentos unic, si il necessita, es supplite in le fenestra del statisticas standard, sin reguardo re illos esseva rendite o non.
The numbers must be exactly the same between the source and the target matches.
Le numeros debe esser identic inter le concordantias original e los final.
The omegat folder contains the <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> and possibly a number of backup TMX files.
Le plica omegat contine le <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> e possibilemente plure files TMX de reserva.
The on-screen download instructions should be self-explanatory.
Le instructiones de discarga su-schermo deberea esser auto-explicative.
The one and the same segment may, depending on the context, require different translations.
Le mesme segmento pote, dependente del contexto, requirer traductiones distincte.
The online version of Google Translate allows the user to correct the suggestion and send the corrected segment in.
Le version in interrete de Google Translate permitte le usator a corriger le suggestion e inviar le segmento correcte.
The only difference with matches from the <f2>project_save</f2> translation memory is that external TMs cannot give exact matches, only 100%.
Le sol differentia con le concordantias ex le memoria de traduction <f2>project_save</f2> es que le TMs externe non pote dar concordantias exacte, ma sol 100%.
The open source LanguageTool can be used to correct common grammatical and stylistic mistakes.
Le application open source LanguageTool pote esser usate pro corriger commun errores grammatical e stilistic.
The original document is not changed; rather, a new document is created based on the content of an existing one.
Le documento original non es cambiate; plus tosto, un documento nove es create basate super le contento de uno existente.

The pages listed here have been selected as suitable examples (and the “legacy” files have been created to correspond to them), but changes to them may make them less suitable, and they may even disappear or move elsewhere.

Le paginas ci listate esseva seligite como exemplos convenibile (e le files “hereditage” esseva create pro corresponder a illos), ma cambios su illos pote los facer minus convenibile, e illos pote mesmo disparer o mover se alterubi.
The penalty applies to all three match percentages: matches 75, 80, 90 will in this case be lowered to 45, 50, 60.
Le penalitate refere a omne le tres percentual de concordantia: concordantias 75, 80, 90 essera in iste caso diminuite a 45, 50, 60.

The permissions you give to this version (which may appear as "unrestricted access to the computer") are identical to the permissions you give to the local version, i.e., they allow access to the hard drive of the computer.
Durante le installation, dependente de tu systema operative, tu pote reciper plure advertimentos de securitate.
The permissions you give to this version (which might be mentioned as an
Le permissiones que tu da a iste version (le qual on poterea mentionar como un
The platform-independent package can be used on any platform with a working Java 1.6 runtime environment, including the platforms for which a specific package also exists.
Le pacchetto independente ab platteformas pote esser usate sur omne platteforma con un ambiente runtime Java 1.6 functionante, includite le platteformas pro le qual existe alsi un pacchetto specific.
The possible keyevents (keys) are listed in the following Java 1.6 documentation from Oracle: <u0>Java 1.6 keyEvents description</u0>
Le possibile evento del clave(s) es listate in le documentation sequente de Java 1.6 ex Oracle: <u0>Java 1.6 vias breve e eventos de clave,</u0>>
The predominant way of segmenting the sources is the sentence-level segmenting, so this check box should in a normal case be left checked.
Le maniera prevalente del segmentation del fontes es le segmentation a nivello de phrase, ita iste quadrato de controlo deberea in caso normal restar marcate.
The prefix (per default empty) can be used to tag translations, done via fuzzy matches.
Le prefixo (per arrangiamento initial vacue) pote esser usate pro etiquettar le traductiones, facite con concordantias partial.
The previous segment with a note will open.
Le segmento previe con un nota, aperira.
The procedure presented here relies on the free SVN server (limited to 2 users) offered by <u0>ProjectLocker</u0>.
Le procedura presentate ci fide sur le server SVN gratuite (limitate a 2 usatores) offerite per <u0>ProjectLocker</u0>.
The procedures described in Project 1, Steps <f2>7.A.1-7.A.4,</f2><f3> all apply here too, for HTML files.</f3>
Le proceduras describite in Project 1, Passos <f2>7.A.1-7.A.4,</f2><f3> es totes applicabile alsi ci, pro le files HTML.</f3>
The program will see confirmation before closing down.
Le programma videra le confirmation ante que clauder.
The project and TMX source languages should of course be identical - NL in our example.
Le linguas fonte del projecto e del TMX deberea naturalmente esser identic: - NL, in nostre exemplo.
On non pote verificar le projecto
The project folder {0} is missing and could not be created.
Le classificator del projecto {0} es perdite e non es possibile lo crear.
The project in the example is evidently finished, as all the unique segments have been translated.
Le projecto in le exemplo es evidentemente finite, como omne le segmentos unic esseva jam rendite.
The project setting allows one can enter a name for a writable glossary file (see beginning of this chapter).
Le preparation del projecto permitte le entrata de un nomine pro un file glossario scribibile (vide initio de iste capitulo).
The purpose of the console (i.e. command line) mode is to permit the use <a0>of OmegaT</a0> as translation tool in a scripting environment.
Le proposito del modo consola id es linea de commando) es pro permitter le uso <a0>de OmegaT</a0> como instrumento de traduction in un ambiente de script.
The purpose of the console mode is to use OmegaT as a translation tool in a scripting environment.
OmegaT in modo linea de commando

The quality of the Google Translate translation depends on one side on the reservoir of target-language texts and the availability of their bilingual versions, on the other hand on the quality of the models built.

Le qualitate del traduction de Google Translate depende sur un latere sur le reservoir de textos del lingua de destination e le disponibilitate de lor versiones bilingue, del altere parte sur le qualitate del modellos construite.
The regular expressions (or regex for short) used in searches and segmentation rules are those supported by Java.
Le expressiones regular (o in breve regex) usate in le regulas de recercas e de segmentation son illos supportate per Java.

The relevant files <l2>filters.conf</l2> and <l3>segmentation.conf</l3> can be found in the user home folder (E.g. <l4>C:\Documents and Settings\%User%\<a5>OmegaT</a5></l4> under Windows, <l6>%user%/.omegat/</l6> under Linux)

Le files pertinente <l2>filters.conf</l2> e <l3>segmentation.conf</l3> pote esser trovate in le plica principal del usator (Per exemplo <l4>C:\Documents and Settings\%User%\<a5>OmegaT</a5></l4> sub Windows, <l6>%user%/.omegat/</l6> sub Linux)

The relevant files are <l2>filters.conf</l2> and <l3>segmentation.conf</l3> and can be found in the user home folder (e.g. <l4>C:\Documents and Settings\%User%\<a5>OmegaT</a5></l4> under Windows, <l6>%user%/.omegat/</l6> under Linux)

Le files pertinente son <l2>filters.conf</l2> e <l3>segmentation.conf</l3> e pote esser trovate in le plica domo del usator (per exemplo <l4>C:\Documents and Settings\%User%\<a5>OmegaT</a5></l4> sub Windows, <l6>%user%/.omegat/</l6> sub Linux)
The repository is empty at this moment.
Le deposito es vacue in iste momento.
The rest of the categories (50-100%) involves untranslated segments with a fuzzy match.
Le resto del categorias (50-100%) involve le segmentos non rendite con un concordantia partial.
The result will thus depend on the order in which the source segments have been loaded.
Le resultato dependera assi ab le ordine in le qual le segmentos fonte esseva cargate.
The resulting TMX is stored in the <f1>/omegat/</f1> folder under the name <f2>align.tmx</f2>.
Le TMX resultante es immagazinate in le plica <f1>/omegat/</f1> sub le nomine <f2>align.tmx</f2>.
The resulting tmx is stored in the <l1>omegat </l1>folder under the name <f2>align.tmx</f2>.
Le TMX resultante es immagazinate in le plica <l1>omegat</l1> sub le nomine <f2>align.tmx</f2>.
The resulting tmx is stored in the <l1>omegat</l1> folder under the name <f2>align.tmx</f2>.
Le TMX resultante es immagazinate in le plica <l1>/omegat/</l1> sub le nomine <f2>align.tmx</f2>.
The rule-based segmentation is usually synonymous with sentence-based segmentation.
Le segmentation basate super le regulas es habitualmente synonyme con le segmentation basate super le phrases.
The rules applied (if any) will depend on the source and target language of the project.
Le regulas applicate (si ulle) dependera ex le lingua primari e final del projecto.
The search string will be treated as a regular expression.
Le linea de character de recerca essera tractate como un expression regular.
The search window consists of a text field for search strings or keywords, flags and radio buttons for setting up the search and a display area containing the results of the search.
Le Fenestra de Recerca consiste de un campo de texto pro lineas o parolas clave, e buttones pro le preparation del recerca e un area de monstra continente le resultatos del recerca.
The second command is the command which actually launches <a1>OmegaT</a1>.
Le secunde commando es le commandoque lancea in veritate <a1>OmegaT</a1>.
The second of these chapters describes the various subfolders and files in a translation project and their role as well as other user and application files associated with OmegaT.
Le secundo de iste capitulos describe le varie subcamisas e files in un projecto de traduction e lor rolo, assi como altere files del usator e application associate con OmegaT.
The second project uses an HTML file or set of files, downloaded from the Internet, and demonstrates OmegaT's capability to deal with graphics, <s0/>complex layout, and complex file structure.

Le secunde projecto usa un file o un gruppo de files HTML, discargate ex le Interrete, e demonstra le capacitate de OmegaT de tractar con graphicos, <s0/>arrangiamentos complexe, e structuras del files complexe.
The segment is opened when its segment number is entered.
Le segmento es aperte quando su numero de segmento es inscribite.
The segmentation rules are generally valid across all the projects.
Le regulas del segmentation son generalmente valide trans tote le projectos.
The segmentation settings only address the way the source files are handled by <a0>OmegaT</a0>.
Le preparationes del segmentation adressa sol le maniera con le qual le Files fonte son tractate per <a0>OmegaT</a0>.
The segments are displayed in order of appearance in the project.
Le segmentos son monstrate in ordine de apparition in le projecto.
The selected fuzzy match is highlighted in bold, words that are missing in the segment you are translating are colored blue and words adjacent to the missing parts green.
Le concordantia partial seligite es marcate in nigrato, le parolas que es mancante in le segmento que tu es rendente es colorate azur e le parolas adjacente al partes mancante in verde.
The selected languages will then be installed and will eventually appear in your spell checker setup window (this may take a while).
Le linguas seligite alora essera installate e eventualmente apparera in tu fenestra de preparation del corrector orthographic (isto pote prender un lapso).
The separators between the panes can be dragged to resize panes.
Quando isto is facite le quadros monstra un linguetta al summitate.
The server can exist in the local network but in the majority of cases it will be available on internet, i.e. via URL address.
Le server pote exister in le rete local, ma in le majoritate del casos illo essera disponibile sur interrete, id es via un adresse URL.
The server keeps the information on checkouts, so that later commits (see below) can be performed in an orderly fashion.
Le server retene le informationes discargate durante le discarga, de maniera que plus tarde le consigna (vide in infra) pote esser exequite in un maniera ordinate.
The server makes sure that any conflicting changes, due to two members working on the same checked-out contents, will be resolved.
Le server assecura se que omne cambios que conflige, per duo membros que opera sur le mesme contentos discargate, essera resolute.
The set of <e0>Unique </e0>segments is computed by taking all the segments and removing all duplicate segments.
Le serie de segmentos <e0>Unic </e0>es computate per retener omne le segmentos e remover omne le segmentos duplicate.
The settings in your project indicate which is the source and which the target language.
Le preparationes in tu projecto indica qual es le lingua fonte e qual le lingua de destination.
The shortcut characters used try to reflect the underlying meaning of the tag (e.g. b for bold, i for italics, etc.)
Le characteres de connexion usate tende a reflecter le natural significato del tag (exempli gratia b pro bold, i pro italics, etc.)
The shortcut definition file must be named <f0>MainMenuShortcuts.properties</f0> and must contain at most one shortcut definition per line.
Le file definition de via breve debe esser nominate <f0>MainMenuShortcuts.properties</f0> e debe continer al maximo un definition de via breve definition per cata linea.

The shortcut definition syntax is the following: <c0><menu item code>=<shortcut></c0>, where <e1><menu item code></e1> is a code taken from the tables below and <e2><shortcut></e2> is a combination of pressed keys specified by the user

Le syntaxe de definition del via breve es le sequente: <c0><codice del commando del menu>=<via breve></c0>, ubi <e1><codice del commando del menu></e1> es un codice ex le tabellas sequente e <e2><via breve></e2> es un combination de percussiones de clave specificate per le usator
The shortcut selects the Nth match displayed in the match window (the first match is selected by default)
Le via breve selige le concordantia #N monstrate in le Quadro del concordantia (le prime concordantia es seligite per arrangiamento initial)
The simplest way to launch OmegaT, however, is to execute the<e0> <a1>OmegaT</a1>.exe</e0> program.
Le maniera plus simple pro lancear OmegaT, comocunque, es executar le programma <e0> <a1>OmegaT</a1>.exe</e0>.
The solution in our example is to copy the existing translation memory into the tm subfolder and rename it ZH_CN.tmx to indicate the target language of the tmx.
Le solution in nostre exemplo es de copiar le memoria de traduction existente in le sub plica /tm e renominar lo ZH_CN.tmx pro indicar le lingua de destination del TMX.
The source file language entered is invalid!
Le lingua del file primari inscribite es invalide!
The source segment and the fuzzy matches must contain the same list of numbers
Le segmento fonte e le concordantias partial debe continer le identic lista de numeros

The source segment in the example below was “<e0>Context menu command</e0>”, as in the Fuzzy Matches example above, and the terms shown were found in the glossaries, available (Microsoft's Term collection and Slovenian Linux User group Glossary).

Le segmento original in le exemplo sequente era “<e0>Commando del menu contexto</e0>”, como in le exemplo de concordantias partial precedente, e le terminos monstrate esseva trovate in le glossarios, disponibile (Microsoft's Term collection e Slovenian Linux User group Glossary).
The source subfolder contains files to be translated.
Le sub plica /source contine le files a traducer.
The source term does not have to be a single-word item, as the next example shows:
Le termino primari non debe esser un articulo de un sol parola, como monstra le exemplo sequente:

The spell checker uses the target language code to determine the language to be used : if the target language is Brazilian Portuguese (PT_BR), the subfolder with vocabularies must contain the two vocabulary files, called <e0>pt_br.aff</e0> and <e1>pt_br.dic</e1>.

Le corrector orthographic usa le codice del lingua final pro determinar le lingua a usar: si le lingua final es brasilian portugese (PT_BR), le subclassificator con le vocabularios debe continer le duo files vocabulario nominate <e0>pt_br.aff</e0> and <e1>pt_br.dic</e1>.
The statistics shown is available as a tab-separated <f1>project_stats.txt</f1> file (subfolder <f2>omegat</f2>), ready to be loaded into a spreadsheet program for the user's convenience.

Le statisticas monstrate es disponibile como un file 'separate per signos de tabulation' <f1>project_stats.txt</f1> (sub plica <f2>omegat</f2>), preste a esser cargate in un programma de folio de calculo pro le commoditate del usator.
The statistics window - accessed via <e0>Tools>Statistics </e0>- shows the statistics of the current OmegaT project, both in the summary form as well as in detail for every file to be translated.
Le fenestra del statisticas - accedite con <e0>Instrumentos>Statisticas </e0>- monstra le statisticas del projecto OmegaT actual, sia in le forma summario sia in detalio pro cata file a traducer.
The status bar displays work-flow related messages at the bottom of the main window.
Le barra de stato monstra messages pertinente le fluxo de labor al fundo del fenestra principal.
The structure of folders and subfolders must be retained.
Le structura del plicas e del sub plicas debe esser retenite.
The syntax of the language pattern conforms to regular expression syntax.
Le syntaxe del schema del lingua conforma al syntaxe del expression regular.
The system maintains versioning for data shared
Le systema gere le controlo de version pro le datos in commun
The table provides a summary of web pages available, for which our tutorial's “legacy” files have been constructed:
Le tabula provide un summario de paginas TTT disponibile, pro le qual nostre files “hereditage” del parve instruction esseva struite:
The tag validation window detects and lists any tag errors and inconsistencies in the translation.
Le fenestra de validation del tag releva e lista omne errores del tag e contradictiones in le traduction.
The tags consist of one to three characters and a number.
Le tags consiste de uno a tres characteres e un numero.
The tags in OmegaT are greyed, so they are easy to recognise.
Le tags in OmegaT es gris, assi illos es facile a recognoscer.
The target filename pattern uses a special syntax, so if you wish to edit this field, you must click <e0>Edit...</e0>and use the <i1/>Edit Pattern Dialog.
Le modello nomine de file de destination usa un syntaxe special, assi si tu desidera modificar iste campo, tu debe cliccar <e0>Modifica...</e0>e usar le <i1/>Fenestra de dialogo del Modifica Modello.
The target text entered after that will be treated as an alternative translation of the source segment.
Le texto final inscribite post que essera tractate ut un traduction alternative del segmento original.
The team can also use the same subfolder structure for the target files.
Le equipa pote alsi usar le mesme structura de sub plica pro le files final.
The term "Move to inside segment" means, that the cursor moves to the beginning of the segment if it was previously before the segment, and to the end of the segment if it was previously after it.
Le termino "mover se a le interior del segmento" significa, que le cursor se move al comenciamento del segmento si il esseva avante que le segmento, e al fin del segmento si il esseva depost.
The text export function exports data from within the current <a0>OmegaT</a0> project to plain text files.
Le function Exporta texto, exporta datos ex le projecto actual de <a0>OmegaT</a0> in files de texto simple.
The text highlighted by the user, when <k0>Ctrl+Shift+C</k0> is pressed or <g1>Edit > Export Selection</g1> is selected (<f2>selection.txt</f2>).
Le texto marcate per le usator, quando es calcate <k0>Ctrl+Shift+C</k0> o es seligite <g1>Modifica > Exporta le Selection</g1> (<f2>selection.txt</f2>).
The text is exported to a plain text file.
Le texto es exportate in un file de texto simple.
The third column can be used for additional information.
Le tertie columna pote esser usate pro information additional.
The tmx file can be given any name you specify.
Al file TMX pote esser date omne nomine que tu attribue.
The top match is 100%, because all words match.
Le concordantia summe es 100%, proque omne parolas concorda.
The translated documents are automatically generated in their original format in the <f0>/target </f0>folder.
Le documentos rendite es automaticamente generate in lor formato original in le plica <f0>/target </f0>.

Le lingua del file rendite inscribite es invalide!

Le traduction in iste TMX pote esser o

Al traductor essera monstrate traductiones anglese pro le segmentos fonte in nederlandese e usa los pro crear le traduction chinese.

le duo entratas requirite es disponibile in tu <u1>pagina del conto</u1> sub clave del conto Primari e Customer-ID:

The upper part is in the source language, in bold characters with a green background color, the lower part is the editing field, ended by a marker: <i0/>the marker is <l1><segment nnnn></l1> where nnnn is a number of the segment in the project.

Le parte superior es in le lingua original, in characteres nigrate con un color de fundo verde, le parte inferior es le campo de modifica, terminate per un marcator: <i0/>le marcator es <l1><segment nnnn></l1> ubi nnnn es le un numero del segmento in le projecto.
The user group also serves as the main point of contact between users and the project team.
Le Gruppo del usatores alsi servi como le principal puncto de contacto inter usatores e equipa del projecto.
The user manual is an HTML document with links to different chapters.
Le manual del usator es un documento HTML con ligamines a capitulos varie.
The user manual is in the package you just downloaded, you can access it from
Le manual del usuario es in le pacchetto que tu ha justo discargate, tu pote lo acceder ab

Le manual del usator es ubicate in le sub plica /docs sub le plica de installation de OmegaT, assi tu potera, per exemplo, examinar le documentation anglese per aperir le file <f0>docs/en/index.html </f0>in tu lector.

The user who needs to handle MS Office files will find it helpful to convert them using Open Office free software; the files can can then be saved in a Microsoft format, if desired, after the translation is finished.

Le usator qui necessita manear files MS Office trovara adjuvante los converter CON le programma gratuite Open Office que lege le formatos MS e los converte in 'open format'; postquam le traduction es clause, le files pote esser salvate, si desiderate, in un formato Microsoft.

Le usator, tamen, pote necessitar de generar un serie de regulas, specific pro le projecto in question.
The vocabulary entry can have a comment added.
Le entrata del vocabulario pote haber addite un commento.
The whole process can be steered and controlled via Tck/Tcl-based scripting.
Le processo integre pote esser governate e controlate con scriptes basate sur Tck/Tcl.

Alora in le traduction ab le francese canadian tu projecto usara omne le regulas definite for omne le catena del lingua in le correcte arrangiamento.

Pois tu necessita un traduction in per exemplo chinese, ma tu traductor non comprende le nederlandese; illa, comocunque, comprende a perfection le anglese.

Eo, sur le linea de commando, scribe:
There are a number of restrictions:
There are actually three match estimates available (66/66/30 in the case of the match #4 above).
Il ha in veritate tres concordantia estimate disponibile (66/66/30 in le caso del concordantia #4 precedente).
There are basically two types of file formats, plain text and formatted text.
Il ha in fundo duo typos de formatos de file, texto simple e texto formattate.
There are essentially two ways in which you can do this.
On ha essentialmente duo manieras pro lo far.
There are no terms in the current segment which match any terms in the glossary.
Il non ha nulle terminos in le segmento currente que concorda con alicun terminos in le glossario.
There are several methods to specify the file's encoding so that its contents are not garbled when opened in <a0>OmegaT</a0>.
Il ha plure methodos pro specificar le codification del file de maniera que su contentos non es alterate quando aperte in <a0>OmegaT</a0>.
There are two possibilities to run an SVN server: you can install SVN on your own server or you can use a hosted service.
Il ha duo possibilitates pro exequer un server SVN: tu pote install SVN sur tu proprie server o tu pote usar un servicio hospite.
There are two strategies for segments that contain only such invariable text.
Il ha duo strategias pro le segmentos que contine solmente tal texto invariabile.
There are two ways of launching <a1>OmegaT</a1> using the command line.
Il ha duo manieras de lancear <a1>OmegaT</a1> usante le linea de commando.
There is no EXACT match between the glossary entry and the source text in your document - for instance plurals.
Il non ha concordantia EXACTE inter le entrata del glossario e le texto original in tu documento - per exemplo plurales.
There is no need to instruct OmegaT to use a particular spelling dictionary; OmegaT will use the correct language dictionary based upon the language codes of your project.
Il non ha alicun necesse a instruer OmegaT pro usar un particular dictionario orthographic; OmegaT usara le dictionario del correcte lingua in base al codices del lingua de tu projecto.
There may be cases where you have done a project with e.g. Dutch sources, and a translation in say English.
Poterea esser le casos ubi tu ha facite un projecto con per exemplo fontes nederlandese, e un translation in anglese.
There should be three files, with extensions <e1>dz, idx </e1>and <e2>ifo</e2>.
Ibi deberea esser tres files, con extensiones <e1>dz, idx </e1>e <e2>ifo</e2>.
There you will learn how translation memories, glossaries, and the search function work.
Illac tu apprendera como opera le memorias de traduction, le glossarios, e le function de recerca.
Therefore, the location of OmegaT's configuration folder cannot be reliably determined.
Dunque, le location del plica de configuration de OmegaT non pote esser determinate con bastante confidentia.
These are the files present in the Source files folder in a format that OmegaT is able to recognize.
Istos es le files presente in le plica /source in un formato que OmegaT es habile a recognoscer.
These capabilities can be used regardless of the file type (.odt, .txt, .html, etc.).
Iste capacitates pote esser usate in qualcunque typo de file (.odt, .txt, .html, et cetera).
These files are copies of the file <f0>project_save.tmx</f0>, i.e. of the project's main translation memory, excluding the so-called orphan segments.
Iste files es copias del file <f0>project_save.tmx</f0>, id es del memoria de traduction del projecto principal, sin le si-appellate segmentos orphane.

These three are certain:

Death, taxes, and page not found.

You, victim of one.

Tres es le cosas certe:

Le morte, le impostos, la pagina non trovate.

Tu, es victima de uno.
These translation memories can be very useful when a document that has already been translated needs to be updated.
Iste memorias de traduction pote esser multo utile in un documento jam rendite, que necessita de actualisation.
Illos meliora alsi la concordantia del glossario.
They are displayed as <EMPTY> in the Editor.
illos es monstrate como <EMPTY> in le Editor.
They are not able to contain or retain information regarding the color, font etc of the text.
Illos non es habile a continer o servar information re le color, typo de character etc. del texto.
They are protected, so that you cannot modify their contents, but you can delete them, enter them by hand or move them around in the target sentence.
Illos son sin protection, assi tu pote deler illos, inscriber illos a mano o mover illos circum le phrase final.
They are the files you deal with on a daily basis while translating.
Illos es le files que tu tracta sur un base quotidian dum tu rende.
They can share common material, like project translation memory and its glossary
Illes pote usar material in commun, como la memorias de traduction del projecto e su glossarios
They can then create their own projects and, deliver their own <f1>project_save.tmx</f1>, when finished or when a given milestone has been reached.
Illes pote ergo crear lor proprie projectos e, committer lor proprie <f1>project_save.tmx</f1>, quando finite o quando un certe petra milliari columna milliari esseva arrivate.
They carry appropriately changed names, so that its contents still remain identifiable, when used elsewhere, for instance in the <f1>tm</f1> subfolder of some other project (see below).

Illos porta nomines appropriatemente cambiate, de sorta que su contentos remane adhuc identificabile, quando alibi usate, per exemplo in le sub plica <f1>tm</f1> de alicun altere projecto (vide in sequito).
They contain the one and the same translation memory contents in different forms, to be used in future projects.
Illos contine un identic memoria de traduction in formas differente, pro ser usate in projectos futur.

They may be within the current project (either in the text you are currently translating or, where a project comprises more than one source text, in another text within the same project), or they may be in the legacy .tmx file(s) which you placed in the <f0>/tm</f0> folder.

Illos pote esser intra le projecto currente (sia in le texto que es tu actual traduction sia, ubi un projecto include plus de un texto primari, in un altere texto intra le mesme projecto), o il pote esser in le file(s) .tmx hereditage le qual tu poneva in le plica <f0>/tm</f0>.
They will appear as separate segments in the translation.
Illos apparera como segmentos separate in le traduction.
Third-party software for use with OmegaT
Le software de tertie parte pro le uso con OmegaT

Iste Guida Explica como crear un nove file filtro pro uso con OmegaT con description del creation de un rudimentari filtro file pro le formato TMX.

Iste JRE non interferera con altere installationes de Java que pote jam esser installate in tu systema.

This allows them for instance to check at any moment, whether the target version for the complete project is still OK
Isto permitte los per exemplo a verificar in omne momento, si le version final pro le projecto complete es ancora OK
This aspect makes it especially useful for repetitive material.
Hic aspecto lo face specialmente utile pro le textos iterative.
This bar gives the user feedback on specific operations that are in progress.
Iste barra da al usator le information de retorno re specific operationes que es in progresso.

Ce appello NON DEBE esser in le torno de discussion

Ce appello DEBE esser in le torno de discussion

Isto pote esser complite in duo manieras:

This chapter describes the project properties, such as the source and target languages.
Iste capitulo describe le proprietates del projecto, como le linguas original e final.
This chapter is intended for advanced users, who need to define their own variants of segmentation rules or devise more complex and powerful key search items.
Iste capitulo es designate pro usatores experte, que debe definir lor proprie variantes de regulas de segmentation o imagina elementos clave de recerca plus complexe e potente.
This command changes the folder to the folder containing the executable <a0>OmegaT</a0> file.
Iste commando cambia le plica al plica continente le file executabile <a0>OmegaT</a0>.
This command does not work once the modified segment has been validated.
Isto commando non functiona un vice que le segmento modificate esseva validate.
This command will be executed after Creating Translated Documents.
Iste commando essera executate depost le Creation del documentos rendite.
This copies the selected files to the <f3>source</f3> folder and reloads the project to import the new files.
Isto copia le files seligite in le plica <f3>source</f3> e recarga le projecto pro importar le files nove.
This creates an <e2>./OmegaT_3.n.n_Without_JRE/</e2> folder in the working folder with all the files necessary to run <a3>OmegaT</a3>.
Isto creara un plica <e2>./OmegaT_3.n.n_Without_JRE/</e2> in le plica de labor con tote le files necessari pro exequer <a3>OmegaT</a3>.

This dialog enables you to set up the source filename patterns of files to be processed by the filter, customize the filenames of translated files, and select which encodings should be used for loading the file and saving its translated counterpart.

Iste fenestra de dialogo habilita te a preparar le modellos de files del nomine de file fonte a esser processate per le filtro, personalisa le nomine de files rendite, e selige qual codificationes deberea esser usate por cargar le file e salvar su pendant traducite.
This dialog lists available file filters.
Iste fenestra de dialogo lista le filtros de file disponibile.
This document is intended for translators who are not experienced with Computer Assisted Translation (CAT) tools, and discusses only the basics.
Ce documento es designate pro traductores qui non ha experimentate con instrumentos de Traduction Assistite ab Computer (CAT), e disserta solmente re le bases.
This document is the official user's guide to OmegaT, the free Computer Aided Translation tool.
Iste documento es le guida official del usator pro OmegaT, le instrumento gratuite de traduction assistite ab computator.
This documentation is intended both as a tutorial and as a reference guide.
Iste documentation es designate et como parve instruction et como le guida de referentia.
This does not demonstrate OmegaT's full capabilities, but is intended to help the “newbie” grasp the most essential procedures.
Isto non demonstra le plen capacitates de OmegaT, ma es designate a adjutar le “neophyto” a caper le proceduras le plus essential.
This enables the translation memories produced by other tools to be read by OmegaT.
Isto habilita le memorias de traduction producite per altere instrumentos a ser legite per OmegaT.
This feature, however, is not implemented in OmegaT.
Iste characteristica, comocunque, non es implementate in OmegaT.
This file always exists in the project.
Iste file existe sempre in le projecto.
This file is very important and you should make sure you read it before launching OmegaT.
Iste file es multo importante tu deberea assecurar te que tu lege lo ante lancear OmegaT.
This file records Java error messages while <a0>OmegaT</a0> is running.
Iste file recorda le messages de error de Java durante que <a0>OmegaT</a0> es functionante.

This file will be of limited practical help to you during translation, but it serves to show you how the glossary terms are displayed to you in OmegaT when they occur: immediately in the OmegaT glossary pane.

Iste file essera pro te de adjuta practic limitate durante le traduction, ma illo servi a te monstrar como le terminos del glossario es displicate pro te in OmegaT quando illos occurre: immediatemente in le quadro del glossario de OmegaT.
Iste plica is vacue ab initio.
This format is the same as the tab separated one: source term, target term.
Iste formato es le mesme que illo separate per tabulation: termino original, termino final.
This has nothing to do with OmegaT or your browser, but is due to the fact that Wikipedia does not allow all the template information for its pages to be downloaded.
Isto ha nihil a facer con OmegaT o con tu lector del tela, ma es debite al facto que Wikipedia non permitte de discargar omne le information de modello del su paginas.
This includes preferences set from within OmegaT, any changes you have made to your<f1> OmegaT.l4J.ini</f1> file, and also your launch script (.bat file), if you are using one.
Isto include preferentias fixate intra OmegaT, qualcunque cambios que tu faceva a tu file OmegaT.l4J.ini , e alsi a tu scriptura de lanceamento (file .bat), si tu usa ipso.<f1></f1>
This information applies only to the "Traditional" Windows versions of OmegaT.
Iste information se refere sol al versiones "Traditional" de OmegaT pro Windows.

Iste information refere al systemas assi como Solaris SPARC/x86/x64, Linux x64/PowerPC, Windows x64
This information is computed for segments as well as for words and for characters (without and including spaces).
Iste information es computate pro le segmentos, pro le parolas e pro le characteres (sin e con spatios includite).
This is also the place to add members of the team to the project and assign them their rights.
Isto es alsi le loco pro adder membros del equipa al projecto e assignar a illes lor privilegios.
This is an advanced feature and some experience is required in order for it to be applied properly.
Isto es un function experte e necessita alicun experientia pro applicar lo debitemente.
This is an ordinary html file that, when opened in your Internet browser, directs you to the OmegaT user group hosted on Yahoo!
Isto es un file html ordinari que, quando aperte in tu lector del tela Interrete, dirige te al gruppo del usator OmegaT sur Yahoo!
This is convenient with heavily tagged (formatted) text, since it is easier to retain the tags undamaged by simply replacing the text between them.
Isto es conveniente con le texto multo gravate ab tags (formattate), depois que il es plus facile conservar le tags indemne con le sol reimplaciamento del texto inter illos.
This is especially the case when a large file containing many segments is open in the editor, and/or slow hardware is used.
Isto es in modo special le caso quando un file grande continente multe segmentos es aperte in le editor, vel es usate hardware lente.
This is especially useful in case of languages that use pre- and postfix forms for the stem words.
Isto es in modo special utile in caso de linguas que usa formas con pre- e suffixo pro le radices.

This is especially useful when dealing with texts where inline formatting is not really useful (e.g., OCRed PDF, bad converted .odt or .docx, etc.) In a normal case it should always be possible to open the target documents, as only inline tags are removed.

Isto es specialmente utile in le tractamento del textos ubi le formattation in linea non es vermente utile (per exemplo, PDF ex OCR, .odt or .docx mal convertite, etc.) In un caso normal il deberea semper esser possibile aperir le documentos final, pois que es removite sol le tags in linea.
This is free software, and you are welcome to redistribute it
This is free software, and you are welcome to redistribute it
This is in order to prevent spammers accessing the group.
Isto es pro prevenir le accesso al gruppo ab disturbatores.
This is necessary even if there's only one combination available, like pt_BR in case of Portuguese / Brazil.
Isto es necessari etiam si il ha sol un combination disponibile, como pt_BR in caso de portugese / Brasil.
This is safe, since even if the JRE is already installed on your system,
Isto es secur, depois que si le JRE es jam installate sur tu systema,
Isto es le arrangiamento base initial.
This is the way text will look when displayed.
Assi le texto apparera quando essera displicate.
This is useful for documents that contain trade marks, names or other proper nouns, or parts in a third language that do not require translation.
Isto es utile pro textos continente marcas commercial, nomines o altere nomines proprie, o partes in un lingua tertia que non require traduction.
This is useful for texts containing many trade marks or other proper nouns you which must be left unchanged.
Isto es utile pro textos continente multe marcas commercial o altere nomines proprie que debe restar sin alteration.
This is useful if you frequently use translation memories produced in the past, for example because they are on the same subject or for the same customer.
Isto es utile si tu usa frequentemente memorias de traduction producite in le passato, per exemplo quia illos son re le identic subjecto o pro le mesme cliente.
This is useful to run OmegaT on a server with TMX files automatically fed to a project.
Isto es utile pro exequer OmegaT sur un server con le files TMX que alimenta automaticamente un projecto.

This is useful when dealing with texts where inline formatting has no real use (e.g., OCRed PDF, bad converted .odt or .docx, etc.) Only inline tags are removed, so normally there should be no problem with opening the target documents.

Isto es utile pro tractar textos ubi le formattation in linea ha nulle uso real (per exemplo, PDF ex OCR, .odt o .docx mal convertite, etc.) Sol le tags in linea son removite, assi normalmente deberea non esser problema con le apertura del documentos de destination.
This is very useful for 1) making sure you don't skip text; 2) checking your work; and 3) putting both source and target text in a font and size that are comfortable for you.
Isto es multo utile pro 1) tranquillisar se de non omitter texto; 2) controlar tu opera; e 3) poner ambe le texto lo primari e lo final in un fonte e un dimension commode.
This is where you type and edit your translation.
Isto es ubi tu scribe e modifica (edita) tu traduction.
This license allows you to do certain things with <a0>OmegaT</a0>, including modifying and distributing it.
This license allows you to do certain things with <a0>OmegaT</a0>, including modifying and distributing it.
This list is for more technical discussion of features and development, and is intended for OmegaT developers and other interested parties.
Iste lista es pro le discussion plus technic re characteristicas e disveloppamento, e es designate pro disveloppatores de OmegaT e altere partes interessate.

Iste lista de mailing es pro le localisatores de OmegaT.

Ce manual, tamen, non esserea possibile sin le auxilio e le appoio de plure gente.

Iste remarca ha prioritate sur Marca Segmentos Rendite e sur Marca Segmentos non Rendite.
This may be confusing, so you may consider unchecking this option in this case.
Isto pote generar confusion, ita tu pote considerar de levar le marca a iste option in iste caso.

This means for instance that you do not need to exit a project you are currently working on if you decide to add another ancillary TM to it: you simply reload the project, and the changes you have made will be included.

Isto significa per exemplo que tu non necessitate exir de un projecto re qui tu actualmente labora si tu decide de adder a illo un altere TM auxiliar: tu recarga simplemente le projecto, e le cambia tu ha facite essera includite.

This method has a particular benefit of being suitable for finding causes of problems: if an error occurs during use of the program, an error message is output in the terminal window which may contain useful information on the cause of the error.

Iste methodo ha le beneficio particular de esser commode pro discoperir causas de problemas: si occurre un error durante le uso del programma, un message de error es output in le fenestra del terminal que pote continer information utile sur le causa del error.
This method will also use preferences and settings you have made from within OmegaT.
Iste methodo usara alsi le preferentias e le preparationes que tu ha facite inter OmegaT.
This operation will affect {0} segments and cannot be undone.
Iste operation afficera {0} segmentos e on non potera disfacer lo.
This option allows the tag validation in a batch mode.
Iste option permitte le validation del tag in modo batch.
This option allows you to enter the translation without the need to remove the source text, thus saving you two keystrokes (<e0>Ctrl+A </e0>and <e1>Del).

Le numeration unic permitte al tags, correspondente a cata altere, de esser regruppate insimul e distincte inter le tags que ha le mesme character de connexion, ma son de facto differente.
