Usa <g0>Ctrl+L<i1/></g0> pro aperir e <k2>Esc</k2> pro clauder lo.
Use Shift+F3 <i0/>to cycle through the three alternatives.
Usa Shift+F3 <i0/>pro commutar intra tres alternativas.
Use it if OmegaT is not to synchronize the project contents.
Usa lo si OmegaT non synchronisa le contentos del projecto.
Use the installation language in OmegaT
Usar le lingua de installation in OmegaT
Use the upper part as a reference and replace or modify the contents of the editing field with your translation.
Usa le parte superior como un referentia e reimplacia o modifica le contentos del campo de modifica con tu traduction.
Use these Help texts to get started.
Usa iste textos de Adjuta pro initiar.
Use this button to open a dialog,activate the check box <g0>Project specific segmentation rules</g0>, then proceed to adjust the segmentation rules as desired.

Usa iste button pro aperir un fenestra de dialogo, activar le quadrato de controlo <g0>Regulas de segmentation specific del projecto</g0>, deinde proceder a adjustar le regulas de segmentation como desiderate.
Use this feature when you have undocked, moved, or hidden one or more components and you are unable to restore the desired arrangement.
Usa iste function quando tu ha levate, movite, o celate uno o plus componentes e tu non es abile a restaurar le disposition desiderate.
Use untar utility (or its equivalent, for instance<f0> winrar</f0> in Windows) to extract its contents into the project folder "Dictionary".
Usa le utilitate untar (o un su equivalente, per exemplo<f0> winrar</f0> in Windows) pro extraher su contentos in le classificator "Dictionary" del projecto.
Use with the GNU Affero General Public License.
Use with the GNU Affero General Public License.
Used to adjust the handling of supported file formats (access via <m0> <g1>Options</g1> <g2>File Filters...</g2> </m0>, close via <k3>Esc</k3>)
Utilisate pro adjustar le tractamento del formatos del files supportate (acceder via <m0> <g1>Optiones</g1> <g2>Filtros de file...</g2> </m0>, clauder via <k3>Esc</k3>)
Used to change how <a0>OmegaT</a0> behaves when you iterate between the segments (access via <m1> <g2>Options</g2> <g3>Behavior...</g3> </m1>, close via <k4>Esc</k4>)
Utilisate pro cambiar como <a0>OmegaT</a0> comporta se quando tu itera inter le segmentos (acceder via <m1> <g2>Optiones</g2> <g3>Comportamento de modifica...</g3> </m1>, close via <k4>Esc</k4>)
Used to change the way your text is segmented into sentences (access via <m0> <g1>Options</g1> <g2>Segmentation</g2> </m0>, close via <k3>Esc</k3>)
Utilisate pro cambiar le maniera como tu texto es segmentate in phrases (acceder via <m0> <g1>Optiones</g1> <g2>Segmentation</g2> </m0>, clauder via <k3>Esc</k3>)
Used to display the match statistics of the project, select <m0> <g1><i2/>Tools</g1> <g3>Match statistics</g3> </m0>to open it.
Utilisate pro monstrar le statisticas del concordantia del projecto, seligect <m0> <g1><i2/>Instrumentos</g1> <g3>Statisticas del concordantia</g3> </m0>pro lo aperir.
Used to display the user manual (open with <k0>F1</k0>, close with <k1>Esc)</k1>
Utilisate pro monstrar le manual del usator (aperir con <k0>F1</k0>, clauder con <k1>Esc)</k1>
Used to modify the font used by <a0>OmegaT</a0> to display source, translation, matches and glossary terms, (access via <m1> <g2>Options</g2> <g3>Font...</g3> </m1>, close via <k4>Esc</k4>)

Utilisate pro modificar le typo de character usate per <a0>OmegaT</a0> pro monstrar le terminos fonte, traduction, concordantias e glossario, (accede via <m1> <g2>Optiones</g2> <g3>Typo de character...</g3> </m1>, clauder via <k4>Esc</k4>)
Used to modify the project folders and languages (access via <g0>Ctrl+E </g0>shortcut or <m1> <g2>Project</g2> <g3>properties...</g3> </m1>, close via <k4>Esc)</k4>
Utilisate pro modificar le plicas e le linguas del projecto (acceder via le via breve <g0>Ctrl+E </g0>o <m1> <g2>Projecto</g2> <g3>Proprietates...</g3> </m1>, clauder con <k4>Esc)</k4>
Used to open the window with the statistics of the project, display it, using <m0> <g1><i2/>Tools</g1> <g3>Statistics.</g3> </m0>
Utilisate pro aperir le fenestra con le statisticas del projecto, monstra los, usante <m0> <g1><i2/>Instrumentos</g1> <g3>Statisticas.</g3> </m0>
Used to validate tags (open with <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>T</k2> </k0>, close with <k3>Esc</k3>)
Utilisate pro validar le tags (aperir Con <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>T</k2> </k0>, clauder con <k3>Esc</k3>)
User files contain the information, applicable to all the projects for a given user;
Le files del usator contine le information, applicabile e omne le projectos pro un certe usator;
Lingua del interfacie del usator pro OmegaT
User settings files: These are created when OmegaT's behavior is modified by user preference settings.
Files del preparationes del usator: istos es create quando le comportamento de OmegaT es modificate per le preferentia del preparationes del usator.
User support is provided on a volunteer basis at the <u3><a4>OmegaT</a4> Yahoo!
Le supporto al usator es fornite sur un base voluntarie al <u3><a4>OmegaT</a4> Yahoo!
User support, at the Yahoo user group (multilingual), where the archives are
Supporto del usuario, al gruppo del usuarios Yahoo (multilingual), ubi on pote recercar in le archivos
User's Manual viewer does not support navigation to external links.
Le visor del manual del usator non supporta le navigation a ligamines externe.
Users of old computers who feel window resizing is very slow can try changing the font.
Le usatores de computatores vetule qui senti que le dimensionamento del fenestra es multo lente pote probar a cambiar le typo de character.
Users of other platforms (Linux PowerPC, Linux x64, Solaris SPARC/x86/x64, Windows x64 etc) must have a running compatible Java JRE on their system to be able to use <a1>OmegaT</a1>.

Le usatores de altere platformas (Linux PowerPC, Linux x64, Solaris SPARC/x86/x64, Windows x64 etc) debe haber functionante un Java JRE compatibile sur lor systema pro esser habile a usar <a1>OmegaT</a1>.
Users will need to download IBM's JRE, as Sun does
usuarios debera discargar le JRE de IBM, pois que Sun non
Using <k2> <k3>Shift</k3> <k4>Ctrl</k4> <k5>O</k5> </k2> causes both text input and display in <a6>OmegaT</a6> to change.
Usar <k2> <k3>Shift</k3> <k4>Ctrl</k4> <k5>O</k5> </k2> causa ambe texto inscribite e apparentia in <a6>OmegaT</a6> cambiar.
Using TMX with alternative language pairs
Usar le TMX con pares de lingua alternative

Using keyword search with <e0><l1>open file</l1></e0> will thus find all occurrences of the string <e2><l3>open file</l3>,</e2> as well as <e4><l5>file opened</l5>, <l6>open input file</l6>, <l7>file may not be safe to open</l7></e4>, etc.

Usante le recerca per parola clave con <e0><l1>open file</l1></e0> trovara assi omne occurrentias del linea de character <e2><l3>open file</l3>,</e2> assi como <e4><l5>file opened</l5>, <l6>open input file</l6>, <l7>file may not be safe to open</l7></e4>, etc.
Using the console mode, one can make generating a localized interface a part of the build process.
Le uso del modo consola pote render un parte del processo de build generante un interfacie localisate .
Using the team project in OmegaT
Usar le projecto in equipa in OmegaT
Validate tags when leaving a segment
Valida le tags quando tu abandona un segmento
Confirmar le tags, crear le documentos final
Variants in the following languages will be displayed: {0}
Essera displicate variantes in le linguas sequente: {0}
Very early versions of <a0>OmegaT</a0> were capable of segmenting source files into paragraphs only and were inconsistent when numbering formatting tags in HTML and Open Document files.

Le versiones initial de <a0>OmegaT</a0> esseva capabile de segmentar le Files fonte in paragraphos solmente e esseva inconsistente le numeration del tags de formattation in files HTML e Open Document.
Very popular clients for Windows environment are <u1>TortoiseSVN</u1> and <u2>TortoiseGit</u2>.
Clientes multo popular pro le ambiente Windows es <u1>TortoiseSVN</u1> e <u2>TortoiseGit</u2>.
Vide o edita le filtros del file.
Volunteers to translate the current documentation are welcome!
Son bon venite le voluntarios pro traducer le documentation actual!
Warning on line {0}, column {1} while parsing:
Advertimento re linea {0}, columna {1} durante le analyse:
Warning: Changing tag order may break the translated document!
Advertimento: Le cambio del ordine del tags pote franger le documento rendite!
We ignore these in Project 1 only for training purposes.
Nos ignora isto in le Projecto 1 solmente pro fines de exercitation.
We provide here two projects for self-training.
Nos supple ci duo projectos pro le auto-exercitation.
What is a CAT tool and why are they useful?
Quod es un instrumento CAT e proque illos es utile?.
What is the language pair you need?
Qual es le par de lingua que tu necessita?
What you see may instead be a characteristic of OmegaT that
Lo que tu vide pote esser in vice un characteristic de OmegaT que
Whatever the inconsistencies, omissions and straightforward errors you may find in the present version, I declare them all my own.
Qual que sia le contradictiones, le omissiones e le candide errores que tu pote trovar in le actual version, io proclama illes omne, mi proprie.
When a rule is triggered, the corresponding phrase will be underlined in blue in the Editor (see <e1>also </e1>and <e2>I didn't do nothing</e2> in the picture above).
Quando un regula es discatenate, le phrase correspondente essera sublineate in azur in le Editor (vide <e1>also </e1>e <e2>I didn't do nothing</e2> in le pictura anterior).
When active, <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>M</k2> </k0> will insert the suggestion into the target part of the current segment.
Quando active, <k0> <k1>Ctrl</k1> <k2>M</k2> </k0> inserera le suggestion in le parte destination del segmento currente.
When enabled, all the formatting tags are removed from source segments.
Quando habilitate, tote le tags de formato es removite del segmentos fonte.
When hovering the mouse over the underlined phrase, an explanation will appear.
Quando on passa le mouse supra le phrase sublineate, comparera un explication.
When launched in console mode, no GUI is loaded ( it will work therefore on any console) and the given project is automatically translated.
Quando on lancea in modo consola, nulle GUI es cargate ( illo in consequentia operara sur qualcunque consola) e le projecto date es rendite automaticamente.
When mode has been used, this option will specify the files to be processed automatically.
Quando esseva usate modo, iste option specificara le files a esser processate automaticamente.
When moving between segments, you may wish to populate the editing field with an existing translation in the fuzzy match pane or with the source text.
Movente te inter segmentos, tu pote desiderar popular le campo de modifica con un traduction existente in le quadro del concordantia partial o con le texto original.
When started in console mode, no GUI is loaded (so it will work on any console) and the given project is automatically processed as requested.
Quando initiava in modo consola, nulle GUI es cargate (assi il laborara sur omne consola) e le projecto date es processate automaticamente como requirite.
When the user exits <a0>OmegaT</a0>, this file is not emptied, in order to be consistent with usual clipboard behavior.
Quando le usator claude <a0>OmegaT</a0>, iste file non es vacuate, pro esser consistente con le comportamento usual del tabula del fragmento.
When this file is executed, the commands within it are automatically carried out.
Quando es exequite iste file, es exequite automaticamente alsi le commandos intra lo.
When this is done the panes display a tab at the top.
Quando isto is facite le quadros monstra un linguetta al summitate.
When this parameter is added, tag validation is done prior to translation/aligning.
Quando es addite iste parametro, le validation del tag es facite ante que le traduction/alineamento..
When using an external service you must be aware of the possible implications in terms of confidentiality, since you are loading the original document on a server outside of your direct control.

Quando tu usa un servicio externe tu debe esser al currente del implicationes possibile in terminos de confidentialitate, depois que tu es cargante le documento original sur un server for de tu controlo directe.
When you are finished and ready to proofread your work, you can open the translated files in <f0>/target</f0> in your browser and read through them, and/or print them out for checking.
Quando tu ha tu opera clause e preste pro leger le proba, tu pote aperir le files rendite in <f0>/target</f0> con tu lector del tela e leger al transverso de illos, e/o lo stampar pro le controlo.
When you are ready to view the final product, you can export the translated files, open them in the appropriate application and view the translation in the final format...
Quando tu es preste pro vider le producto final, tu pote exportar le files rendite, los aperir con le application appropriate e examinar le traduction in le formato final...
When you are translating from HTML, you will see a lot of codes that do not need to be translated, particularly at the beginning of each file.
Quando tu rende ab un file HTML, tu videra multe codices que non necessita de esser rendite, in particular al initio de cata file.

When you begin a new project on the same subject or for the same customer, navigate to the repository folder in the <g0>Project > Properties > Edit Project dialog</g0> and select it as the translation memory folder.

Quando tu initia un nove projecto re le mesme subjecto o pro le mesme cliente, naviga al plica deposito in le <g0>fenestra de dialogo Projecto > Proprietates > Modifica Projecto </g0> e selige lo como le plica del memoria de traduction.
When you create a translation project, OmegaT automatically creates a folder with the specified name, and a list of folders:
Quando tu crea un projecto de traduction, OmegaT crea automaticamente un plica con le nomine specificate, e un lista de plicas:

When you create the target documents in an <a0>OmegaT</a0> project, the translation memory of the project is output in the form of three files in the root folder of your <a1>OmegaT</a1> project (see the above description).

Quando tu crea le documentos final in un projecto <a0>OmegaT</a0>, le memoria de traduction del projecto es emittite in le forma de tres files in le plica radice de tu projecto <a1>OmegaT</a1> (vide le description precedente).
When you find errors in the text in the browser window, make the corresponding changes within OmegaT.
quando tu trovara errores in le texto in le fenestra del lector del tela, que tu face le cambios correspondente in OmegaT.
When you left-click on the number, the selected script will run.
Quando tu clicca sur le numero, le script seligite essera exequite.

When you let OmegaT know the files that you need to translate, it looks for the files it understands based on file filtering rules, recognizes the textual parts within them, splits up the text groups according to the segmentation rules, and displays the segments one by one so that you can proceed with the translation.

Quando tu face saper a OmegaT le files que tu debe traducer, illo examina le files que comprende, con le regulas de filtration del files, recognosce le partes textual intra illos, divide le gruppos de texto secundo le regulas de segmentation e expone le segmentos uno a uno, de maniera que tu pote proceder con le traduction.
When you load a segmented TTX file, segments with source = target will be included, if "Allow translation to be equal to source" in Options → Editing Behavior... has been checked.

Quando tu carga un file TTX segmentate, le segmentos con fonte = destination essera includite, si esseva marcate le cassa "Permitte traduction equal a fonte " in Optiones → Comportamento del Modifica... .
When you move to another segment, the translation is validated and stored.
Quando tu move a un altere segmento, le traduction es validate e registrate in le memoria de traduction.
When you move to the next segment, the first fuzzy match (the one with the best matching percentage) is automatically selected.
Quando tu move al segmento proxime, le prime concordantia partial (illo con le melior percentage de concordantia) es seligite automaticamente.
When you translate your files, <a2>OmegaT</a2> stores all your progress in the translation memory <l3>project_save.tmx</l3> that resides in the project's <l4>/omegat</l4> subfolder.
Quando tu rende tu files, <a2>OmegaT</a2> registra tote tu progresso in le memoria de traduction <l3>project_save.tmx</l3> que reside in le sub plica del projecto <l4>/omegat</l4>.
When you wish to use the filter again, just tick the check box.
Quando tu desidera usar de nove le filtro, marca justo le quadrato de controlo.
When/after downloading the zip file, place it in a suitable folder, e.g., for Windows, <s0/>C:\Program Files.
Que tu installa OmegaT postquam tu ha discargate le file zip, pone lo in un classificator convenibile, e.g., for Windows, <s0/>C:\Program Files.
Whenever you finish a project, copy one of the three "export" translation memory files from the root folder of the project to the repository folder.
Quandocunque tu fini un projecto, copia uno del tres files memoria de traduction "exportation" ex le plica radice del projecto al plica deposito.

Whenever you want to see what your translation will look like in its final format, press <k2>Ctrl+D</k2> to generate the translated documents, which will be created in the <f3>/target/</f3> subfolder of your project folder.

Quandocunque tu vole vider lo que essera le aspecto de tu traductiones, in su formato final, que tu pressa <k2>Ctrl+D</k2> pro generar le documentos rendite, que essera create in le sub-plica <f3>/target/</f3> de tu projecto.

While the translation is progressing, additional files (<e2><f3>project_name</f3></e2><f4>-omegat.tmx, project_name-level1.tmx and project_name-level2.tmx</f4>) are created (and updated during the process of translation) in this folder.

durante que le traduction progrede son create (e renovate in le processo de traduction) in iste plica, additional files (<e2><f3>project_name</f3></e2><f4>-omegat.tmx, project_name-level1.tmx and project_name-level2.tmx</f4>).
Wikipedia is subject to continual change.
Wikipedia es subjecte a perpetue cambios.
Wild card characters are not accepted.
Le characteres jolly non es acceptate.
Will Helton: his final reading of the draft has spared me a lot of embarrassment.
Will Helton: su lectura final del minuta me ha sparniate un lot de embarasso.
Will display a list of segments with tag errors and possible inconsistencies.
Monstrara un lista de segmentos con errores de tag e possibile contradictiones.

Wind catches lily

Scatt'ring petals to the wind:

Your page is not found

Le vento captura le lilio

Petalos dispergite al vento:

Tu pagina non es trovate
Windows and Linux users: if you are confident that your system already has a
Usuarios de Windows e Linux: si tu es confidente que tu systema ha ja un
With <e3>TransTips/Exact Match </e3> checked, only complete words will be checked, otherwise parts of words will be matched as well.
Con <e3>TransTips/Concordantia Exacte </e3> marcate, sol parolas complete essera verificate, alteremente essera anque concordate partes del parolas.

With heavily tagged HTML text, you may find it convenient to keep the source text open at the same time and to toggle between the two (Alt+tab) in order to be able to see more quickly what text actually has to be translated.

Con texto HTML multo gravate ab tags, tu pote trovar commode de mantener aperte le texto fonte al mesme tempore e de commutar inter le duo (Alt+tab) pro poter vider plus rapidemente qual texto in realitate on debe render.
With heavily tagged text, you are likely to find that OmegaT yields numerous spurious fuzzy matches in which only the tags are identical, and which are not therefore useful.
Con texto multo gravate ab tags, tu probabilemente trovara que OmegaT rende numerose concordantias partial false ubi sol le tags es identic e que es dunque inutile.

With less heavily tagged text, you can delete the content of the target text field and simply type in the translation, or you can instruct OmegaT to leave it blank by default (refer to the User's Manual for details).

Con texto minus gravate ab tags, tu pote deler le contento del campo del texto final e simplemente inscriber le traduction, o tu pote maestrar OmegaT a lo lassar ordinarimente blanco (Que tu agrada referer al Manual del Usator pro le detalios).
With this command you can move backward one segment at a time, to return later to the current segment using <g0>Forward in history... </g0>command below.
Con iste commando tu pote regreder un segmento a un vece, pro retornar al segmento currente per le commando sequente <g0>Avantia in historia...</g0>
With this command you can step forward to the segment, you have previously left by the <g1>Back in history</g1>...command.
Con iste commando tu pote facer un passo avante al segmento, que tu ha previemente lassate per le commando <g1>Retrocede in historia</g1>...
With this method, you may also download the "Windows without JRE" version, since the new installation will use your existing JRE.
Con iste methodo, tu pote discargar le version "Windows without JRE", perque le installation nove usera tu JRE existente.
Within a given language pair it is best to keep different subjects and/or clients as separate repositories as well.
Intra un par de lingua date il es optime servar subjectos vel clientes differente como depositos separate.
Within a segment, the first group (pair or single) receives the number 0, the second the number 1 etc.
Intra un segmento, le prime gruppo (par o singule) recipe le numero 0, le secunde le numero 1 etc.
Writeable glossary file folder entered does not exist!
Le classificator inscribite del files glossario scribibile, non existe!
X, once or not at all
X, once or not at all
XSLT is most often used to convert data between different XML schemas or to convert XML data into web pages or PDF documents.
XSLT es maxime saepe usate pro converter datos inter differente XML schemas o pro converter datos XML in paginas TTT o documentos PDF.
YEAR is 4-digit year, MM is a month, DD day of the month, HH and NN are hours and minutes when the previous translation memory was saved.
YEAR es le anno in 4 cifras, MM es le mense, DD le die del mense, e HH e NN son le horas e minutas quando le previe memoria de traduction esseva salvate.
YEAR is the 4-digit year, MM is the month, DD the day of the month, and HH and NN are the hours and minutes when the previous translation memory was saved.
YEAR es le anno in 4 cifras, MM es le mense, DD le die del mense, e HH e NN son le horas e minutas quando le previe memoria de traduction esseva salvate.
You achieve the same by clearing the target segment and pressing <g4>Enter.</g4>
Tu compli le identic per deler le segmento final e pressar <g4>Enter.</g4>
You are now ready to deliver the job.
Tu es nunc preste per delivrar tu opera.
You are uninstalling the spellchecking dictionary that your project currently uses.
Tu va disinstallar le dictionario del controlator orthographic actual de tu projecto.
You can add <a0>OmegaT</a0> to your menus as follows:
Tu pote adder <a0>OmegaT</a0> a tu menus como seque:

You can add a new term to the glossary by pressing <k0>Ctrl+Shift+G</k0>, or copy existing glossaries to the <f1>/glossary/</f1> subfolder of your project folder, and OmegaT will automatically look up words in them.

Tu pote adder un nove termino al glossario pressante <k0>Ctrl+Shift+G</k0>, o copiar glossarios existente in le sub plica <f1>/glossario/</f1> de tu projecto, e OmegaT querera automaticamente le parolas in illos.
You can add copies of files, portions of the log, screen shots, anything that
Tu pote can adder copias de files, portiones del bloco, sequentia del schermo, alicun cosa que
You can add the files to it later.
Tu pote adder a illo le files plus tarde.
You can also "cd" there directly from the command line and open <a4><e5>Info.plist</e5> in a command line editor like emacs or vi</a4>.
Tu pote alsi "cd" ibi directemente ab le linea de commando e aperir <a4><e5>Info.plist</e5> in un editor de linea de commando como emacs o vi</a4>.
You can also add source files from Internet pages, written in MediaWiki, by clicking on<g4> "Import from MediaWiki"</g4> button and providing the corresponding URL.
Tu pote alsi adder files fonte a partir de paginas Interrete, scripte in MediaWiki, cliccante sur le button<g4> "Importa ex MediaWiki"</g4> e providente le URL correspondente.
You can also call it in the
Tu pote alsi lo appellar in le
You can also enable project-specific file filters, which will only be used on the current project, by selecting the <e1>File Filters...</e1> option in Project Properties.
Tu pote alsi habilitar filtros de file specific pro le projecto, que essera usate sol sur le projecto actual, per seliger le option <e1>Filtros de File...</e1> in le Proprietates del Projecto.
You can also file <u6>bug reports</u6> and <u7>requests for enhancements.</u7>
On pote alsi depositar <u6>reportos de defecto</u6> e <u7>demanda de incrementos functional.</u7>
You can also have several search windows open simultaneously.
Tu pote alsi haber plure fenestras de recerca aperte simultaneemente
You can also highlight your preferred alternative in the glossary pane and insert it into the target by right clicking on the selection.
Tu pote anque marcar tu alternativa ideal in le quadro del Glossario atque inserer lo in le destination cliccante con le dextro sur le selection.
You can also instruct the spell checker to ignore all the occurrences of the mis-spelled word, or add it to the dictionary.
Tu pote alsi instruer le corrector orthographic pro ignorar omne le occurrentias del parola con cacographia, o los adder al dictionario.
You can also use AppleScript or Automator to create Services or scripts that will automate frequent actions
Tu pote alsi usar AppleScript o Automator pro crear Servicios o scriptes que automatisara le actiones frequente
You can ask the user group for advice if you have problems.
Tu pote demandar al Gruppo del usator pro le consilio si tu ha problemas.
You can browse through notes using <g0>GoTo → Next Note</g0> and <g1>GoTo → Previous Note</g1>.
Tu pote pascer al transverso del notas per <g0>Vade → Nota sequente</g0> e <g1>Vade → Nota previe</g1>.
You can change the already assigned shortcuts and add new shortcuts by putting a shortcut definition file in your OmegaT preferences folder (see <l0>User files location</l0>).
Tu pote mutar le vias breve jam assignate e adder vias breve nove, ponente un file definition de via breve in tu plica del preferentias de OmegaT (vide <l0>Ubication del files del usator</l0>).
You can change the position of any pane or even undock it to a separate window by clicking and dragging the pane by its name.
Tu pote cambiar le position de qualcunque quadro o etiam levar lo a un fenestra separate cliccante e tirante le quadro ab su nomine
You can customize existing shortcuts or add new ones according to your needs.
Tu pote personalisar vias breve existente o adde los nove ex tu necessitates.
You can decide not to translate such segments at all.
Tu pote decider de non traducer del toto tal segmentos.
You can define one of the alternative - for instance the most probable among them - as default translation by selecting <g1>Edit → Use as Default Translation</g1>
Tu pote definir uno del alternativas - per exemplo le plus probabile inter illos - como traduction base seligente <g1>Modifica → Usa como traduction base</g1>

You can either copy files manually, i.e. from elsewhere on your system, using your file manager; or you can use OmegaT's <e0>"Install new dictionary"</e0> function to provide a list of available dictionaries to select from.

Tu pote o copiar le files manualmente, i.e. ab alibi in tu systema, con le empleo de tu administrator de file; o tu pote usar le function de OmegaT <e0>"Installa un nove dictionario"</e0> pro obtener un lista de dictionarios ex quo seliger lo.
You can either enter the source and target languages by hand or use the drop down menus.
Tu pote o inscriber le linguas fonte e destination con mano o usar le menus a tenta cadente.
You can enable project specific filters via the <e0>Project → Properties...</e0>.
Tu pote habilitar filtros de projecto specific via le <e0>Projecto → Proprietates...</e0>.
You can find detailed statistic information in the file: {0}
Tu pote trovar information statistic detaliate in le file: {0}
You can have entries with the target column missing, i.e. just containing the source term and the comment.
Tu pote haber entratas con le columna final mancante, id es continente justo le termino primari e le commento.
You can have the source text inserted automatically into the editing field.
Tu pote haver le texto original inserite automaticamente in le campo de modifica
You can however obtain a neater and more user-friendly
Comocunque Tu pote obtener un installation a plus nette e plus
You can launch OmegaT from the command line with a script that includes start-up options or you can click on <e0><a1>OmegaT</a1>.jar</e0> to launch it directly.
Tu pote lancear OmegaT ab le linea de commando con un script que include le optiones initial o tu pote cliccar sur <e0><a1>OmegaT</a1>.jar</e0> pro lancear lo directemente.
You can modify the <e0>Properties</e0> as well as the <e1>VMOptions</e1> part.
Tu pote modificar le <e0>Proprietates</e0> assi como le parte <e1>VMOptions</e1> part.
You can open them in an Internet browser to obtain access to external links.
Tu pote aperir los in un lector del tela Interrete pro obtener accesso al ligamines externe.
You can overlap panes if desired.
Tu, si lo vole, pote superponer le quadros.
You can process the generated tmx with any tool you want.
Tu pote processar le TMX generate con qualcunque instrumento tu vole.
You can quickly see their contents by looking at their title: it will contain the search term used.
Tu pote rapidemente vider lor contentos querente a lor titulo: il continera le termino de recerca usate.

You can regard these three tmx files (<f2>-omegat.tmx</f2>, <f3>-level1.tmx</f3> and <f4>-level2.tmx</f4>) as an "export translation memory", i.e. as an export of your current project's content in bilingual form.

Tu pote considerar iste tres files TMX (<f2>-omegat.tmx</f2>, <f3>-level1.tmx</f3> e <f4>-level2.tmx</f4>) como un "memoria de traduction pro exportation", id es como un exportation de tu contento del projecto actual in forma bilingue.
You can select which elements are to be translated.
Tu pote seliger qual elementos debe esser rendite.
You can start the selected macros from the main menu as well by using their entries in the <g0>Tools </g0>menu or by pressing<k1> Ctrl+Alt+F#</k1> (# 1 to 12).
Tu pote lancear le macros seligite ab le menu principal o con lor entratas in le menu <g0>Instrumentos </g0>o pressante<k1> Ctrl+Alt+F#</k1> (con # de 1 a 12).
You can then click on the preferred translation to insert it into the target segment at the current position.
Tu pote alora cliccar sur le traduction ideal pro inserer lo in le segmento final al position actual.
You can then launch the Kaptain launch script with
Deinde tu pote lancear le scriptura de lancha de Kaptain con
You can then switch back to the Search window for the next segment found, for instance to check and, if necessary, correct the terminology.
Tu pote alora cambiar a retro al Fenestra de Recerca pro trovar le segmento successive, per exemplo pro controlar e, si necesse, corriger le terminologia.
You can think of LanguageTool as a software to detect errors that a simple spell checker cannot detect, e.g. mixing up there/their, no/now etc.
On pote pensar de LanguageTool como un software pro deteger errores que un simplice corrector orthographic non pote discoperir , e.g. confunder there/their, no/now etc.
You can thus select a word anywhere in <a2>OmegaT</a2> and use Services to check this word, for instance in Spotlight or in Google.
Tu pote ergo seliger un parola alicubi in <a2>OmegaT</a2> e usar le Servicios pro controlar iste parola, per exemplo in Spotlight o in Google.
You can use <g3>Ctrl+A <i4/></g3><g5>, Ctrl+C <i6/></g5>, <g7>Ctrl+V <i8/></g7> to copy/paste the contents.
Tu pote usar <g3>Ctrl+A <i4/></g3><g5>, Ctrl+C <i6/></g5>, <g7>Ctrl+V <i8/></g7> pro copiar/collar le contentos.
You can use the search window to find specific segments in a project.
Tu pote usar le fenestra de recerca pro trovar segmentos specific in un projecto.
You can verify the bug report page at
Tu pote verificar le pagina de reporto defecto
You can view it by selecting <g0>Tools > Statistics</g0>
Tu pote examinar lo per seliger <g0>Instrumentos > Statisticas</g0>
You create first an empty client folder on your disk.
Crea in prime loco un plica cliente sur tu disco dur.
You define its location and name in the project properties dialog.
Tu defini su ubication e nomine in le fenestra de dialogo proprietates del projecto.
You may also copy the files to your project's 'source' folder using your favorite file manager and reload the project by calling Reload from the Project menu.
Tu pote anque copiar le files in le classificator "Primari" de tu projectos per medio de tu favorite administrator de files e recargar le projecto con le commando "Recarga" ex le menu "Projecto".
You may change the source encoding for each different source filename pattern.
Tu pote cambiar le codification fonte pro cata differente typo de nomine de file fonte.
You may even consider removing those that are not required any more, once you have used their contents to fill up the <f0>project-save.tmx</f0> file.
Tu pote etiam considerar de remover illos que non son plus necessari, un vice que tu ha usate lor contentos pro reimpler le file <f0>project-save.tmx</f0>.
You may have several Search windows open at the same time.
Tu pote haber plure Fenestras de Recerca aperte al mesme tempore.
You may select a different match by pressing <g0>Ctrl+2, 3, 4, or 5</g0>.<i1/> Of course, pressing <k2> <k3>Ctrl</k3> <k4>5</k4> </k2> will have no effect, if there is no match #5.

Tu pote seliger un concordantia differente pressante <g0>Ctrl+2, 3, 4, o 5</g0>.<i1/> Naturalmente, pressante <k2> <k3>Ctrl</k3> <k4>5</k4> </k2> non habera alicun effecto, si il non ha alicun concordantia #5.
You may try to solve this problem in one of the following ways:
Tu pote tentar de solver iste problema in un del manieras sequente:
You might want to apply the same to the <f10>target</f10> folder and its contents.
Tu pote desirar applicar lo identic al plica <f10>target</f10> e su contentos.
You must enter a number between 1 and {0}.
Tu debe scriber on numero inter 1 e {0}.
You need not require recipients to copy the
You need not require recipients to copy the
You need to be online to be able to use an MT tool.
Tu necessita esser in interrete pro esser habile a usar un application MT.
You need to update your JDK 1.6 to the latest version, or just remove the jaxb-*.jar files from the OmegaT /lib dir
Tu necessita renovar tu JDK 1.6 al ultime version, o justo remove le files jaxb-*.jar ex le /lib dir de OmegaT
You should add copies of files, portions of the log, screen shots, and anything else that you think will help the developers to find and fix your bug.
Tu pote adder copias de files, portiones del bloco, paginas del schermo, e alicun altere cosas que tu pensa adjutara le disveloppatores a trovar e reparar tu defecto
You should be able to open the HTML files in your browser <t2/>and view them approximately as they appear on the Internet.
Tu deberea esser capabile de aperir le files HTML in tu lector del tela <t2/>e los vider approximativemente como illos appare sur le Interrete.
You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License
You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License
You should specify their new location or recreate them.
Tu deberea specificar lor nove location o los recrear.
You specify the TMX file to be created with
Tu specifica le file TMX a crear con
You translate your files by moving from segment to segment, editing each current segment in turn.
Tu rende tu files movente te de segmento in segmento, modificante cata segmento currente a tornos.
You type your translation into the field provided, confirm by hitting Enter, and so on.
Tu scribe tu traduction in le campo fornite, confirma pressante Invio, et cetera.
You will be required to send a short message from which the moderator can tell that you are a genuine user and not a spammer.
Tu debera remitter un breve message ab le qual le moderator pote dicer que tu es un usator genuin e non un disturbator.
You will need a place to store your dictionary or dictionaries.
Tu necessitara un loco ubi locar tu dictionario o tu dictionarios.

You will put your document to be translated into the <f5>/source</f5><f6> folder; the </f6><f7>/target</f7><f8> folder will be filled with translated text as you translate the job; the </f8><f9>/omegat</f9><f10> <s11/>folder need not concern you now; the </f10><f12>/tm</f12><f13> and </f13><f14>/glossary</f14><f15> files will remain empty unless and until you create a .tmx file and a glossary and put them into those respective folders.</f15>

Tu collocara tu documentos a render in le plica <f5>/source</f5><f6>; le plica </f6><f7>/target</f7><f8> essera implite con le texto rendite al fin de tu labor; le plica </f8><f9>/omegat</f9><f10> <s11/> non necessita tu interesse ora; le plicas </f10><f12>/tm</f12><f13> e </f13><f14>/glossary</f14><f15> restara vacue usque tu creara un file .tmx e un glossario e los collocara in iste respective plicas.</f15>
You will then be able to launch OmegaT by executing this file from the command line
Tu ergo essera capace a lancear OmegaT con le execution de iste file ab le linea de commando
Your <f0>/source</f0><f1> folder will now contain</f1> one or more HTML file(s), together with associated files such as graphics files.
Tu plica <f0>/source</f0><f1> ora continera</f1> un o plus file(s) HTML, conjunctemente con files associate como files graphic.
Your current project uses sentence segmentation, but TMX file was created using paragraph segmentation.
Tu actual projecto usa le segmentation per phrase, ma le file TMX esseva create usante le segmentation per paragrapho.
Your documents and translation memories remain on your computer, and the <a2>OmegaT</a2> project will have no access to your work or information.
Tu documentos e memorias de traduction remane sur tu computator, e le projecto <a2>OmegaT</a2> non habera ulle accesso a tu obras o informationes.
Your new shortcuts should now appear next to the menu items you have modified.
Tu vias breve nove deberea ora apparer proxime al commandos del menu que tu ha modificate.
Your operating system refused to let OmegaT create its configuration folder.
Tu systema operative refusava a OmegaT de crear su classificator de configuration.
Your project does not contain any files in a supported file format.
Tu projecto non contine alicun file in un formato supportate.
Your translation file is now displayed in the Editing pane, and you can begin translating.
Tu file a traducer es ora exponite in le quadro de Modifica, e tu pote initiar a render.
You’ll need this to sign-in to <u0>Windows Azure Marketplace</u0> and use the Translator service.
Tu necessitara isto pro sign-in a <u0>Windows Azure Marketplace</u0> e usar le servicio de traductor.
